gi rnam par thar pa ni/ don rgya mtsho chen po mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa zhes bya 'o// de nas ri'i lha rin po cha'i rtsa mo mdog shinatu rgyas par gnas pas/ sangs rgyas kyimany+dzas ri'i 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshigasasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos// sngon spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas spud//
rnam thar shing gi rdul snyed bsgom mdzad pas// 'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i shugs kyang skyod// sangs rgyas smra nas dri med dpal bkye ba// yan lag mtshan brgyan 'gro ba kun bka zhing//
byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston// nags tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnam thar to// sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon// 'jig rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang
zhing 'phags// dbang po dang ba'i sams can rangs shing dga' ]rnam thar 'di la 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzug/ rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig rten chos ma chags/
bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo// sna tshogs khams 'gro sbyor bas ma'aa 'dul// dga' ba dri med gtsugapung rnam thar to// 'jig rten kun ni mdongs gyur mun sdug/
zhugs// thugs rjed rab sangs rgyas 'od bkra zhing// 'gro khams yun rings nyal ba sad par mdzad// rig nas dga' 'od lha yi rnam thar to// srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon
spyod tsho// zhing rdul mnyam pa'i sems can gtsamachod pas// de dag dgyes bzhin sa mas can byang chub bkod// ki ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang lha 'jug pa 'o// las kyi sprin sgrib
g.yogs shing bsgribs pa'i rnams // srid par sams can sdug bsngal 'khor gakhrigs nas/ de dag mun pa ya shis 'od kyis bsal/ dgabri brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sams
so rgyalaba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun// khyogs dbyings samasacan bsam pa bzhin du grag/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun tugs/ )'od mang rngul gyi cha
'bya// bo'i lha 'jug go/ sems can kun sbyod dge ba rgya mtsho kun// de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang// sna tshogs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos kyang
ston tshul mngon mig gi lha yis dra thos so/ chos sgo rgya mtsho mi phrad tshad med pa// sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung// bskal pa kun brjod 'jig rten
mang la ston// rdo rjesal mig 'di yi gnas la 'jug/ de la sa'i lha dpal gyi ma rtog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig skad cig
cing sams can thams cad la byams pa dang/ snying rje'i dkyil 'khor kyis rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ sa'i lha bsod nams ban pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pani/
sams can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi rgyan ces bya'o// sa'i lha sams rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ deng ngo 'dzin sna tshogs bsgom pas rnam pas
dpyod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha dus dus su dag pa'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pani/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtsa ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o//
sa'i lha gsar gyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha las sos kyi 'od rnam par
'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pani/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pazhes bya'o// sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par thar/
pa ni 'gro ba thams cad skya ba'i sgra rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha ma tog gi glong sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni ) sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum
tshogs pa'i rang bzhin drim med pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyi rlabs kun nas
rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyun bskom pa 'byungang
'os bya'o// de nas sa'i lha dang la gyi ma dog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la
rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'dingag sbas so// stachad skad cig skad cig bder gshegs kyis// brjod du med pa'i snying rje'i sgo rnams dang// byams pa'i
sgo yang mi zad bsgoms pas na// de phyir sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra// dus gsum gtogs pa'i sems can bsod nams dang// ji skad byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dang
rgyal ba'i lnga gcig de nyid bsod nams 'od// bsod nams de mthong rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med//
tiba'adzin zhi ba rgya mtshor rang tu zhugs// sems can rgyan gyi sa 'di rab tu ston// 'di ni sna tshogs shing gi bro ba'i sa yin no// sngon chad thub pas spyod pa spyad pa dang//
'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnam par bzlog pa ni// rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyi sa yin te/ rnam par de la dga' bar lhalta'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te//
'jig rten kun tu skad cig skad cig ston/ dus tshod yang dag ston pa'i sa yi lha// dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta sangs rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam
mi khyab// sa mas can kun bsgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// gsar 'od mig gi dpal ni rab daka'i bar// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mang la lta//
sas rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gablugs su// phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad/ smra las dri shom 'od kyis yi lha)/ sangs rgyas sems can 'dul
ba de la lta// phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas dang// 'gro ba 'di ni phye mtha'i bskal par brjod// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa yi lha// rab tu//
dga' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan/ rgyal ba'i spu las sums can mnyam pa yi// sngos kyi 'od bkyi 'jig rten kun bkang zhing// so mas can ma lus yongs su
smin mdzad pa// ma tog gtsug phud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong// de bzhin gshags sku rdo rje lta bu ste// mtshams su ma phyang sra ba'i ri bo 'dra// 'gro ba kun gyis sangs
rgyas bskyod mi nus// rdo rje rdul gyi lhani des dga' 'o// de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtsa mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sams can la phan pa yang dag par sbyar ba
'byung ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer
gyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o// gro'akhyer gyi lha sos pa'i mya ngan thams
cad spong bas rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skyob pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ snying rje snying po zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma gin tu rgyas pa'i mig ke rnam par thar
pa ni shes rab kyisakun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni// thabs kyi sgo kun nas ston pa'i
@#// mthu zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams 'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o//
grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sams can rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od sa bya'o// grong khyer kyi lta smos kyi
rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang midag ba'idri rnam pa ra sal cing thams cad mkhyenapa nyid kyi dri ya nga dag par spyad pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer
ba kyi lta rin chadapal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o// de nas grong khyer kyi lha rinapo che'i
rtsa mo 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus grong khyer kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad rnam par bltas nas/ tshe tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sasaso// mgon po'
chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ snang ba b.res shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes/ dachems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang//
sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te// de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen// rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyig/ sna tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dka'ad )rgyal
bas bskal ba mtha' yas yang dag spyad// sngan tshad rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag bzung// dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag blangs// rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thob
'gro ba 'dir ni thugs rjebyams bslad cing// de bzhin gshags pas sngon chad soms can rnams // kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog nyon mongs yongs su sbyong ba/
'di la dka'// rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te/ )tshad med nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab rnam spyod pas// mar
ma me tog 'od kyi lha dga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams // 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan// de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu bsgom pa yis//
mngon du 'od 'phro'i lha de rab tu dga'// bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa// sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs// de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam
lta bas// bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'// srid par rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can rnams // 'khoragyur rab rib mdongs pa gatrigs pas na// de dag phan phyir
sangs rgyas mngon du byung// dri mad 'od kyis rnamatho 'di thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs laltos// 'gro la sngon 'dra mtha' dang dbung yang med// de dag bstan
cing 'gro ba rnam par 'dul spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo// sams can rmongs pa mun pas mdongs rgyuphying// rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib
pas bsgribs gyur pa// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes 'gyur// rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'jug/ de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dag ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan
gyis brgya ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa yang dag par 'byung shing sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang nub kyi lha ri
rab sngo'i rinapo che'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs
kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas ston cing/ rmi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brag sgra sgrog pa/
zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha ma tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni ) dkab thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rin po gis 'babs pa'i rgyan ces
bya'o snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma chod pa'i rnam par thar pa ni )'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed cing/ snying po byang chub phun sum tshogs pa rnam
pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha ma tog gi 'phrang ba 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chosatshul zab mo dran pa ston pa
'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha rin po tsho'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'babs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni )dga' b yang dag par myong ba mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o//

snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu dam pa sposakyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs ba rab tu brjod pa'i byin kyi rlabs zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha rje rdza sna tshogasakyi sprin

gyi rnam par thar pani/ snying po byang chub rnam pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha pad+mo'i shing snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub kyi shing
yongs su shi bas phyogs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lhadage ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni// de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs sna
tshogs yang dag par sgrub zhes bya'o// de nas snying po byang chub kyilha dgo ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis ) sangs rgyas kyi mthus snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor
gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal pa mang po mtha' dang dbung yod par/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji
ltar sngon spyad dran// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsgrubs pas na// de phyir de yi bsod nams nam mkha'i tshad// zhing rnams mtha' yas tshod
med ' dri med par// mi zad gtong ba'i sgo nas sngon btang bas// ri bo mo yi 'od kyi lhade ni// bdagashogs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// bde gshegs sprul pa
rnam pa mtha' yas pa// de dag zhing rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu// 'gro bar sangs rgyas rmi lam bzhin ston cing// sprin gyi skadabyangs lha de rab tu dga'// mtha' yas bskal bar
dka' ba rab spyad de// dang ba'i spyan gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// rgya mtsho'i spyan yang yongs su sngon btang ste// de la me tog mig gi lhadaga'a'o// yon tan rin chen 'od 'gro mtha'
yas sprin// 'gro ba kun tu snying po byang chub nas// rab tu bkra ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis// 'od 'phro brgyad pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga'// sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rgya mtshoste//
da largyal ba chos kyi char yang 'babs// ji ltar mos par nem nur rnam par salag/ de yis gdug pad 'phyang ba dga' ba thob/ rgyan gyi char 'babs mig bzang lha de ni// sems kyi skad
cig gcig gis tshad sod pa'o// chos don dbyings kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa// rgya mtshor tha dad yang dag shes pas 'jug/ zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad du/ 'gro ba kun la
[} ]sangs rgyas legs brjod pas// de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas zhing kun grags// rten rjes su sbos ga lha yang dran// mtha' yasang gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs//
byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus bstan// rdo rje snatshogs sprin gyi lha de ni// byang chub shing la dga' bar rnam par lta// sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byang chub la// phyogs
rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de// pad+mo snang zhing gsal ba'i lha de ni// rnam thag nam yas 'di la rab dga' 'o// sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dag bsam mi khyag/
snying po byang chub 'di ni kun kyang grag/ yang dag bsgrubs pas byung ba de dag ni// thams cad sna tshogs snang ba'i 'od nyan to// de la rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal
gyi phyag rgya rnam par thar ba ni/ dag 'ab yangs pa rin po che'i char gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro ra do snang ba'i 'od dran gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs kyi
sku 'od zer gyi kha dog pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad du ston pas dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro ma rtog gtsug bud kyi dpal dri ma mod pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sams kyi skad cig
thams cad la de bzhin gshekas pa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya// rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ gom pa
'dor ba thams cad du sems can mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyan ces bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpalagyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni ) skad cig gcig gis
ro'adra ba sna tshogs sprul pa byed cing ni po che'i char ba dang/ dbyangs dang/ snang bkumatu 'gyod pa zhes bya'o// rlung gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par thar pani/ dga' ba'i
shugs dang nyams bde ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ rkang gis 'gro shing tsan dan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spos kyi ngad sprin
du ldang ba zhes bya'o/ rkang gis 'gro pado yi da du'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ pad+mo'i gsab thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung bas snang ba bskyod pa zhes
bya'o rkang gis 'gro lakyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pani/ lus kyi 'od phrer rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyidra bas snang ba byed pa zhes bya'o// skung gis 'grom dog mang po'i
dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la dag ba'itsang rgya mtshos ya nga dag par skal ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas rkang gis gro'ani nadang 'a gyi phyag rgyas/
sangs rgyas kyi mthus rkang gis 'gro'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul
gyi shugs bskyed cing/ bskal pa mtha' yas stan chad spyod pa mdzad// zhing rnams kun la shin tu phra mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbyas pa'i thabs kyis/
mchod// skad cig soms lang ngo brjod yas pa// dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sngal mdzad nas// zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa// snang ba'i 'od zer
lha des rab tu mthong// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab// 'khor rnams kun tu 'byam rgyas mtha' yas pa'i// rnam par 'phrul pa mi zad rab tu ston//
me tog gtsug phud lha des de mthong ngo// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// thams cad kun tu gshags shing bzhud pa yis// sems can mtha' yas
yongs su sminang ra mdzad// shin tu mdzes pas dga' par de mthongango// sems can snyad kyi sprul pa kun 'phros pa/ ri pa'i sku yis chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gangs//
rin chen dri med 'od kyang rab tu gtong// rkang 'gro dpal gyi mtshan kyis 'di mthong ngo// de bzhin gshags pa'i spyod yul mtha' yasato/ 'khor du rgyal ba chos kyi char yang
'bobs// bde gshigs de yi 'khor na dgar gnas shing// dga'i sgra dbyangs kyis rnam thar de mthong ngo// sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste// dbyangs kyi yan/
dalag yon tan kun dang ldan/ 'jig rten kun bkang sams can rnam par 'dul// tsan dan shing gi 'od ni dil nyan// sdurtsa kun nas rgyal ba rnal
'phrul dang// dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshanagyi rnams // sgra bsgrags thos shing dga' ba skyar 'gyur to// de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngo// de bzhin gshags sku bsam
gyis mi khyab ste/ dgom pa gom par yon tan rgya mtsho ston// de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mthong// rdul gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo// 'jig rten mgon po rnam 'phrul rnam
mang gis// phyogs bcur sems can dang dag bskul bar mdzad// ma rtog 'khor mang rkang pas 'gro ba'i lha// mthong zhing dga' ba yangs pa rab tu 'thob/
de la lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pani/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rnam par dpyodapa
zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'irgyan ces bya'o//
lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pani ) sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i sams can thams cad la rjod cing yang dag par bskul bas dga'
rA/ ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs nga 'i lha rgyan bzang po'i me tog gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshags pa 'i sku nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs
kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal kyi rnam par thar pa ni ) sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams la
yang dag par ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o// lus kyi 'os su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i 'phrang ba 'dzin pa'i dbal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad gso ba dang 'dres pa'i
mdangs kyi dga' ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa lha smos dris med pa'i sIn las char 'bab pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
pa'i dri ma mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// lus kyiris su gtogs pa'i lha srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang rmongs
pa rnam par sgrog rang zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i wasgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par sbyor pani/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal pa
rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lhakhrel dang dar la mi kalora'i 'od kyi rnam par pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba'i shugs
thams cad yang dag par 'dzin da yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o/// de nas lasakyi ris su gtogs pa'i lhakhrol dang dge bas rgyas pa'i
'od kyis/ ) sangs rgyas kyi mthus lus kyi ris su gdon pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam pa ra bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshekas su bcad pa 'di dag sas so//
ri rab rdul phran shin tu tha snyadakyi// bskal pa de dag da snga'i bskal pa ni// rdul ngos bya bar 'od mdzes 'od zer rgyal// mchod de smon lam btab pa bdag gis dran// sangs
( rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba// de yi 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu/ rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba sems can 'dul// 'od 'phro 'od zer lha yis de mthong ngo// dbyangs
kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'i// sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun tu sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang dag skul// dbyangs kyis 'dul ba de la dga' bar
nyam// rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la ltos// sku gzugs du ma'ang mtshan nyid mi ma 'a ste// 'gro ba kun ma'ang bzhugs par rab du snang
me tog btsug gis ji bzhin nyid du// 'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mikhyab ste// sems can de dag dad pa ji bzhin du// la la bzhugs dang bzhengs dang shashags par mthong/ de yang spyod lam
'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo// rgyal ba'i tshoms kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas// dri zhim 'od 'khri sgron ma'i sngon bkra bas// 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur/ dri ma
spos kyi sngon gyis de mthong ngo// sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung// nyon mongs rmongs shing sdug bsngal gzir ba'i rnams // mgu bar mdzad cing nyon mongs thams
cad bal// snang ba'i 'brang ba 'chang bas 'di mthongang// 'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon// rang byung 'jig rten don mdzad skyes pa ni/ 'jig rten kun gyi dbul
ba rnam par sel// khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad snya/ sams can nyon mongs sgrib pas nyon mongs shing// bdud kyi lam kyis krugs te 'thun pa'i rnams // de dag rgyal ba'i
rnam thar lam ston to// bsrung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo// de bzhin gshekas pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ltos// sangs rgyas sbyin gyis chos kyi dbyings mnan cing// 'jig
rten dbang po gnas su sems can 'dul/ kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul la/ de la lag na rdo rje mthu chamakha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon
tan mtha' yas pa dang gzugs kyi sku rnam par dpyod pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsdu las
nyima'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rjer rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bstan pas/
yon tan mtha' yas pa'i las su 'khrul pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas tshad med pa'i rdzas
su song ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam par thar pani/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba ston rung/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
rlabs kyis yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dbyings rab tu phyag thams cad ma lus pa la
yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyan yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje/
sang ga'i 'od kyi rgyal mo'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o// lag na rdo rje'od 'phro stag
po dpal gyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can ma rungs pa'i rgyud la lus 'jigs jigs lta bsatu ston cing kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje'in na gtsug phud pad+mo 'od N+NaM
mtsha/ rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi ra mngon par 'bobs pa zhes bya'o/
lag na rdo rje mthu rnamakha dog par po'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i rtsa tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// chos rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi// chos nyid de la rnam par ltos// yon dun mtha' yas sku gzugs kyis/ 'jig rten kun tu rnam
par mdzes// sangs rgyas ba thams cad nas// 'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas
rnam 'phrul dedag gis// chos kyi dbyings su khyab byas shing// 'grob kun la mngon sum du// mi zad sku ni shin tu ston// sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// zhing nams kun
tu rab tu sgrog/ kasung gisasams can thams cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gongs// 'jig rten dbang po kun gnas na// sgrub pa rab tu bzhugs par snang// de dag thams
cad 'khor rnams la// 'dren padag ni chos ston mdzad// rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bskul bas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis// thams cad chos kyi bye brag don// rgyal ba zad
bod rab tu ston// rgya chen mtha' med tshul dag la// rgya mtsho 'khor rnams rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'od zer rab 'dres pas// kun gyis 'dren pa
mthong bar gyur// zhing rnams bya ba'i rdul snyed du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas/ )bsod nams rgya chen nam mkha' bzhin// kun 'dren 'dren pa rab tu mthong// sangs rgyas
rdzu 'phrul ma 'dren pa// thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad// 'gro la sangs rgyas mngon sum du// byang chub snying po rnam par mdzes// 'od zer sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'od
phro sprin ni kun tu snang// chosadabyings kun tu khyab byas shing// sangs rgyas spyod yul rab tu ston/// bam po lnga pa// del byang chub
sams dpa'akun tu badrang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ tshul gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang// 'gro ba la mthar thug par mngon bar sgrub ba shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas yon tan
rgyatshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang//
[d sgo thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ shing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gyis//
mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya nga 'i rnam par thar pa dad/ rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs su byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa
mtha' dang dbung chad pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam
par thar pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ gang 'di chos kyi dbyings
mtha' dang dbus med pa rang gi lus kyi sprul pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ gang 'di byang bu sams dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan
tshunadu ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dag go// de nas byang ba sams dpa' kun tu bzang po rnam par thar pa'i
tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug cing/ sangs rgyasakyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/
de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgyal bas dri med rnam par sbyangs// mkha' yangs rdul bzhin yon tan tshad kyang med// sngon
sba gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med nga// de la bsam yas chos sprin char yang bab// ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba// de bzhin rdul sgrubs ma lus kun ma'ang sgyu// /
'on kyang bde gshegs gshogs dang 'pho ba med// zhing rnams kun tu yul mang rab tu ston)/ sa yi tshul la 'jug pa tshad med de spyod pa thub pas byang chub sams dpa'
bstan/ bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun gsungs pas// rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug/ chos dbyings 'jug tshul rnam pa rgya che ste// mtha' yas phyogs su
mtha' dang dbus med sgo// la phran sbubs su rgyal ba 'phrul ba spros// 'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang rab tu mkhyen// phyogs rnams thams cad zhing rnams kun tu yang// 'jig rten
gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung// thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod do// 'dul bas soms can thams cad rnam par sbyong// rdul sprubs kun tu mtha' dang dbus med pa'i//
rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston// sngon chad thub ba'i byang chub spyod pa rnams // ji bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod// ya ngas dus bskal pa ji snyad yod pa'i rnams / skad
cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston// der ni sams can 'byung zhing 'jig pa'ang bstan// 'jig rtenakatsho bo'i ye shes bsam yas ltos// 'byam klas mi zad mtha' yas
bgrangs pas// rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas a lta ste// thams cad sgor yang sangs rgyas masnga' dbus med// rgyal sras kun gyis shes par sla ba min// sangs rgyas
mkha' 'dra rnam par mi rtog ste// chos nyid mi gnas chos kyi sprin dag gis// sprul pas spyodatshe kun tu rgyas mdzad cing// shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'tshang rgya bstan// sangs rgyas gsu/
rab tu brjod pas na// chos gnas thams cad ma lus brjod pa yin// 'gro ba thams cad ro ra'i sgo dag nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug/ de la byang ba
soms dpa' dge ba dri ma med pa'i kakhri brjod kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ phyogs kyi dbyings thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i rgyan
byed pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'od mchog kun tu skyon ma'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes ba ston cing
chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin pa dang/ rnam par 'dul par byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba song ka'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par Tapa ni
byang chub sems dpa' thamasakyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang/ zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dpal gyi 'od zer
kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par thar pani/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul kyis rnam par spyod pa don yodapa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyi rnam pa
thar ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yi shes kun tu snang
ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzas su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod pa'i sprin chen po'isnying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs shing/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba
zhes bya'o// byang chub sams dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod par nyi bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes
bya'o byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzibarjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes
bya'o/ byang chub sams dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni ) de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku med pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o
da nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen podagabadri ma med pa'i gzi brjikyi 'od yid du 'ong bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba rgya
mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ 'i rmi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji snyad gang dag phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing// rgyal bas de kun skad cig dgongs bas sbyangs//
'gro bar kun tu zhib mad pa'i gsung// sangs rgyasachos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen skor// skadartsig dgongs pas chos dbyings kun bkang ste// mtha' yas spyod la dbyings rnams rgyal ba ston// 'gro

ba kun lam snying po byang chub tu// byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du// de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad spyod spyad de// nam mkha' 'dra ba
byas nas rab bkye zhing// sangs rgyas zhing 'di sngon rab tu sbyangs// mtha' dang dbus mad bskal pal la yis// skyob chad par rgyal ba'i yul bsams kyang// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
stobs la mtha' dbus med// phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa kun tu 'gangs// rgyal ba'i smra 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos// phyogs bcu'i rgyun de dag rnam dag pa/ rgyal rabs 'dir ni skrun
kyang rab tu bstan// skad cig skad cigasna tshogs gzugs kyang snang// bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag tu// rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par dka'//
la rnams kun skor sangs rgyas chags pa med// 'gro ba 'di na rgya chen bsam yas mdzes// sngon ma'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun tu// sangs rgyasargya mtsho rgya chen bstan bkur bas//
do bas 'jig rten gtsol phyogs dbyings rnams // kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya ron 'byung// phyogs rnams bkang ste sangs rgyas byung ba dag/ rdul gyi sbubs su tshad mdazhing yang ston//
dadag yul du ma zad mtha' yas pa'i// bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad// sngonatsho'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro don spyod// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med rab skyed cing// 'gro
ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs// sangs rgyas mtshan mad sku mad rdul dang bral// de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste// 'gro ba
kunun mtha' yas gozugasas snang// 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi mdzad// de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od bar rgya mtsho'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/

pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugasakyis sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang ) sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhesabya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho/
dri med 'od kyi snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sams skad ka la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o///
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pani ) bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon
tan dri ma med pas yongs su dag pa sgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyag gi rnam par thar pa ni ) byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying
po byang chub tu thob ma 'gro ba'i yo shes kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud kyi rnam par sa pani/

sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang tha mi dad nga ra 'gro ba thams cad kyidabang po dang mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ya shos sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rnam
par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yo shas bsgrub ra ra bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje/
yangs pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pani/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar pa'i
@#// 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni ) sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par/
bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub soms dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon yan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu
gnas pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi dbyings
thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sams dpa' 'od bar rgya mtsho 'od can dpal gyi zla bas/ sangs rgyas kyimathus byang chub sems
dpa' rnam par phye pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag susaso// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang// sa yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang
yongs su rgyas// tshad med sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas zhing yangs rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun gyis byas te// sangs rgyas soms
can khams sbyin 'dul mdzad pa// skad cig dgongs pas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' yas 'gro mnyam bsam nga tshom par gsung// bskal pa rgya che mi zad mu med par// rgyal ba 'gro
la mngon sum kun nas bzhugs// mgon pos sngon chad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du// rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan// chos rgyal de dag ji ltar rnam 'phrul ba// phyogs
rnams rgya mtshomalus kun n snang// snying po byang chub kum na'ang rgyal ba dag 'khor gyis bskor cing chos rnams kasung nga snang// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams rud tshim mdzad cing//
'jig rten dag na sangs rgyas tshul kun mdzas// dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char pa 'babs )sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam pa 'a mdzes// de bzhin nyid ltar dngon nyid lus me da do//
rgyal ba dri med 'od gsal chos kyi sku// ye shes zhi nga 'i sku ni tshad med de// phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char ya nga 'babs// chos rjes thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag/
bde gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te// rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dbus med bkang zhing/ rgyal ba stobs la 'khrug pa rab tu ston/ )sangs rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings kun bkang
zhing sa ngas rgyas spyod pa h+phams cad rdzogs par bstan// rgyus bas ston mo ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa// de bzhin yo shas sa rnams rgyal bas bstan// phyogs rnams kun//
tu rang byung rnam par mdzes// smon lam rnam par 'phrul ba ma lus ston// jiltar sngon rgya' bas mo ngas sbyangs pa// rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas sgrog/ sangs rgyas/
yulani phyogs su khrad pa mad// dbus dang mtha' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings// phyogs dbyings kun tu chags med b.ros ra sa na/sangs
rgyas zhing rnams kun na shin tu mdzes/// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyisang ge'i khri dang pad+mo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang ) nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang
'khor lo'i lta ba thams cad dang ma tog gi thaba'i dri thams cad dang// stokas bu'i ngos thams cad dang/ rta babs kyi sgo thams cad dang 3 nor bu'i gablugs kyi ngos
thams cad dang/ rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgo thams cad dang ) 'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang/ sang ga'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
shin tu phra ba snyad kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'thon par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po
zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ra bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kyi gtsug phud dang )byang ba sams
dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po chu bsam gyis mi khyab pa yogasargya mtsho'i dpal dang/ byang chub sams
00 dpa' mig brgya pado sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshul pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug rud dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar kyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid
dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang/ byang chub sams dpa' kun tu sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang/ byang rlub sems dpa' sngon yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa
byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad mchod pa'i sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing ) 'di ltaranor bu'i rin po ci'i ma tog gi sprin thams cad ni rab tu
'byin/ sngos kyi spron thams cad ni shin tu 'gyod/ rin po tsho'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kyi srin thams rud ni mngon par 'byin/ yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin

ni rnam par brgyad cing/ nor du nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kyi sprin ni 'ab du gtong ) sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni rab tu sgrog/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba

kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i srin gyisan rab du snang bar byed/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni rnam par sbyong/ rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa blad mi shes pa'i nor bu'i

rgyal po'i charani rab tu 'bebs/ rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyalapo'i sprin gyi cha ra ni rab tu 'ar bas shing/ de lta bu dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' ra re zhing yang/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyi mchod pa'i sngon kyi mar rab du 'babs par byed cing lhags par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yus phyog/
su bskor ba byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thums cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brtan do/
de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du bltas nas ) song che'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i pad+morosnying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod par gyur to//
byang chub sams dpa' de dag thams cad kyang spyod yul rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so// sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so// deng tin gshigs pa'i
spyod yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang
ba rab tu thob pa rnams so// sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so// gzugs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad kyis chos rgya mtshorab tu 'dzin pa rnams so// dus
gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi yo shes kyi sa la rab tu gnas ba rnams so// dga' kha'i shugasargya chen po rab tu thob pa rnams so// bsod namasakyi dkyil 'khor mu mad pa yongs su dag pa rnams
tachos dbyings dang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu zhing/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag go de nas byang chub/
sams dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo glos rnam par rol pa'i ya shos mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam pa la bltas nas/
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyus mnyam nyid mkhyen// chags mad brnyes pas nam mkha' lta bu ste// phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang
byas nas// 'byam kras 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par mdzes// bde gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dbus mad de// thams cad phyogs kyis dbyis kun rgyas par// dbang phyug chen
po kun gyis mchod bskor cing// shing gi rgyal po kun kyi drung na bzhugs// de bzhin gshags pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// skad cig soms la mi zad yon tan gzugs//
rnamathar kazhan dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so// bskal pa rgya mtshor sngan chad spyod pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pas sred pa
rgya mtsho 'di'i// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin byas pa// de dag rgyal ba de yi chosa'adzin to// yongs dag dri med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag/ thams cad sangs rgyas
[s ]/ @#// lta zhing rnam par gnas// nga blo'i snying po pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// sangs rgyas kang la pazhugs pa'i sang/
ka'i khri// rinan nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro zhing// sos 'dro srin rnams mtha' yas rab tu byung// snying po du ma'i ma ka'aphrang sbyangs pa'o// rin 'od 'phro'i smin rtag
tu 'gyed// 'od zer sgron ma rgya rgyun rab tu 'bar// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// thub pa de bzhugs mngon par rab tu mdzes// sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'byed//
rin chatshon du sna tshogs pad+mo 'phyang// nor bu'i rgyal pos skar khung kun nas brgyan// sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par rab tu mdzes// zla gam rin chen mang pos yongs su gzung//
rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos brgyan// gtsug na nor bu'i byang chub sems dpas bzung// sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par shin tu mdzes// phyogs btsun sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog/ gzukas ngarnyanAzhing rnams kun n snang// thub pa de 'dra'i sang ki'i gdan la bzhugs/ de nasaM byang chub sems dpa'
sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// 'di ni bde gshags
sangs rgyas byin rlabs te// byang chub spyod pa sngan chad byed pa dang// sangs rgyas mchod pa'i mchod pa du ma dag/ rgyal ba'i gangs las de dag thams cad snang// sngos 'od snang ba/
nor bu'i rgyal po can// me tog snying po song go'i gdan gyi 'khor// rgyan rnams thams cad kags banan gyur pa dang// 'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun kyang snang// skad cig skad
cig rgyan gyi ba don kun// rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas kangan las snang// sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang// 'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdan la lta// na chen lnga ldi paro/
mang brtags pa// phra zhing byang chub sams dpa' mang po rnams // sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing// sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs la bstod pa byed// sangs rgyas bsod
nams tshad med nam mkha' bzhin// 'di dag rgyan kun de las rab tu byung// sa rnams re ri'i rgyan rnams nang yod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis de dag bsam mi nus// mi phyad mtshams kyi rdzogs
rje sna tshogs pa// 'khor yangs rnam dag shin tu mnyam pa sta/ nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram// byang chub shing gi sa yi 'khor kun dog/ sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i gdan
yod pa// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs te// ma rtog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram// gsar tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan// sa yi lha mo de dag rab da' zhing//
skad cig soms kyi mi zad sa yang ston// kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du man lta zhing// kha dog thams cad rgyan gyi sprin gdong ngo// [P]nasman gron ma mang po gsal/
bar 'bar// spos mang dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung// dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston cing// lha rnams kun kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa byed// phyogs rnams bcu na zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de
dka sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod par// de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang// sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa med pas byung// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor bu chen po chu sna
chogs kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug phud kyis ) sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan chad
spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dgatu// zhing kun phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba'i rnams // mang bobyang ba'akhor gyi 'di la/ dom phrad sa dang de dag rab tu snang// rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang
sgyu ba yi sa la rin chen mdzes kun rnam par bkram// rinan mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtod// sangs rgyas 'od kyis sprinakyang rab tu snang// sa rnams kun brgyan shing gi dam
pa'i drung/ kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos rgyan byas las// bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byung// sangs rgyas smra 'bul tshul yong rab tu brjod// ri chos mang po sgronama'i
00 char phab cing// rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes// sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug sgrashin du sgrog/ sa yi lha rnams sa yang yang dag ston// rin chen 'od 'gro sgron
ma rnam par snang// 'od nger na nas las rab tu byung// nor bu du ba sil ma kun nas bkram// rin chen sna tshogs rigs kyi yan lag brgyan// sa rnams kun nas
mdzes pa 'di dag ltos// rin thor mang po rnon bzang rgyan du bkyi// 'gro ba dag la chos kyirgya mtsho sgrog/ de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong// malus phyogs na sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi// byang chub shing gi phun sum tshogs pa dag/ sa yi dkyil 'khor 'din kun snang ste// de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod/ sangs rgyas kadan las chos rnams
rgya mtsho yi// chos sgo bde bar gshegs pas gang gsung ba/ sems can kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin du/ das 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung// dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung
bsan// de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro la 'gongs// srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed// sa 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun sum gang dag dang// dri med
sa ni gang gis mdzes gyur pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams ra zhing// bskal ba byang dag tu'ang brjod mi nus// denas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyims/
rab tu gnon pa'i khro gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa brams cad la rnam par bltas da ) de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
sbas so// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshel mdzad cing// sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun du mngon sum du// sangs rgyas 'gro gtso gzhal/
mang/ khang na snang// rin chen kun gyis snying po rab tu brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin mdzes shing 'bar// sangs rgyas pho brang 'od ni bsam mi khyab// de na bzhugs shing sangs
rgyas rab tu mdzes// ka ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs to// phyogs rnams kun skor rta babs sprin kyang bras// stags ba'i 'phrang ba kun nas rgyan du bkod// gser gyi dril bu'i srin
kyang rnam par brgyus// ma toka ba re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos// rin chen shing sdong dar gyi bu'i bras// nor bu thams cad sgo nas 'phrong ba 'brul// don ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu mdzes//
spos dri rgyal mtshayon chen dra ba ste// 'od phrar sgronama'i sprin gyis kun tu yog/ rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas shin tu bros// don sangs rgyas rab tu 'phags pa bzhugs// phyogs
rnams kun sgo pal pa'i sngon kyi rnams // dbyas kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing// 'khyam kyis phyogs kyi sams can rnams 'dulang)/ sangs rgyas pho brang 'di na
de dag grag/ me tog shing dang rin chen spungs la ba// 'phags par phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par mdzes// de la dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang// gzugs
brtan gyur par de dag rab tu snang// phyogs rnams kun du rin chen mang bkyi ba// de dag sna tshogs mdzes par rnam par 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu skar khung mdzes par/
brgyan// rta babs mda' yab sna tshogs mang pos brgyan// de la dri med 'od zer kun nas snang ba yi// sangs rgyas pho brang rnam pa bsam yas te// gzhal med khang mang gis
cad de la snang// de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba bzhugs shing mdzes// phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa// rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun zhugs kyang// ma' dang dpung mdamu
yang de bzhin med// rang byung sangs rgyas ba brang de na bzhugs// de nas byang chub sa mas dpa' yon tan rin ro mi bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi shes rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas
kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa de dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag snasaso// sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu phrasAd kyi// bsod nams sgra/
mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te// sas rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dag byung// snying po byangunub dri mang rnam par mdzes// los zhim rnams cad nas yang dag rgyu// yid bzhinano ka
rgyal pos kun nas brgyan// rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu rgyal pos bris// shing sdong rtsa ba rin chen kun las byas// rdo rje phyi ma'i bu 'a khor le 'byung// lcan/
rnams thams cad rin rgyan gyis brgyan yal na stug po sprin ltar kun nas 'khyil// snying po byang chub de nargyal ba mdzes// yal ga dog pa kun nas mngon pa ste//
'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags// me tog 'bras bu rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyod// snying po byang nub rgya mobasam mi khyab// 'od rnams bskye ba phyogs
su rnam par mdzas// dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes// yal ga'i sgo nas sprin kun man yang 'babs// snying po byang chub son lam yangs pas byung// ma
tog nor dang rin chen mi zung la/ dmu tig nor dag phyogs dang phyogs rnams kun nas brgyas// phye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sprin 'gyod de// snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu
'byin// bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos// pad+mo'i dra ba ma bu dri mad mang// rini chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'gro/ dril bu'i dri ba'i sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin//
phyogs bcu'i shing bzang 'khrugs rnams gang yod pa// 'khyam klas zhing gi ma lus thams cad dag/ byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang// de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes//
[/]yal ga kun nas rin chen mi zad nol/ byang rlub sems dpa' dag kyang rtag 'byung zhing// bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor rlar phab sta// phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod phyir
de dag 'dong// de bzhin gshags pas sngon chad mi gyur dang// byang chub spyod las byung ba 'di dag ltos// yal ga kun las rin chen mo mi rbad// sangs rgyas yul kun bsam
gyis mi khyab bo// danas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pa pad+mo sna tshogosakyigatsug bud kyis// sangs rgyas kyi sarngus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas
nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skya so// dus gsum gshikas pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul ba// de dag rin chen sgro nas kun kyang grag/ de ni mtha' dang dbung yang yod ba ste/
snying po byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo// ma tog mang po'i 'phrang ba sbyangs bkye zhing// 'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste// byang nub shing la gnas pa'i tshogs rnams ///
sangs rgyas lta zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed// sposakyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar// sdos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim/
shing gi rgyal po de phyir phyogs su mdzes// pad+mo 'thul ba stug cing gsar mdog 'dra// rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyabacas shing/
sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel// rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste// phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la/ dgazugasabarnyan snang
zhing dri med 'od mchog 'byed// byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos// smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar ma rnams // rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun las 'bar// srid

pa rgya mtsho kun na sngon chad du// rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston/ byang chub lta rnams zhing gi rdul snyed de// de dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas// thub pa'i byang chub shing la
skad cig cing// rnam thar kazhin dang gzhan mang de dag ston// rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe// sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa// de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi
sbyor bcas pa// thams cad rin chen sgo nas rab tu snang// phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyad snod gyur pa// de dag thams cad 'di las sgra 'byung ste// de dag rtsis 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra
pa'ang// snying po byang chub 'di las kun brjod do// byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun n// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyi miMmadun dag/ mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyan na rngams
cad kyang// sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas yos sbyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'brogabri brjid dkyil 'khor kyi 'od kyis/ sangs rgya sa kyi
masdus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang chub spyod mdzad tsha// mos pa'i
dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing// kanas dang gnas min stobs rnams thugs chud pa'i/ bde gshegs sa stobs rnam par dag par mthong// bskal pa kun tu rgya mtsho las sbyangs te//
mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i rnams // sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhin phyokas bkang zhing/ las rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod// sna tshogs rnams
kyis 'byam klas stongs sbyong tshe// bskal pa snga mar 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin// yongs su smin byas de bas 'khor kun kyang// soms dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs la 'jug
'jig rten kun gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang// bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ba rnam spyod pa// de dag ji bzhin rgyal ba chos ston te// rang byung mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ston to//
phyogs rnams ma lus zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang// 'byam kyis sems can khams dang chos kyi khams// nam mkha'i khams rnams mnyam nyid mkhyon mi rtog/ rang byung
lnga rtsar khams mkhyen stobs kyang ston// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen kun tu 'gro/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus 'gengs// phyogs dang zhing dang bskal[D]
@#// pa 'gro bkang zhing// sams can kun la stobs 'jug mngon par bstan// bsam gtan rnam thar stobasas mtha' dbus med// ting 'dzin rgya
[S/ ]mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun skad// thams cad rgyal ba'i skal bstan pa sa na// sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyi nyon mongs sel// sas rgyas ya shos dus gsum bsgribs
pa med// skad cig kun la dus gsum snga phyir ston// zhing dang sams can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos/ de ltar rgyal bas rjes su dran stobs bstan// thub pa'i spyanani nam
mkha' mnyam pa ste// des ni chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar kaTigs// thams cad tshul gyis chags yod kazhal yas sa// brnyes pas ra shes spyanani rnam mang bstan//
'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang// 'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyam ma lus par// thabs sgo kun nas nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing// rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar kun nas byung/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyas kun nas sgrog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgyamatsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i
tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgya chen sangs rgyas byin rlabs phyogs kun tu// sangs rgyas ston kyang rdog ba mi mnga' ste/ dab rol phyin pargya chen yongs bkang ba//
byang chub spyod pa rgya chenade dag snang// 'gro ba rnams la thugs rje chu bskyad cing// sbyin pa'i mthar phyin sngon chad spyad pas na// de phyir sgrub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis rgyas// 'gro
ba kun gyis blta zhing dga' ba ste// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas sngon// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas// de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing//shin tu
'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sol// ma log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyad de// sngon chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam sbyangs pas// 'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan
kun ston te// de bas phyogasasu 'od rnams shin tu 'dzon// bskal pa mamatshamang por sngon spyod tshe// 'gro ba rnams kyi bsgribs pa thibs po bsal/ da phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun
ngakang ste// shing rab drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tsha// bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas rab tu spyad// de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med
dga' ba bskyed// nyon mongs dri ma sgrib pa kun kyang sol// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyod cing// shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas sngon bkang ste// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun
pa yongs su bsal// de bas rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba kun mnyam thabs sgo thabs cad kyis// yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam sbyangs pas// phyogs rnams kun n kun/
la mngon par bzhugs// phyi ma'i bsal par 'gro ba mngon du lta/ smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab sbyong tshe// bskal pa rgya mtsho shin tu rgya che
[/ ]zhing phyi mtha' bskal par 'gro ba'i smin mnyam par// spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes/ rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// bskal pa kazhal
yas mang por yongs su sbyangs// de phyir rang byung stobs kyi pha rol phyin// phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun nad phyir 'phags// thams cad mkhyen nyid nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i//
ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs pas// de phyir chags med ye shes pa la phyin// phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sin
yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sus so// sangs
rgyas rdzu 'phrul lul ni phyogs rnamasakyi/ 'gro ba'i rgyud dbyings nam mkha'i mnyam par snang// sa rnams yas pa ji ltar sngon bskyod pa// de bzhin kun kyang rin chen
sgo nas brjod/ dang ngo 'i sa dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul// phyogs dbyings kun gyi bde gshegs rnams mthong zhing// gzhal med bskal par dri mad yongs sbyangs pas//
chos dbyings yangs la ya zhes rab tu byung// mas cad chos la dri med sa gnyis te// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyad cing// rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas//
'gro ba tshad med dri med sbyangs pas byung/ bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni sa gsum ste// snying po brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor lha mthong brtan/ )gang du de skyes zin chen sgo dran nas//
chos kyi sngonani rgya chen rang tu thos// 'od 'phro rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal mad sa/ mthu yi 'khor 'od snying po snying rje ste// zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs
kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o// dka'argyal snying po mnyam dbyings mnyam nyid do// zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing zhi la gzhol// sangs rgyas chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes// de yang rnam
dka ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan// shes rab rgya mtsho yangs pa'i sngon la spyod// 'byam klas chos kyi mthar thug rnam pa kun// zhing rnams kun la mngon sum nam mkha' 'dra// de byung
byang chub shing chen 'di las grag/ chos dbyings mkha' dang 'dra ba'i lus can te// 'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snan byed// 'byamakas thabs kyi sgonas rnam par dag/ ring du
song mchog de ni rgyal bas bstan// thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyis kyang mnyam rtogs pas/)/ bskal pan tu 'gro mchog mi g.yo ste/ )
u@#/ kazhal mad sa de'i tsAkyang rab tu sgrog/ tshad mad yul can stobs kyis rab tu snang// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'ju// 'dini rngul med
za dag ba'i blo grosas// bskal pa rgya mtshor byang chub shinge las brjod// chos kyi ljon ni rgyu chen sa bcu ste// dus rnams kun 'gangs nam mkha' rang bzhin 'dra// sangs rgyas yul
gyi sku dang dbyangs kun tu// rgyal ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu grags/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis//
sangs rgyasakyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni// dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag
pa'i soms// rgyal dang yul rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// phan tshun smon lam rnam dka spyod yul te// dag ba mtha' yas bya ba
rab tu byas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang// gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong/ bde gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag/ la las rgyal ba'i
chos sku de nyid la// kun tu sbyin 'dra gzhal med chags mad pa'i// mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong// la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la// phyogs bcu kun
tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing// yon tan mtha' yas 'od sprin rab 'bar ba// 'gro ba dad tshul sprin du gyur par mthong/ de la la rgyal ba'i ye shes chags bde 'jug/ dus gsum mnyam
nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sa// 'gro ba kun kyi bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug par mthong// sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste// phyogs kun
zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing// 'gro ba snod bzhin skul bar byed pa yi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la la la 'jug/ la la sangs rgyas snang ba sna tshogs 'dug/ sna tshogs
snangabs 'gro ba kun bkang zhing/ rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'od ni las der yang mthong// ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkyi ba'i// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i
sprin la la la 'jug/ sngan chad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la// la la dka' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed/ lalas bsod nams sna tshogs mtshanagyi rnams // bde gshegs bsod nams
byung ba ji ba zhin mthong/ pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i cha// ji ltar dag gyur mtshanakyang las mthong// sgo rnamasakun nas rgyal ba tshad mad de// mtha' dang dbung mod chos kyi dbyings
bkang dang// sangs rgyas byin rlabs rab tu brjod pa kun// rnam 'al sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong// / de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis babs kyis 'jig
rten gyi khams ma dog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun du g.yos so/ Sha 'gul
do rab tu 'gal to// kun tu 'khrul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldag go kun du ldeg go/ ma chom/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chom chomamo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ar
'ur/kun du 'ur 'ur ro/ shig shig/ ba tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig ko/ 'jig rten gyi dbang bo de dag thams cad re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i na
klu/ de bzhin gshags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab du phab bo// 'di ltar spos kyi ma tog sna tshogs kyi sprin rgya chung thams cad rab tu phab ngo) rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi
sprin dang rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang/ rin po che kha dog sna tshogs
dang mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang// spos dang tsan dan rin po che thams cad kyi sbren dang/ rin po cha'ikadugs thams cad kyi sprin dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sgra dbyangs bzang bo yid du
'ong ba'i sprin dang ) nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer rgyu 'brang ba mang po'i sngon dang/ srin po tsho'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi sngon dang ) rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i
dang/ de lta bu dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon bar bsgrub pa'i sr-in bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mar de bzhin gshags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par phab bo// rjeltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ gzhi dang snying bo ma rtog ki rgyan gyis
brgyan pa'i 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang bo rdo rjes kyang/ mchod pa mngon bar bsgrub pa'i smin gyi ra de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu
rab tu phab par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang gzhan dang/ dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul
gyi sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan dang/ tshogs gzhan dang gzhan dang/ yang dag par bsgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan dang/ dga' ba'i shugs kyis spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dang/ phyogs
kyi tshul gzhan dang gzhan dang/ chos kyi tshul la 'ju'u ba gzhan dang gzhan dang ) de bzhin gshags pa'i yul dang byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang/ yul dang stobs la
'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang/ rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa khong du chud par byed do// 'di na ji
lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgya mcho'i nam mkha' dbyings skye mthAklas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin no// shin
tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal bo che shos bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba sta le'u dang po'o//
bam po drug ga/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sams par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyasakyi
sa ni jo lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji lta'u zhig mnga' ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la byin gyi rlabs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni ji lta bu zhig nga' ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
la sangs rgyas kyi mi bsnyangs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas
kyi rnam par 'phrul ba ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas
kyi mi 'phrogs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi smyanani ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas
rgyasAnani ji lta bu zhig mnga'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldar 'das rnams la sangs rgyus kyishas ni ji lta bu zhig ma'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni ji
lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni ji lta bu
zhig mnga' ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan dus la sangs rgyas kyi 'od ther ni ji lta bu zhig ma'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsungan ji lta bu zhig mnga'/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas gyi yo shes ni jilta bu zhig ma'/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
byang rlung sams dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rgya mtsho thams cad na ji
lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sams dpa' thams cad la
sha/ theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig du yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su//
ston byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu/
yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par shes ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la pha rol du phyin pa rgya mtsho
rnams ni ji lta zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam/
mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ma shes rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la yang thugs

sgyu brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang/ sams can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzod

grang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang/ sangs rgyas kyi pha rolatu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan ba mdzad srung/ saargyas kyi rnam par thar ba rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan mdzad grang/

[4/ ]sangs rgyas kyi rnams par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzadu grang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan ba mdzad grang/ sangs rgyas kyi shin tu bstan pa/

rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzadakrang/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang snyam pa dang/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs rgyas mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor kyi sngon de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo// mthal 'khas rgya chen
pasal par rab spyad de// byang chub shing drung rang byung yang ngag skyas// phye mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin gyur nga// de bzhin gshegs pas sku ni byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba a
lus kun kyi the tshom gcod// mos pa'i stobs ni a ngas pa rab tu bskyod// sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams cad 'god
byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul nyid// de bzhin gshags la lta zhing kun nas gnas// de dag bsam pa spyod yul ji bzhin du// bri rtsom bsal bar chos rnams rab bstan
gsol// rgyal ba kun gyi sa ni ji lta bu // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang// sangs rgyas byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med pa// de dag tshulani rnam dag bstan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs
pa'i spyod yul ci yis 'jug/ rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa dang// rgyas chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyang b// rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan
du gsol// sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang// mi bsnyangs chos nyid ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang// rdzu 'phrulam yang mtha' dang dbus mad pa// 'gro pa'i pas ra la6 rnams
bsgrag tu gsol// ji ltar chos rgyal bo khrang mnga' mdzad cing// rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang// sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgyan de dag kyang// thugs brtsarigud du [… ]byas 'du
tshu gsol// rgyal ba'i na ni ji ltar rtsod med cing// snyan dang shas dang de bzhin lngags dang sku/ sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' na sa pa// 'di dag tshul lta rangapadapa bsags/
zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar sems can khams// chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan du la so//
pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang// rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang// chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtshodag/ byang chub snying por thams cad bstan du gsol//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'i tsho byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ams kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ zhal gyi sgo tshims kyi mtshams/

kyig sob nas 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad rab tu bkye ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i khri ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya pa'i 'od zer dang ) 'di lta ste/ nyosakyi dbyings su

dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang ) 'di lta ste/ 'od shin tu phra ba'i sngon kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang ) 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdza

'phrul dang snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od brar dang ) 'di lta ste/ rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'di lta ste// rnam par snang bas chos kyi
dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od blar dang ) 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i rdo rje
drim mad pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sams dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang 'di lta ste ) sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i 'od bor dang/ de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshu na tu phra ba snyad kyi 'od brer rang du bkye ste/ 'od brar de dag re re zhing yang

'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phrab stod do// 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams tshakyi kha dog shin tu ston ma dag ste ) de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcur sas rgyas kyi zhing
gi la shin du phra ba snyad kyi 'jig rten khams rgya mchorab tu snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i dus yin phu snyad
kyi 'dzig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nas 'od zer gyi sgo de dag thams cad gyi mthus/ gzhi dang snying po ma rtog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'dzig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyisatshakas su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// bskal pa
rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad do// phyogs rnams mar sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod/ dasams canargya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas//
phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes// phyi rnams kun nas sprul pa'i san rnams 'gyod// des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas// byang nub sbyor pa chags med rnam
sgyu par dag/ srid pa'i rgyung na sngan chad 'khor ba'i rmi )rgyal bas sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa// de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bkrol// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha'
yas so// rgyan rnams sna tshogasakun du 'od kyang snang// byang chub shingani yal ga rin chen 'phyang// 'od rnams bkra ba kun du rnam par brgyan// byang chub bsam gyis ma khyab der sangs rgyas/
phyogs rnams kun tu sgrani rab tu sgrog/ sems can kun gyi sams bzhin ma byas te// snatshogs thabs kyi smonas rnam pa 'dul// de las chos nyid ti sgra rab tu 'byung// zhing rnams
stong gi rdul snyad sngamachad du// spyod tshe pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad// stobs rnams kun la sangs rgyas rab bzhugs kyis// rgyal ba de yi zhal ltar kun kyang deng/ zhing gi rdul snyad phyog
rnams thams cad nas// rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lhags// mchod pa sna tshogs ra ba rab 'bubs shing// thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon sum lta/ gsung dbyangs kacig las
mthar yas mdo yi rnams // rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston// 'gro kun yid bzhin chos kyi ra 'bab kyis// rkang gnyisagatso bo de la ltar yang deng// dus gsum rgyal ba'i smom lam
gang yod pa// skad cig blugs la de dag mngon sum ste// rgyal ba byang chub shing drung ston mdzad kyis/ rgyal ba'i drung du sgyur te 'dong bar gyis// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho//
'od zer kun gyi so nas rab tu snang/ de yachos nyid ji ltari 'dra de dag ltos// sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon sum chos ston de/ de'itshe 'dzig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas de bzhin
gshigs pa'i 'od zor kyis yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams / byang chub sems dpa'i rang rang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig du'adzakas da) bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa
rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su shar
[B/ ]phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dpal dri ma med par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'dzig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po
che'i 'phrang ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi
rakyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sngon bsdus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob ring son po'i
mar gyi 'od zer pad+mo'i sngon bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin kyis brlabs pa dang/ rin po che'i ri bo'i zomakyi smin b.rus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/
nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngon b.rus nam mkha' kun nas yog ra ra byin gyis brlabs pa dang ) rin po che'i ma tog gi 'phrang ba'i swan btus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i srin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang )phyi ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi h+phen bcus nam
mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ spos dang bdug m+mos kakhrugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog pa ra byin gyis brlabs/
pa dang/ spos thams cad shing gi sprin b.rus nam mkha'agan na yo ga da na byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dag lnga sogs pa mchod pa'i 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul rnyin tu phra ba
sad kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin du/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/ ma rton
snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sang ka'i dri mngon par sa 'a nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas ya nga 'jig rten kyi ranams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su
lho phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad snang bas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig
rtan gyi khams 'od mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyanan/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/
[91 ]@#// byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros shes bya babyang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan
[/]cig tu 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'bakas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur to/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i de
po'i sngon brnyas nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rdzong ring nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin dngus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po chen po ni 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sngon bsdus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i
rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i sprin btsus nam mkha' kun nas yog nga ra byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi ya ka
sna tshogs kyis snying po byang chub kyi rgyun byed pa'i sngon b.rus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po sgo kun nas mo ma'i'od zer dang sangs rgyas kyi
tshe/ sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sngon bsdus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ ma bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres par 'khor kyi dkyi 'khor du ka kas
brtan ston pa 'i sprinu bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor ngu'i rgyal po 'od 'apo shin tu sdug 'isgron nas ) sangs rgyas sa rud kyi yul rjes su
sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha'i kun nas yoka par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi[@]nga bas kyis mi khyab pa dang/ de ba[é]ra chag 2gas pa'i ku b+hal med
rang gi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i smin bdus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin kyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyal po ma dro chu sna tshogs kyi tshom kyis ris gsum
gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gajugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yoka par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de rag sogs pa nor kha'i rgyal porI 4 3 jig rman
kyi khams rgya mtsho'i rngal phra mo snyad kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing ) bcom ldan 'dang gung na nga dang nga ma de/ brtson 'dasad/ ga 'tshal nas/
lho phyogs su brtan de/ i nA nIl dang/ 'dzam bu nAd rang ) pad+ma ra ga sna tshokas kyi snying po can gyi sang gi'i khri man nga ra spal nas skyi mo krung nga cag 'khorda pa3gyur to
de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su nub phyogs na )'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rimaNo ri'i 'od yid du 'ong ba snang pa zhes bya de/ 'dzika rgyun gyi
@#// khams de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi stan yongs su 'byung ban/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes mngon dusnang ba'i yon tan bzhi bo ches brgyan pa'i 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya
mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dar 'a sa 'od 'phro ba'i rkyen zla ba'i 'od cas bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul kun tu phra ba med dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das
gdan ba der 'od bar gyur te/ rin po che dang/ spos dang/ me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngon gyis nam mkha'i kun nas yog par byin gyis slob cing nor bu'i
rgyal po kha dogamatha' yas btsun pa'i khang pa brtse gas pa'i sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rin po che'i sgronam dang sbos 'od 'phro ba'i khang pa brtsegA
pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas phag pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang 2 mu tig thams cad kyi khang pa brtse gas pa'i sngon bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
banubs pa dang/ na pa che thams cad kyi me tog ga ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i srin banus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ phan pa cha'a'aphreng bas
yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'phro ba'isange pa dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs
