pa rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin brnyes nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rin po che'atshon thams cad kyis rab tuparkyen nang rkyen dum yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa
brtsogs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ phyogs thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par kun tu rgyas par 'gangs pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa 'o sprin
bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dang/ dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'-i sngon bsus nam mkha' kun nas yog
par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtse gas pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shan tu phra ba sed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa
byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin ta/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brtenate/ seng ge'i khri rin po cha' pad+mo chen po lam sna tshogs gser las
byas pa'i sang bo can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chagasasu byang phyogs na/ 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba zlu pad+mo'o 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyirgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ut+pa la'arkyenan/ de bzhin
gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ga'i 'od zer snang bas ma 'byin/
pa'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu 'phagasanas/ bcom ldan 'adas gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ smyos dang
nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing/ sgo thams cad nas lo ma'i dog pa'i sbyin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing gi sbyin bcus nas
mkha'akun nas gu par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ shing ga gzugs thams cad las rgyun mtha' yas pa yongs su snyan pa'i shing ga sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
brlabs pa dang/ ma tog thams cad kyi sngunarab tu nar ba'i me tog gshing gi sngon bas nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i dekya'i 'khor
thams cad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'ishing gi sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ tsan dan gyi phye ma thams cad dad/ byang chub sems dpa'i
lus phyed yang dag par ston pa'i shang gi sprin bcus kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sngon gyi snying po byang chub kyirgyan bsam gyis ma khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shang gi sprin
bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos kyi mdzod kyi nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sbya dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i shang gi sngon bsus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de
dag la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der phyin te/ bcom
ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su bstan te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i pad+mo'ising po can mngonapar stsal nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas

yang 'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung dang shel gyi kha dog tshon gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
yod da/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi sang pon/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshos thams cad la ma 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs
pa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzodam thad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'thags nas/ brnyem ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur ta/ seng ge'i khri rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i
pad+mo'i snying po can gyi spran bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing/ seng ge'akhronor bu'i rgyal bo kun tu mngon pas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sngon bcas
nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ seng ge'i khro rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi spyan bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
brlabs pa dang/ seng ge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba' snying po can gyi sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ seng ge'awaM
phyogs kun nas 'phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i skang pa can gyi sngon bsus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyie brlabs pa dang/ sangaga' khri skyes kyi me tog pad+mo' 'phreng ba rin po
che thams cad kyisAde pa can gyi sngon bsus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dad/ seng ge'i khra sangs rgyas kyigadan thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par sonapa' nor bu'i
skyol po'i song pa can gyi sprinebatsus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ seng ge'i khri rkyen dang 'phreng ba thams cad 'phyang zhing rta babs dang stegs bus rab tu brgyan
pa'i snying po can gyi spyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ seng ga'i khru shing thams cad kyi yal ga las nor bu rin po che dang phyi ma 'byung ba'i sAng po can gyi sbyin
bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sang ge'i khri spyis dang rin po cha'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyanang ba tu mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying
bo can gyi sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa seng ge'i khro'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyis nam mkha'
kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/ seng
gi ba khri nor bu rin po che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par stsal nas skyel mo krung bcas te 'a khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams
rgyatsho'adi deng 'dab chags su shar dang lho'i phyogasamatshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba zlumu' 'od zer kun tu snang ba gsar gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams sdes kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba na/ de bzhinegashegs pa kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dekyil 'khor rgya mtshonas/
byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun tus sgenama'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dbang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyad dang lhan/
cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang//
rin po che in+d+he nA la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla ri'asprin bcusanamamakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ gos rin po che'i bar thams cad kyi sngon bcus namamakha'
rdzo kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rin po che 'od 'bro ba sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re'i sngone bcus nam mkha' kun s yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas
kyi rdzu 'phruladang/ 'od dang/ sgra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i spron bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu dang/ gos dad/ rgyan thams cad gzugs
brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i spyin bcusanam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ me tog thams cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bu re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas/
yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bu re'i sprin btsusanam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ pad+mo'i dra ba mtha' yas
bsna tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gyi bla re'i spron banus nom mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ gser gyi za ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i spyin bcus nam
mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rgyan bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i gzugs b.rAn rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla re'i sngon bcus nam mkha' kun nas
yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa bu re'i sprin 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho'i rjel shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten taM/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo sna tshogs rin po ches rab tu brgyan/
pa'i snying bo canamangon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshamasan/
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ma' 'od rab tu 'bar bas kun nas snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng ge ltar
snang ban/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyekun nas yi shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas// byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'bro gtsug
dpudarab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong
bar gyur te/ sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyis+san bcus namamakha' kun nas yog ra byin gyis rlob cing/ 'od zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi
gdugs kyi sprin banus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ mu tig mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi spyan bcusanam mkha' kun nas thog par
byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo nas rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi spron banus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
pa dang/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sngonebacus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rin po che'i tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od
kyis rab tu brgyan cang dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i gdugs kyi spyan gcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs
kyi spyane bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i sde pa'i gdugasakyi sngon bsus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
[/]pa dang/ spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi spyan bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang tsan dan gyi phye ma mang pos kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs
kyi sngon bcusanam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pas kun tu rgyan gyis khyab par byed pa' gdugs kyi sbyin brnyes nam mkha'
kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
blob pa byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri in+d+ra nI la yid du 'ong
bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi steng pe can dag mngon par sprulanas skal chu krung bcas te 'bod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su nub
dang phyad ga phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi kham rgya mtsho na po che'o 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyisnying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rtan gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las
'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med ba'i 'od nga zhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems
bya// dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid ma zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten bya khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags taM/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dekya'i 'khor gyi snyanabacus nam mkha' kun nas yog bar byin gyis bsung/ na po che 'od 'thu ba'i
btsagazugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi spron bcusanam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ me tog gi sbyin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkya'i 'khor gyi spyin bcus
nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i bod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
pa dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyir 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyisabarlabs pa dang/ rin po che'i yal
lha ga' sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu slog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che ba zlumu'i rigs kyi
'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngon brnyas nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs ba dang/ sems skad cig gis sems canamatha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil
'khor gyi spyan bcas nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis bzubs pa dang/ sangs rgyas nyams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin
bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par ban gyis brlabs pa dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgro skyag pa/ nor bu'a'od kyi dkyil 'khon gyi stan bcus
nam mkha' kun nas phag par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed kyi nam mkha' kun
nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ seng ga'i
khri 'od zer 'bar ba ma zad pa'i gza brjid kyi snying po can dag mngonapar sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas tu 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang
'dab chags su 'ogag phyogasan/ 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho paN+Di dri zhim dpal rgya snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams na
bo che'aseng ge snang zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyangs snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor bya dkyil 'khor rgya maMtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos/
kyi dbyis su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu khrab snyed dang lhan ci'i tu
'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi spyin bcus nam mkhab kun nas yig par byin gyis rlob cing/ skyes thams cad kyi 'od
zer gyi srin bcus nam mkha' kun nas phag par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rin po che'i 'od 'brob thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi ne bcus nam mkha' kun nus yog par byin gyis brlabs
pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyichos thams cad brjod pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi spyone bcus nam mkha' kun nas khog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rkyen gyis rnam
par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas dog par byin gyisabarlabs pa dang/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi spran bunus nam mkhu ba kun
nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ bskal pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung zhingesems can yongs su smin par bya ba brjod pa'i 'od zer
ga sgron bcu/nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rin pe che zad mi shes pa thams cad dang/ me togo thams cad kyi ze pa'i 'od zer rgya spron bcus nam mkha' kun/
nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa 'od zer gyi sbyin bcus 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul Tin tu phra ba skyed kyi nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa
byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'og gi phyogasu brtenanA/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'asgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag
mngon par sprul nas skyale mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po ma tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di deng 'dab chags su steng gi

phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu mtsho ni lu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bod rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan yid du 'ong
ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang grags pa thogs pamed pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal bo lozhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas//
byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i bya bres shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'a phagos nas/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'ispyani banus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing/ nor bu rin po che kun
nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sngon bcusanam mkha' kun nas gog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen bos rnam par snang bar 'od
'bro ba'i sbyin bcus namamakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sa thams cad 'phro ba'i sngon bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/
rgyan thams cad 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sbyin bcus nam mkha'
kun nas 'dog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ shing dang ze ba rnam pa sna tshogs su bod 'bro ba'i sprin bcusanam mkha' kun nas dgo par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rdo rje snya
tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sngon brnyas nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa brjod cing 'od 'phro ba'i
sprin bcusanam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i sbyin bcuanam mkha' kun nas yogo bar byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dag la sogs
pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdulashani tu phra ba nyid kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pakhyed ming/ bcomaldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das
la phyag 'tshalanas steng gi phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri sangs rgyasakyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//
de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phrub snyedanas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu rdul
shun tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba sad kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'

re re zhing ya nga rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i spyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cade 'ongs par gyur te/ phyin nas
gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dgamangon par sprul cing/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur te// 'khod pa'i sa la

byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi bskya'i khung bu thams cad re re nas/ 'od zer gyi spranerin pe cha thams cad ltar kho dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed rab tu

byung bar gyur to// rin po che ra da' nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' seng ga'i khri pad+ma'i snying po can la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi khamasarkya mtshobacu'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid rab tu byung bar gyur to//
byang chub sems dpa' de res kyang chos kyi dbyinges kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi skyabs gang bar byas nas/ tshul shin tu phra ba re re la yang zhing//
'byam kus pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad du rab tu 'jug par gyur to// zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyasabcom ldan 'das thams cad mthong zhing shes par/
gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dganas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi
skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo dganas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to//
sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyi zhing 'byam kus pa thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam pa

'phrul pa'i sge dag nas yang dag par skulab byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho'i rdul shan tuphro bsnyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par

[te]/ bya ba dang/ smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tubasgrug pa'i skye dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyiskad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba med kyi 'gro ba
thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag rnam par bstan cing brjod pa'i sgo gnas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho'i rngul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sngon thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings snang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'amathu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems/

kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang/ 'od thams cad kyi skyidag nas

yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' kun
tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can rnams kyibasam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par/
bya@#/ skul ba byed rung/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam kyis pa dag tu bdal te/ zhing re rer yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song
gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni reb tu zhi bar byed do// sems can phyin ci log la des zar rab kyi rdul shin tu phra bsed na yang dag par nges par phung pa la rab tu 'god do// sems
cha'i reb kyi rdulashin tu phra ba med na dge ba dang/ yid du 'ong bu dang/ mthe ris su skye ba 'a rab tu 'god do/ sems can bdeb kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun gros dang/ rang sangs rgyas
sa la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phru bsadan dge ba'i bshes gnyin bkur bab besadanams kyi tshogs la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ra rab kyi

rdulashin tuphra ba nying na sngon chad mkhaskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed byang chub sems dpa'is phyir mi ldog pa/
yang dag par 'thob pa la yang dag par skul lo// zhing de dag nga rar yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi smyanachos thams cud kun nas snang
zhing gzigs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba sad stobs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang ye shes kyi tshogs

[z/ ]zad mngeshes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'asmon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba nyid de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par snang mdzod kyi gdung dang brgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thog
cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to// 'od zer thums cad snyanas sgra 'byung ste// jisnyed byang chub spyod par 'jug pa dang// rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod bgi/
dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkabazhang sgrogo/ bskal pa rgya mtshor skye med spyad pa spyod// sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grel kyang// yade la skyo med zhum pa gang yang med//
'di yi tshul la rgyal sras rab tu zhugs// chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab dacing// tshul 'dir bskul pa rgyu mtsho zad par byed// mtha' med dbus med lhag ma gang yang med/
de dag chos nyid zhi pa rab tu sgrog/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa// rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan don du// de dag thams cad ma lus yongs su sbyong// du dgaspyod pa'i rgyan ni 'das
'dra 'o// rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor du dar phyin te// phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing// rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho'i blo gros can// de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra
'o// 'od zer sgo rnams re rer mtha' yas pa'i// bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug/ spyod pas mig ni kun nas yongs dug ste// rgyal sras de dag spyod yul
'di yin no// skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab gnas shing// zhung rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang// sems can rnams la 'jigs par ma byed de// sa 'di rnam dag tshul 'chang dag
gi'o// tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis ma khyabalus// de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul// skad cag sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang// rgyan 'di sems la chags med rnams
kyi 'o// dus gsum bskal pa gang yod ma lus par// skad cig gcigags thams cad rab i tu ston// sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med// de 'dra'i tshes nyid chags med blos
rtogs so// bzang po' spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams // 'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus// rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te// 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang
sgrog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dba'i mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa b+hob par bya

tsho ba'i phyir/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chen de byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang bas phyogs rnams par sten pa'i skade bo zhes bya ba rab tu bkya'o// 'od zer rin po che thams

cad kyi kha dogasgronama'i sprin du 'dral pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas/ tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'dum klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te/ phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho

rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas/ sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang par byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams cad rab tu bskyed pa'i
rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba sud rdul shan tu thu ba thams cad dang mnyam pa dag tu skyes nas/ sems
can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mes pa ji lta bu rgya mtsho dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sngon gyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa phab ste/
dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas 1 sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa ji
bzhin du 'byung pa dang mthun pa'i sbyin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sngon gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar phrad pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+mo
bya@#// chen po chu ba 'an po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa/ nang rim nor bu'i rgyal bo'amadzod snatshogs las byas pa// lo ma ran po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'bebs/
pa ze pa'i 'phreng pa'i rgyan spos rin po che thams cad las byas pa/ snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par byas pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnamapar dgasung
'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i sngon dang ldan pa// rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba/ sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa many+dza' yas pa ston pa'i sgra rab
tu 'byung ba/ nor bu ba rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sngon gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dang 'i skyed pa dang/ smon lam/
thams cad du rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo// patsho chen po de byung ba'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs shes
bya ba: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar dus
phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ pad+mo chen po de'i sade ba la 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu
phra ba med pa de dag kyang the pa'i 'phreng ba de dag la 'khod de// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshes thams cad la kham pa med pa 'dabyangs chos kyi de byanges rgya che zhing tshad
pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs pa shAms cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i yi shes can/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyisku rgya mtsho bsam gyis ma khyab pa la
rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dad ldan pa/ zhing 'byam kus pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phun nga/ ba stsathams cad las sprul pa'i sngon zad mi shes pas
kun tu khebs par byed pa/ sems kyi skad ha'og thams cad la dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi debs kun tu bsgyur ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par byed pa ste
spyod yul rgyas rnam par spyod pa// phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhan gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlangs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing/ phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i
mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa ! sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dad chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang ldan pas de bzhin gsha
pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ sa ngas rgyas sku ni chos kyi dbyangs kyis
gsal// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba mngon sum ste// ji ltarams pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas// sAng po byang chub de la rgyal ba bzhugs// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran
da kya// rgyal bas rtsa kun la rab bzhugs te// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyis kun nas bstod// kun kyang bzang ba'asong ba mchog yin/ makas par 'khe
byang chub snying par pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang ste// sbya rnams kun la rnam par 'phrul pa ston// zhing rnams re re dag na rab bzhugs shing/
zhing rnams 'byam kus kun turgyas mdzad pas// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sbyin gyi rnams // kun kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dong// zhinge rnams kun gyi rdul phran mtshog nyid kyi//
byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du lta bar 'dong// chos dbyings 'byam kus rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan
rab tu ston// chos dbyings rdul rnams yashes spyod yul can// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung// byang chub sems dpa'
ya shes mchog yul can// chos sprin nyan cing rab tu mkhas pa'i rnams // sangs rgyas kun bya 'khor rnams kun n gnas// zhing rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod// rgya
[j]mtsho'i tshos la rnam par snang bar spyod// de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtshor zhugs// sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba// de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sa ngos
rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag shes// sangs rgyas tshes kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing// de dag rnam 'phrul rtsa chen kun la zhugs// zhing rnams
kun gyi rdul phran mang snyed kyi// lus kyi spyanen rtag par rab tu ston// sems can kun bkod 'od kyis kun la skyob// bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs// da
nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltasate/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
sangs rgyas ye shes shinatu zab// dus rnams kun tu de 'byung ste// tshes dbyings thugasasu chud pasan// 'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// 'dres pa med
cing gnas ba med// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong// chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas// chos rnams kun la rab tu bzhugs//
thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// zhing rnams kun n rnam par madzes// kha dog bsam snye ma khyab par// sems can thams cad yade bzhin du// sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang//
de bzhinasku pa sbyin kyang mthong// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag las// ma zad sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rnams // zhing rnams kun tu rab sgrogatsang// chos kyi rgya mtshoshin tu ston/
[/ ]stsa rnams re re kun nas kyang// phyogs bcu bod zer dra ba dag/ sangs rgyas gsungani rab 'byin cing// gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas// sgra dbyangs
zab mo rtag tu 'byung// sangs rgyas yon tanargya mtshon// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' dang dbus med rab tu bskor// yashes zab mos
shes bya ba// rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing// yang dag sangs rgyas ston pa
mdzad// sku rnams re re kun las kyang// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam pa// sangs rgyas sems can ma kun byung zhing// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// denas byang chub sems dpa'
tshos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyimathus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'atshatshigs su bcad pa 'di degasmras so// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab par// sangs
rgyas skrun rnam par madzes// rgya chen gsung ni rab byung ba// zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu sgrog/ 'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug pa'i// 'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes// 'gro ba kun gyi
[zo ]bsam mkhyenang// byin gyi rlabasani rab tuston/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun lamangon// sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin// thams cad gzagis bas sangs rgyasakyi// rnam par 'phrul
pa thams cadu mthong// many+dza' yas 'od mnga'asangs rgyas sprin// chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang zlog/ ye shes rnam rgyu'i tshul bzhin du !/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug/ 'jug pa rnamasaM
la 'byung ba med// 'byung ba yod par rnam par bstan// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yake/ chos rnams 'byung ba nam mkha' bzhin/ 'bo dang gnas pa ma mang 'aste// 'on kyang
rgyal bo kun nu snang
sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las byung// de phyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod// yul na bzhugs med rang bzhin med// de la 'byung ba mamanga' ste// sku dang mtshan
kyang de bzhin med// rgyal ba gzugs b.ran 'dra ba 'o// 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin// bsam pa kun la rab tu byung// yang dag sangs rgyas rnam kun tu// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul
khamadzod// 'jigartan khams rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun n snang// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad na// zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes// sangasargyus kun gyi sku dag la//
rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di degasmras so// bsam gyis ma khyab sas rgyas sar// byang chub sems dpa'i
gang bzhugs pa// de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad mthong// ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams // zhing kun rdul kyi sbubs su yang// de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad dang// bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo// gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung// kun tu byin gyi rlabs rnams dang// rnam
par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang// spyod pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa// de dag zhing rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong// kun tu
mnyam pa nyid gyur cing// kun tu lus kyis rab gnas te// ya shas lus kyi rjes song na// sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas pa shes zhugs pa'o rnams // chos kyi
dbyangs la rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag tu// rgya mtsho'i zhing la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu// phyin gyi rlabs rnams rab bstan pas// gzhan dang gzhan
gyi lus dag dang// ming gis kun na rab tu gnas// byang chub snying po'i rnam 'phrul dang/ byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya shing// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag/ skad cig sems kyis
[z/ ]ston bar byed// zhing rnams 'byam kyis thams cad dang// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams // skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston// sa sa
rgyas zhing rnams thams cad na// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams // sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang// mtha' ma nad par ma rung ngo// de nas byang chub sems
dpa'aseng ge' 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi ban gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'atsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyu/
rnam par snang mdzad kyi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyang// sangs rgyas sngon gyis mngon du yog/ 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho dang//
phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa// thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'khor// de ni smon lam rnam 'phrul ba'o// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// gzhan dang gzhan gyi mang dag gis// zhing rnamA
gnas pa kun tu yang// chos kyi 'khor la kun tu 'khor/ 3 rnam par snang mdzad byin gyis brlobs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag/ brjod cing/
zhing rnams kun tu 'byung// zhing kun rdul la sku pa rnams // thams cad ches char rab tu 'bebs// 'dres pa med cing 'byungab med// 'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes// bskal pa bye
bgrongs med par// 'ang kun rdul phran sprubs dag tu// rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung// sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrog/ zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi//
'od zer dra ba phyogs brnyan// sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sgo nas// byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul// kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis// chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal ta/ 'gro rnams
'dul ba ji bzhin du// gzugs kyaskur yang rab tu mthong// dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi// mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams // de dag kun gyimatshon kyang sgrog/ sa sa rgyas
rnam par 'phrul la ltos// da ltar byung dang 'dus pa dang// sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa// de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu grags// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod ma zad pa'areng la rgya gzi bde mar mes/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di
gsas so// gang gis byang chub sems dpa' yi// ye shes tshogs 'di kun non cing// ye shesartogs pa rnyed pa'i rnams // de dag 'di yi tshul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyis dang mnyam
ba'i dbyas// zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te// byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod// skad cig rara'i sems pa kun la// chos kyi dbyang sau rnam par
rgyu de bzhin nyid la gnas shing rtan// chosa rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs// rgyan gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag tu// zhing
rnams kun n gnas shing skyed// rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang// chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung// zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed// ye shes chags med spyod yul la/ sangs
rgyas thamand spyod yul du// lus pa med par kun bakang zhing// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam spyod pas// sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes bsnyags dbyangs//
chos kyi dbyas na rab sgrogs pa// chos dbyingasardzas su shes pa'i rnams // dbyangs kyi mtsho rnams la spyod// bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par// sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu zlog/ dus
rnams thams cad shes pas gsal// dbyangs kyis de dag sa la zhugs/ spru yapeshes la rmongs pa med// sems can sgra yang spyod yul te// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang/ rnam par
'phrul pa'i dbyangs shes so// sa nas sar yang phyin gyur cing// stobs kyi sa la rab gnas te// bskal pa bye ba spyad pas na// chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug/ denas
byang chub sems dpa' la shes kyi 'od zer shis rab kun nas sgron ma 'ablo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byinamyas brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag smras so// gang la sas rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid med// ye shes sa ni thob pa'i rnams // 'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong// shes rab
snang ba'i ku 'od can// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams // sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi lang// sa ya rnamapar 'phrul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyad cing//
tshalus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste// thob me'angos rnams rtogs gyur nas// smon lam dag gis yang dag byung// bsod nams rgya mtshos byung gyur cing/ 'phashes sa la rnam par gnag/
tshes la rnam sbyong khong du chud// skyed bko mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag tu// chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na// rang bzhin
lus na rab tu mthong/ dazhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad du// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// thams cad gajigs pa'i chos kyi rnams // rgya mtsho kun la rab tu spyod//
bdag mthong ba'ani lus dang rdul// gcig tu 'dres par mngon par byas/ ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste// zhing rnams kun tu'ang rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam mthun/
par/ sems can kun la mngon gsum du// lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing// byang chub don du sems can 'dul// sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yis na// byang chub sems
dpar brjod pa ste// gang gis mthon po mthong ba yi// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs shin tu zab// mgon po ji snyed gang bzhugs pa'i// byin rlabs mag+ga' dang dbung med do// chos dbyings rab tu gdu byas nas//
byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'tshang rgya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'bro gtsug phud rab tu 'byung bas// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur/
rnam par bltas te/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di degasmras so// zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas kyi/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te// chos kyi denges rnams gang byas nas// yon tan spran ni
rab tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba sta// gzugs kyi sku yang rab bstan cing// chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug// dag dang mos pa'i shugs rnams dang//
sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la// rad tu gnas shing de dgan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi shes 'jug/ shes rab chung dus tshes 'di dag/ kun nas shes par mi nus te// ye shes
mig ni rab sbyangs shing// 'di yi tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs dang// chos kun rnam par spyad pa dang// rab tu 'jug dang ldan pa yi// mnyam pa nyid la rab
tu zhugs// chos rnams mtha' yas gling gi rnams // chos kun mtshan nyid rnams la ste// kun mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs shing// chos kyi rgya mtsho kun la spyod// sangs rgyasazhing na
kun 'akhod cing// thams cad kun n rnam par mdzes// 'ongs pa med cing 'thos pa med/ sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o// gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'i sku rnams nidi/
sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang// mes pa su 'dra yod pa'i rnams // de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang// spyod pa mang po sus sbyangs pa// de dag tham
cad ba spu la'ang// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong// lus kyi rnams na re res kyang// chos kyi dbyangs rnams kun tu khyab// 'khor la kun n 'khor ba ste// chos kyi 'khor la bsam mi
khyab de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid ma zad pa'i rgyal pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyasaso// sangs rgyas skun thams cad nas// 'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur// kha dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od// sems can bsam pa kun la 'phro/ !
sangs rgyasazhing rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul ta// 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes// thams cad rdul na'ang ma 'dres
par/ 'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du// zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu ston// zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i klong// phyogs kyi rnams kyang
0/ kun tu gnon// zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag/ in+d+hanA lar kun nas gnas// spyi'u tshugs dag dang sbel zhi dang// pad+mo'i dbyibs dang khyad khyud dang// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i
khyad par du// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tuganas// chos kyi dbyings rnams gar phyin par// thug pa med par gram 'dal ba// du dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su// shin tu bstan pa'i
chos 'byung ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na// 'khod pa'i zhing rnams bsam ma khyab/ de dag kun tu chos nyid 'di// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston// tha dad med pa'i chos
kyi dbyanges// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// gcig ga tshul ga rnam pa yis// chos bstan pa na kun tu 'byung// sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// tshul rnams thams cad rab
tu brjod// dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis// ma zad tshul rnams rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na yang// rgyal ba rnams ni mig yor 'drar// sang pa byang chub rnams na
snang: 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min/ da nas byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byang ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i rmi tshags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blta zhing blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams // skugazugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dga' ba rgya mtsho
thubya// kun kyang 'byung// chos kyi shugs ni reb tu 'al// mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams // phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu byung// rdul rnams kun tu 'jug pa yis//
sangs rgyas spun kyang de bzhin bstan// skad cige skad cigasems kun la// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun n snang//
'tsha byang chub sems dang bshes rab che// rgya mtsho chos las 'byung ba rnams // sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// 'di yi yul la rnam par sbyod// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la//
gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa// de dang de rnams zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun la lta// yod pas zab mo rnam gnon cing// chos kyi dbyangs la gzhol ba ni// mos pa rgya
mtsho shes pa ste// smon lam kun rgyas byung ba 'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung// chags pa med la rab tu zhugs// byed pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// spyod yul kun kyang
khong du chud// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing// ye shes spyod yul gyur pa'i rnams // chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis gnon to// skad cig sems kyisazhing
ga rnams // sangs rgyas zhing gyi rdul mnyam pa// de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du// rdul gcig steng du rnam par sbyong// zhing rnams jinyid thams cad na// zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa
chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa'i rnams // zhing gnug tu nu sdud pa byed/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi
byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ [”]tsA'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du// de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung// dbyas kyi yan
lag kun rgyas pa// chos kyi sprin rgya cher 'bebs so// brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis// sems can kun gyi skad dag tu// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang// chos rnams bstan
pa rab tu 'byung// zhing rnams kun tum lus par// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mthong zhing// sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang// byang chub mchog phyi'i kun kyang 'jug/ rdul
rnams re re'i steng nas kyang// chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun pakang zhing// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed// chos kyi sku ni tha dad sprin// nam mkha'i
bzhine tu chags pa med:/ gzugs kyi skur na rnam dmags pa// mig yor snang pa'i mtshan nyid do// mag don pu la ma gnas te// nam mkha' bzhin du dngos po med// mnyam pa//
nyid 'di rtogs gyur na !/ ye shes rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te// gzung ba med nyid byung pa med// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs// gzung du med la/
! @#/// 'du bstan to// zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams // de dag spu gtsug rtse la tshogs// ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis// sa rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong//
rnam par snang mdzod smon lam ste// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing// bla med chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor// ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par// su rtsa gcig

tu rnam sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang// dre ya mtha' na rnyed par dka'// ji ltar gling bzhi po 'di'i de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying bo byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub

sams dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa de rar yang/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu/

byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams rgya mtsho bya ba'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to// 'dun ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub de
bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu sten te// shin tu rgyas pa chen po' mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
las de bzhin gshagu pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/// bam po bdun pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri pado'i snying po can de de la 'dug ste// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mgrus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams nad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i sang/
po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par btegs pa'i tshogs nam mkha' dbyinges chags pa med cing/ rgya che

ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i gling mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su sa bshing/ shin tu bdal ba'itshogs chos thams cad kyi sgo'i dbyanges ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yad dag
par 'byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa// phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nas yog par byas par Mrang bzhin gyi sange pa can dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas

'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i klong/ phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon du yang dag par ston pa// sangs rgyas thams cud kya stobs dang rnam bar
tharo pas byang chub sems dpa'i lo shes kyi 'as rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sange bo con/ zhing 'byam lus pa thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang
ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su grub bar byed pa/ bskal pa thams cad du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
byabyadu/ cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sten cing rjod pa'i don gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi

drung du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzinasangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku' snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum
klas pa// chos kyi dbyangs kyis smras pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' gtugs pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khams su gtogs pa// dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i ris su gtogs pa// shin tu phrazhingabasgrubs pa med pa dang/ phyogs rgya pa chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams
mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par non pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gziges pa// sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chud pa// chos kyi dbyings sangs rgyas kyi sku
thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi

mo rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa dag tu rdul phra mo re re la'ang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid la rab tu zhugs nas/ zhing re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ tid de 'dzin sangs
rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod kyi sku'i nang pa zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting

pa'adzinaangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnamapa 'asnyad mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam kus pa thams
cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal te 3 rigs kyi bu khyod de
ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzinasangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi su'i sad po 'di la mnyam par gzhog pa legs so 'gas se// kye rgyal ba'i
bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshags pa 'di dag thams cad kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod 'di'i sngon gyismon lan gyi byinagyi rlabs dang/ khyod kyi
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam dang/ spyod pas yongs su dag pa' yang mthus 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dbye ba dang/ chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus par snyang bar bya ba dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun
nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rnam par dag par bya ba dad/ tshogs pa med par 'jig rtan gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su gnon pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad
la chags pa med par 'jug par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dud/ chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
yongs su gzung ba dang/ chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par blta ba dang/ sems can gyi dbang bo rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i yi shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa larab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes
kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshothams cad 'jig/
pa dang 'dul ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyangs 'byam kus pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa 'di/ shes kyang ta bar bsgrubs so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gyur pazab

ma tha ma dad pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rang tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang lta bar
bsgrubs so// sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi shes kyang rtsubar bsgyugs se// 'ge can gyi khams mang bo thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi
byis thams cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang ltabar bsgrubs so// sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi gna' ge dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la ta bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu ba snyed na lus
'khod pa thams cad la yang lta ba'i bskyabs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos ni thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul

pa'isangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa// 'od zer gyi 'dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shin tu rgyas da/ 'od kyi dekyil 'khor rnam
bukla// par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa/ pe cha 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa// phyogs thams cad du skyes 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi bod kyis rnam par snang ba// /

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba yang dag par ston pa// byang chub sems
dpa' 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par ston pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i
snang ga yang dag par ston pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba rnams brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go/ 'dir ji lta

ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongasan yod pa thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyidrung dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang bo'i
spyi bo la phyagargya mtsho'i spun rnams rab tu bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras de dag gis reg ma thag tu/ denas de'i mod la ting nge 'dzin de las ldang

ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid dus gsum thams cad du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang/ ting nga 'dzin
las ldang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyas dang/ dus gsum du mnyam pa'i rdu thams cad kyi skyed nga/ sangs rgyas kyi zhinge 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung
ba thams cad kyi sde dang/ sems can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang mnyam zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang mang gi
'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang/ sems can phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du chos kyi de byings rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo dang/ rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sngon
mtha' dang dbus med par 'byam kus pa'i sgo dang/ chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas langs bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pa ting nge 'dzani de

las langs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so so re re zhing ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sngon 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba med la rab tu zhugs par gyur to//

bzus rgya mtsho'i sngon 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba ser la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shan tuphru ba snyad la yang

rab tu zhugs par gyur to// so yang dag bar dge pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sbyi'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs b.ragyur to// spyod brgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams
mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi dbyangs kyi phyogs su rnam par snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chu shes snang ba'i yon tan gyi

sange byecan rgya mtsho'i sngon 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa ba stobs dang ya shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sngon

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'arje shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la zhing gzhan dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi

khamasargya mtsho'i rdul shin tu sba ba snyadal yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re ra zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba dang/ 'byung ba dang// byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang

mya ngan las 'das ba bstan pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul na tu phra ba snyad la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'di'i ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dzage rtenagyi khamasargya mtsho thams cad na yang/

dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang/ rdul nyan tu phra ba thams cad kyi khongs na yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi
mthu dang byang chub sems dpat+ta kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos de rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bgalangs tsam du gsos te/ rin po che/

thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu grag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal pa
chen ba bcu spron gyi rgyas mngon par bab par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal bon tshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo//
'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sngon gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i phyogs bcur ran po cha'i 'khor lo rab tu'agrems pa'i sAn gyi
char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying pat+taneg char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal pa sangs rgyas thun

cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor 'a rab tu sgrigapa'i sprin rgya cher mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing sang bo byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i spyan gyi char mngon
bar bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rkyal pa phyogs bcur snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sngon gyi char mngon nga ra bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyu son

tan gyi 'khor lo dang mkhru rab tu grag bar byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po ti me'adebal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi cher mngon par bub bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i
rgyal po rol ma'i spyi yid du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sngon gyi char mngon par bab ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sbyin bya cher bcu bo 'di dag mngon bar bab bar gyur to
de bzhin gshegasapa thams cad kyi ba stsa' sbe thams cad dang/ 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun n kun/
tu bzang po de// pad+mo yid du 'ong la rab tu 'dug pa mthong// kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra sten byed pa// ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med do// lus rnams thams cad nas
kyang kun tu bzang po de// sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gangs// ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam 'phrul ba// thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa med pa rgya chen sgrog/
ting 'dzin thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyirnam 'phrul gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag tu// rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te// zhing rnams kun tu rnam
par 'phrul pa mang po ston// zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung ji bzhin du// de ltar zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran la// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston// rnam par
snang mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs// kun tu bzang de'i lus ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// thams cad zhing la ma gnas de bzhin nyid la gnasaM// lus kyi sbyin na 'gro ba kun dang mnyam
par kun bkye zhing// sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin dude dgaston// sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus med kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams // kun tu/
bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la bstan// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dbus med pa// tshad med thams cad lus kyi nang
du kun chub rung// dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'tshang rgya ba sten// skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin stono// zhing rnams thams cad 'byas klas pa na rnam gnas shing//
rnam par 'phrul pa dam par ston par rab tu snang// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod// kun tu bzang bo de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes
stobs la zhugs// ting 'dzin san tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu gnon// chos rnams 'byam klas gzhan dang gzhan la rang du zhugs// rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngan chad sbyad pa ston// de ltar/
zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul ba// phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab bstan// ting 'dzin rnams la 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon
tan legs sgra 'byung/ da nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sas rgyas kyi sa thus thal mo sbyar to// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la lta zhing dbyangs kyi nga
daro gcig tu de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgastsas so// rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste// smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu byung/ de bzhin dmag nam mkha'
snying bo ste// chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la bzhugs med kyang// kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun nasnang// phyogs bcu kun tu yon tan gas pa khyab//

ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'// rgyal ba thams cad sku thob phyir spyod pa// phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod ba rnams // rdul sbubs kun tu de dag chud byas shing// zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu
mdzes// zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa dang// chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa'i rnams // rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang//
rgyu chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis khyab byas shing// zhing rnams 'byam kyis kun la shin tu zhugs// sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing/ rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su zhugs// chos
kyi dbyang g la de ltar zhugs nas kyang// rtul phun kun la ma zad tha na dad// nam mkha'i dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing// rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston// yon tan rgya mtsho'od kun

gzhal du med// rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin// 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing// rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston// gang gi don dubaskal pa rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' yas
'a nibazang po' skyed spyad ba// de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod// zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang// stobs bcu rnamasakyad ji
ltal 'byung 'gyur dang// sems nyan rgya mtsho ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba// sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gtong zhing ston// 'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang// kun tu bzang po khyod la
mngon sum gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar gyur pa ya/chos kyi 'khor le derang khyod kyis bskor// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phul go cha zhes bya ba las// kun tu bzad
pa'i tide de 'dzin dang rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o/// denas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par bltas/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtshol rnam par bltas/ chos kyi dbyangs rgya mtshol rnam par bltas/ sems can thamasacad kyi shes rgya mtsho la rnam par
bltas/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang bo rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam bar bltas/ dus rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtshol rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyirnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpacha 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa/
byabya/ 'thoms cad la smras pa/ kyirgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du zhing 'jig pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes nibasam

tha gyi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byang ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pan bsam sam khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyis kyi tshul rgya
mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i yi shes nabasam gyis ma khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbazhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstanabab pa shes
bsam gyis ma khyab de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtshornam nga ra dgod pa ba ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
bsam pa dang/ dad pa dang/ dbang po rgya mtshol 'jug pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la dus thams cad kyi
mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa' ya shes
ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes na bsam gyis ma khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdas rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa/
0 rab tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisas rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pan bsam gyis ma khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mgra' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba na bsam gyis ma khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis tshan dang dpe byad bzang po longs su dag pa ngasam gyis
mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho'

dogasna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ses rgyas kyi rupal rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis
mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs myukyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'khrub pa ni bsam gyis ma khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi
cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum po ngas su bstan pas/ sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzod pa dang/ gdul ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi gdul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni bsam gyis ma khyab bo// sangs rgyas chom ldan 'das rnams kyi sas rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni bsam gyis khyab bo// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi da bzhin gshags pa'i yul la 'jug lan bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni bsam gyi mi khyab bo//

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba na bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la sgrub pa med pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
zlo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mibasnyangs pa zil gyis ma non pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nga 'dzin la tha mi dad par spyod pa ni
bsam gyis ma khyab 'o// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis ma khyab 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga'
chen bo'i yo shasarnam par dag pa ni bsam gyis ma khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'phrogs pa na bsam gyis mi khyab ya lta/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
rja kyi mthu dang/ de bshun gshags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pas/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin
gshags pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam bar 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang/ bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhung rjes su bsab bo dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang/ sams can thams cad kyi dad pa rgya mtsho dang
pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa dar/ sams can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi tshes kyi tshul kun tu snang ba yang dag par bskyod pa dang/ sams can thams cad kyi 'a00
pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang ) sa mas can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang/ byang chub sems pa'i rgya mtsho
thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor rgya mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang/ chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang/ mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung
bar bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang/ snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ kun tu bzang bo'i smon lam rgya mtsho lab tu dgod par bya ba dang/ ya shas
kyi chag dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongs su sbyang ba dang/ 'jig rtan thams cad kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phal par bya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor
lo thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyod pa dang/ snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad pa tu bad pa dang/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgyamatshornam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag/
smras so// yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi yi shes zab// mtha' dang dbus mad des ni zhing rnams khyab// sems can bsam la sbyor ba ji bzhin snang// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo 'o//
bsam gyis ma khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa// bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas// sams can rgya mtsho yongs su snyen bya'i phyir// sams can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes// sams can
rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab// srid pa'i gnas can dad pa chung ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub shes par ma nus so// gzhan du gur rnams shin tu
sams brtan cing/ dge ba'i bshas kyis yongs su bzung ba dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag/ sangs rgyas ya shas 'di la rab tu 'jug/ gang rnams sems dag/
g.yo med sgyu med cing// snying rje'i bsam can khong nas byams dga' dang// dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag na// 'di dag thos shing dga' ba thob par 'gyur// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam

la/ so dag dang// chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la// gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sus spyod pa// de dag rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so// gang gis rgyal pa'i rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i//
byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob/ dgazhan gyi yul gyis shis par mi nus te// 'di ni kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing// 'gro ba
mtha' dang dbus med 'di dag na// kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab 'a'or ba// rnam par snang mdzad yul dang mthu yin no// bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang// rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs
zhing rnams kun// de dag spu rtsa kun tu blta bar gyis// rgyal ba'i spyod yul shin tu bshad par bya// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams // mtha' dang dbus med mngon par bsgrub
pa dang// kun tu mig gi yul dang lus ldan pa// de dag mgon po'i spyod la 'ad nyan to// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu
bstan pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ de gsung rdo// gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/'di lta sta/
'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin tu bstan pa dang ) 'di lta !/ 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho'i dbyibs dang rnam ba shin tu bstan pa dang/ 'di ltaste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa dang/ 'di lta sta/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
rgyan shAn tu bstan pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin tu bstan pa dang/ 'di lta ste// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur
bshin tu bstan pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang 3 'di lta ste/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shing du bstan
pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa shAn tu bstan pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shan tu phra ba skad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo/
gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jul shin tu phra ba
snyang phrag bcus byung ngo/ 'byung ngo// 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ re bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos nyid rab tu rdzob pa dang/ soms/
can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa da du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang/ sams can rnams kyis kyang byang rtsub sems dpa' dag dang/
bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba mthun pa bsags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dad/ byang drub sams dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa rnam par
bsags pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par dag pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten
las 'das pa dang rgyu mthun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya shing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi sma malam gyis smo na
par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa 'a sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul hAn
tu phra ba skad kyis 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo// 'byung ngo// 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten khams/
rgya mtsho 'byung ba bani tu bstan pa 'di da gsal bor brjod pa'i phyir/ sas rgyasakyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas la shes yul ni
bsam yas pas// byi'i rlabs rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu // zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyis yongs su sbyangs// byang chub
sems dpa' kun gyi bsam pa bzhin// smon lam rgya mtsho bsam yas rnam sbyangs shing// sems can lasa rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas// phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung//
byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi rnam 'phrul dang// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon bsgrubs shing// nam mkha'i dbyings la 'byam klas zhang
'byung ngo// spyod pa rgya mtshomatha' dang dbus med rnams // spyod cing tshad med bde gshigs yul la 'jug/ phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun sbyong zhing// bskal pa mtha'
yas zhing rnams re rer spyod/ bsams can bsam dbyangs bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i/ las kyis zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung// nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas//

rgyu chos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyun can rnams // rin chen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri yod pa// dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par stsal ba'i phyir// rgyal sras
rnams ni phyogs bcur zhing rnams sbyang// chos dbyings rdul gyi khongs su rgyal sras rnams // kun tu bzang po'i sbyad ba spyod pa dag/ rdul gyi khongs su mtha' yas zhing ston taM )rnam dag
mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbus kyang mad/ yamakha'i dbyings 'dra'i rnam 'phrul 'ang 'dra sta// sAng po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na/ pad+mo'i stan 'od kha dog mtha' yas kun//
de dag zhing bcas lus kyi nang na 'khor// skad cig sems kyis dus gsum byung ba yang dazhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing bsnun pa//
rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing mi zad tshul gyi khyad par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas// rdul rnamasakun la mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams // sangs rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlob//
rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab du mkhyen/ ]kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
rdul ha tu phra ba skadud )'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol lan rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so// 'jig can gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nam mkha' dbyings kyi gnas
la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi 'od kyi dkyil 5khor rgya 5ts+tsha la rab tu gnas so/ 'jig rten gyi 2mas rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la 'ag tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
@#// la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la na sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyis byung ba lham an dang mthu bo che/

lta bu'i lagan rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs b.ranargya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rgya mtshol rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang bo 'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i rgyan
