rnam pa thams rten dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas taM/ do ga la sogs pa 'jig rtan gyi khams ba tu gnas pa shin du bstan pa ni/ 'jag rkun gyi bams rgya mtsho rar zhing yang 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'akun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shAn tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su
bstan pa'i phur/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus pa'i tshi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag ni rmanarang bzhin dri yod pa/ rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'ab
'od khrir rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos// 'di dag rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rgyu yis dbyings legs 'khor bar rnam par snang// de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyangs rnams ga zhi kam ba tu
khyab zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'od can nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs par gnas// 'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor 'chos
kyi 'khor lo bzang po bskor// 'di'i sangs rgyas yul yin soms can rgya chen shAn tu mgu byed pa'o// la la ma tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan// 'od rdar dra ba'i kun
nas na 'bar sos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can to// zhing mang mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen pad+mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing rnams 'byam kAs kun kyang rang
tu mdzes// zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs rgyas byin la gnas/ yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya cha de dag byang chub ams dpas gang// lag na rdo rje
rgya mtsho mang tshogs lha dbang lus la de bzhin gnas// de na bcom ldan rnam par snang ba mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor// nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'od 'phro'i spran rnams mnyam pa'i sa

la gas/[·g]yi phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas// la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan ma rtog rgya mtsho ngag la gnas// kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya chen rnam par snang/

mdzad ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams rang dang thung dang gling gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs to// sna tshogs rgyan can snying po dri ma bral ka yongs dag dra yod snang// rnam pa sna tshogs de dag so na la
rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas sngon gyis kun nas log par rtag tunam mkha'i dbyings la gnas// zhing rnams rgya matso'abyas klas la la sbyi'u tshugs yod dang
mad la gnas// byang chub sems dpa' rtsod pan chen 'khor los gzung bas dag par gnas// de nas sangasas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang// rin chen sangs rgyas
gsung rnams kun tu gtong ldan las kyis de dag sprul// chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'byam klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra// mig 'phrul rnam phya rnam dag dri med sems kyi shan tu
bskyod pa ste// nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang/ las kyi yul ni bsam gyis ma khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan// skad cig sams kyis
zhing rnams 'byam klas 'grob kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams // zhing rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing/ 'di na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'grob smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod//
chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam 'phrul rgya cha ston// rdul rnams kun na chos dbyings yangs po'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis/
brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas// ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam 'phrul de bzhin 'gro ba kun n 'o// rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chos rab tu ston pa mdzad/
zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra// snang ba med cing 'byung mod phyogs bcu dag na 'gro dang 'od ba mad// mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing zla
'jig par de bzhin 'gyur// shin tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam sbyas las kyis yong su bzung// kyi rgyal ba'i sras pa// de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
rnams kyi dbyibs ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni kun nas zlum po'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'bras klasal la ni kun nas
grwa bzhi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam klas pa la lan nam mkha'i rnam pa du mar rnam par bya ba'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam klas pa la la na kun nas 'khyil
ba' dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'bum klas pa la la ni 'od 'phro ba'i ra'i dbyibs su 'dug go 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam kas nga la lan gang sna
tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi yas rgya mtsho 'byas klas pa la la ni mi rtog sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam klas pa la
la ni khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam klas pa la la ni sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgyamatsho
( @#// 'am klas pa la la ni mtshanasna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs shAn tu bstan pa ni// 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho'i
rdul sha'i chu phra ba stod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs
sakya byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho zhing la ltos// rnam phu sna tshogs mtha' yas
rgyu dbyibs su gnas// dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun n zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang// la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste// de dag la la phyogs
na gru bzhir gnas// nor bu pad+mo 'khor la yan lag brgyad// kun kyang las rnams rgya mtshos rnam par bris// rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing// gsar las
grub pa rnam pa sna tshogs te/ sgo mang mtha' yas pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug/ las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag bas gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs snying po can/ ma mkha'
'di la ji ltar sngon gnas bzhin// de dag rin chen mang gzhi rnam par phya/ de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes// zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par brtags// sna tshogs
rgyan dang snang bas kun nas gnas/ rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gas// zhing rnams rgya mtshosangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// bad dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa na//
rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin te/ 'chos da 'di ni rtag tu yod pa yin// de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab/ lnga gcig rtsi la bsam gyis mi khyab zhing// thams cad
rdul snyad sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas// kun na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// 'khor rnams rgya mtshor chos rnams rab tu ston// rdul gcig rtsa la bu dang yangs pa 'i rnams //
thams cad rdul snyad kha dog kun dang ldan// kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par brtags/ 'di dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor rdu la rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa//
de dag smon lam rnam par sprul pa yin// nam mkha'i dbyings su las kyis sprul ba na// sna tshogs soms dang bsam pa rnam par brtagasaN/ sams can kun mnyam rdul rnams
thams cad la// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sngal pa dag/ rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te// rdul phran kun la zhing rnams shin tu gnas// kyi rgyal pa'i sras ga/

de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhan dag ni gzhan dang gzhan du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig na gyi khams
rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhan can no// 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi lhun can no//
'jig rten gyi kha rgya mtsho la kan 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi mdog gi lcanan no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la
'a ni rdo rje'i gzhi mi shigs pa'i lhan canano// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni
rinapo che'i mtshan nyid lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la na sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'i lhan can no/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho la lan nyi ma'i nor bu'i dkyil 'khor
gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che sharatu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun tsanAno// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni snang ba'i lhun can// 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho la la rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'arnam pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi chos kyi lcasano// 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho

la la ni ri po che thams cad kyi ma tog gi rtsod pa na gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ril rtsathamasacad kyi 'od kyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan
thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i lhun canano// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sams kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig gas dmigs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhunatsan no// 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rin po mi'i dbyibs kyi lcanatsanano// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi ma tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs rnam par ma gas pa'i lhunano// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu
bstan pa rgya matso 'ad nyid la rab tu gzung par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis b.rangs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tsha tshags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams
rgya mtsho la lani// rin chen rang bzhin kun nas gnas// rdo rje bzhin du ma 'gis sra/ rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas// la la 'od zer rang bzhin te// dag cing
gzung med 'od zer 'byung// rgyan rnams kun gyi 'od zer gyis// sna tshogs ra kha bzhun dra ma med// la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te// dag cing 'od gsal zer la
gnas/ 'od kyi sprinatshan sna tshogs 'od// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni// mig yor lta bu gnas pa ste// brjod du med
cing gzur du mad// smon lam dbang gis rab tu byung// la la nor bu mu tig rgyu// snying po thams cad rnam par 'bar// mu tig 'khor lo' se zhi dag pa//
byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang// rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing// 'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon khebs shing// rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan// thams cad las kyis
sprul ba yin// la la mtshan las byung ba ste// gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun tu bris// rtsod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod// sas rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul// rgya mtsho'i sems
las byung ba yi// zhing rnams mos pa nyid la gnas// yul na mi gnas sgyu ma bzhin// yongs su rtog pas yang dag bskyod// sangs rgyas sku mi 'od zer gyi// nor bus sna tshogs
kun tu gnas// sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu sprul// la la kun tu bzang po yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin tu sprul// hAl mkha'i
rgyu rgyan rnams thams cad dang// smon lam rnams kyis rnam par bris// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa na 'jig rtan gyi khams
rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang/ 'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo rjes su brjod cing rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las rnam par smin ba rgya mtsho las rab tu
byung ba'i rgyan dang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i gling yongs u ston pa'i rgyan dang/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
gzugs b.ran sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan dang/ 'di lta ste/ sams kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dwang//
'di lta ste/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang/ 'di lta// rin po che dang spos thams cad sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang/ 'di lta ste/
snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dag
) kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyun shin tu bstan pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad do//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyanaoMn tu bstan pa 'di da yongs su bstan pa'i phyir: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ ri'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbyas so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rgya che mtha' yas te// rnam dag las kyi rnam pa sna
phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang// sna tshogs rgyan canAyangs par kun nas gnas// kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams // rgya mtsho rtag
par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung// rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sbran// sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams //
de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i zhangan grag/ sna tshogs rgyan nga smon lam sprin gyi rnams // de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin// 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag// rgyan gyi
sprin rnams kun nas sgrar 'byin to// sems can de dag rnam smin ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byin gyis kun s sgra mang sgrog/ dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rnam
'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang// dmigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun// de 'dra'i zhing mad rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos/ 'das pa'angaskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang/
phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba ji snyed pa'i// bskal pa de dag rgya mar yangs pa yang// zhing rnams rgya mtsho ra ri dag na snang
00 'gro dang mnyam pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gangs// rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnam par 'dul// 'di na zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// sros 'od sprin dang de bzhin ma tig gling/ )/
rgyan rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang// rtag par kun tu khyab par rab tu 'byung// 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams // sna tshogs
rgyan can kun kyang ma lus par// thams cad rgya mtsho' zhing 'di dbyings dag na// nam mkha' sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa snang// rgyal sras kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi// zhing rnamasamathas
as 'byam klas rgyan gyi rnams // 'gro ba'i grangs snyang bskal pa rgya mtshor rnam sbyangs pa// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun nas rab tu snang// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rtan gyi khams

rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyan thams cad la brtan pa'i dge
ba'i rtsa bas skal ba mnyam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phal bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i
dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sams dpa' thams cad rab tu brtan pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
[©]// rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ longs su sbyang ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa/
thamasacad kyi dbyangs la rab tu dgod cing gzud pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang 'byung 'argya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi

smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub parnam par dag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang/ 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par 'asgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul
rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ da'atsho tshigs su bcad pa 'ad dag sbas so// zhing rnams
rgya mtsho thams cad sna tshogs rgyan// smon lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun kyis byung// kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtshos dag/ shing rnams rgya mtsho rtag tu 'od mang 'gyed//
sngan chad dag ba'i bshes gnyan bstan bkur cing// skal ba mnyam pa'i las dag yongs sbyangs te// snying rje byams pas 'gro angs kun bkang zhing// zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa/
'di kun sbyangs// chos sgo kun tu ting 'dzin sa kun gyis// sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yongs sbyangs te/ bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyang zhing// zhing rnams rgya mtsho
sna tshogs yangs pa byung// chos pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyad cing/ rgyal ba'i mnyam de ma nor rtogs byas nas// bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing//
rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas zhing rnams byung// bsod nams sprin na nam mkha' mnyam bskyod cing// 'gro ba kun phan bde don spyod spyad de// bsod nams rgya mtsho sams can kun bstan
pas 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'ardul snyad tshad med pa'i// pha rol phyin pa ma lus kun sbyangs to// smon lam mthar phyin ma zad
goms byas pas// du mad rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams langs pa 'byung// 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod tshad mad dang// chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te// sna tshogs thabs
sgos sems can sbyangs pas na// 'di 'dra'i 'de 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung// rgyan rnams kun kyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas//
'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal mtsho bskams pas// zhing ga mtsho yangs 'di kun dag par 'gyur// stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med yongs sbyangs shing// 'gro pa
za 'di 'dra tshadamad rnam sbyangs te// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam mang rnam par dag/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig

'tshorten gyi khams rgya mtsho ra rar sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig na gyi khams rgya mtsho'ajul shin tu phra bsnyad du shes par bya ste ) 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la na sku chung ngur kun
tu ston to// 'di lta sta/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la lan chos kyi dbyings thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston to// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad ma rang ngo// sangs
rgyas 'byung ba la la na sku tshe'i tshad rang ngo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni 'jig rten kyi
khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la na tshul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor la byin gyis rlob bo// sas rgyas 'byung ba la la na
tshul bsam gyis ma khyab par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor la byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung pa la la ni sems can gyi khams nyung du rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba

[zo/]la la ni sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob sto/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ri der sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/
rdul shin tu phra ba snyad du shes par bya'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang bos ang sas rgyas 'byung ba' tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir//
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ do' tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi// sgo nas zhing rnams
rgyu mtshor rab tu 'byung// de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin mkhyen// sangs rgyas thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho 'o// sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste// mig yor ma
an mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs// gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu// sams can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston la ltos// sku tshe thung par la la rnam par ston// la la bskal
pa bsam pas byin gyis rlob// chos kyi sku na phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo// rab tu mdzes par 'gro nang 'di na bzhugs// la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dug/
sbyong zhing 'khyam klas phyogs bcu kun na yang// la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad// smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go/ la la bsam gyis mi khyab thog
pa'i rgyan// sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// la la theg pa gcig kyang rab ston to// rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so// rang byung
la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas// sems can mi mang lam la gzhog pa mad// la la skad cig gcig gis sems pa rnams // rgya mtsho bsam las byang chub don du 'dul// la la spu mi
sgo nas bsam yas pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sngon rnams rab tu 'gyed/ 'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon bkang zhing// thabs kyi sgo nas soms can 'dul ba mdzad// la la sangs rgyas
gsung gis kun bkang zhing// zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog/ bsam yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrog cing/ somasam rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul// la la zhig
lta rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// 'khor rnams yongs dag kun nas 'khod bcas pas// zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs su gang byas shing// sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab bar bzhugs//
de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam ma khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing// 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon sum sta// sna tshogs rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan
kya rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba stong du

[z/ ]shes bar bya ste// 'ad ltar zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal ba tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la//
la ni bskal pa dpag tu med par kun gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa bsam gyis ma khyab par byin gyis babs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa mtshungs pa med
par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mu chad par byin gyis brlabs
pa'o/ zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa brjod du med par nyin gyis nganubs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shan tu bstan pa rgya mtsho na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shAn tu phra ba snyad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'abaskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
bltas te/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten rgya mtsho kaskal pa tha dad do// sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan// phyogs bcu'i
zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun n snang// bskal pa'i tshulan rgya mtsho gangs kyang med// bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam// phyogs dbyings 'jig rten/
rgya mtsho'i khams na snang// bskal pa mtha' yas la la rang dang byung// bskal pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i skus kyang bsgrags// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs dbyi ngas
'a[F ]snang na rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyad dang ldan// la la gzhan rnams bskal pa gcig gis 'jug/ la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung// bskal pa la la
dri ma de la la nyon mongs can/ de la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par gnas// bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung// sems can 'du shes rnam pas
rtsa dad tshul la 'jug/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngon chad spyod spyad pas// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag/ de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang
rgyu da 'di dag rgya chen bskal pa'i 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams// bskul pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs// bcom ldan 'das dang 'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig snang ba// snang dang
dri mad bzang po bskal pa'i ming la 'jug/ bskal pa 'di dag rnam dag bskal pa kun las byung// dri mdu bskal pa la lar sangs rgyas gcig skya 'o// bskal pa la lar mi yi gtso bo
bzhi/ mtha' yas 'byung// bskal pa'i tshul rnams thams cad sa tshul zad mi shes// smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur// bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams kyang
bskal pa gcig tu 'dus// bskal pa la la gcig kyang bskal pa bya ba'i mthu// bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi nang nas sgra
yang 'byin// bskal pa lta la bskul pa kun gyi rgyan kyang 'byung// mang ga rgyan rnams rnam par dag pa 'ang de la yod// bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu yis byung// bskal pa'i
tshul rnams kun gyi 'di ni rgyan yangs yin// zhing dang bskal pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig gis dag/ zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad mad gzhal du med// skad cig yud tsam ti ma'i
grangs kyi bskal par 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam par 'byung// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha'

yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig/ na gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pa 'jig
cing 'du ba la rab tu 'jug par gnas pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa soms can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas po kun nas gnas pa dang/
'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i saMms can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po bsags pa rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
kun nas nyon mongs la rnam bar dag par gnas pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sams dpa' mos pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa rnams skya bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam
'a dag la kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang/ 'du lta ste/ sems can rgya mtsho rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu dag par gnas
pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dong bas bskal pa rgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang/ 'di lta sta 2 phyogs bcu'i byang chub
sams dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu mang por kun nas gnas pa dang/ 'di lta ste ) de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
las 'da' pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang/ 'di lta sta/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pa
dang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shan tu phrab snyad du shes par bya'o/ de na:
byang chub sems dang 'a kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
phyogs bcur rnam par bltas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos// chos kyis byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar// de dag 'byung bde
'jig par 'gyur bar yang// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang// sams na nyon mos mi bzad ldan pa dang// las dang nyon mo sa ngan pas bsgribs pa' rnams / 'di dag
bsam la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams // kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin// sems can rnam dag bsam pa ldan pa dang// bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul ma// rnam
dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur rnams // de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyis// byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba'i dus dag na// bskal pa de na rnam par dag par snang// sems
can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa ya nga// de yi tshos da bsam yas da nga pa yi// byang chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyud pa dang/ de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phal bas// de bzhin bskal pa
rgya mtsho mang po dag// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyun yongs su sbyong// bya ba mang po mtha' yas ma zad pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun tu yang/ rgyun/
la rnam pa tha dad yod pa min// bskal pa tha dad tshul gyi bya brag snang// rdul rnamar ra sbubs su dus kun tu// sangs rgyas zhing ga rdul dang mnyam pa yi// rgyal sras ji tshul 'dong ba
de bzhin du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par gyur// gal te rgyal ba rnams ni skye 'gyur na// 'di rnams rgyan gyis shani tu brgyan par 'gyur// bsam pa yongs dag de pahani rgyas
'gyur te// 'di ni zhing rgyan phun sum tshogs pa 'o// gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na// da tshe da zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur/ bsams sa rnams kyang snod du rung ba ma'i//
zhang gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab gang tsha ston pa na/ de tshe zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag/ kun kyang rgyan
gyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ dal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul ba'i tu phra ba snyad du shes
bar bya sta/ de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang ) da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo// gsung ba

[za/]'gyur ro// da na 'di lta ste// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tha ma dad pa dang/ 'di lta sta/ 'jigal gyi

khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba thu ma dad pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rgyas par 'gengs
pa tha ma dad pa dang// 'di lta ste/ 'jag rkun gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang/ 'di lta sta/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

dag ga sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gangs pa tha ma dad pa dang/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin dang mtshan gyi 'khor
la tha me dang pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i phyin gyi rlabs
tha ma dad pa dang/ 'di lta ste// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu
phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba tha ma dad pa dang ) 'di lta ste// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul 'bum klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi
(@#/// sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ston cing brjod pa tha mi dad pa dag ste// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di dag la sogs pa'i 'jag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul 'jig/

zla rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phu ba stod du shes par bya'o/ pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu zang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho Tan tu bstan
pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rdul gcig stang na
zhing mang rgya mtsho lta kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang// gnod pa med cing 'dra ba gang yang med// 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la ltos// rdul rnams kun la bsam
yas sangs rgyas bzhugs// sams can kun gyi pasam pa yid bzhin du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang// de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams
kun la shang da bang mtha' yas pa// sna tshogs rgyan phyung kun nas bris sbyangs te// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon pa kang yang// de dag tha dad 'gyur ba nam yang med// rdul phran
rgya mtsho rdul phran re re la// mi yi gtso bo 'khor rnams kun bskor cing// 'jig rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang// gnod pa dag dang 'dra ba'i sa pa mad/ 'dzul
0 gcig lan mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtshokun bkang zhing// bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang///
mad/ rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab// sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang byas te// sangs rgyas sprul pas soms can rnams 'dul yang// 'byas kas phyogs
na za dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de/ 'di dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor ma dzad cing// thabs dang mkhru yi sgo mo sna tshogs kyis// thams cad
brjod kyang de la tha dad med// rdul gcig la ni rgyal ba kun gyis gsung// 'gro ba snod du gyur la de dag brjod byas tu/// rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang//
de dag gsung gi yan lag tha ma dod// zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams // thams cad rdul sbubs gcig tu rab tu 'dzud// rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu la
ltos/ las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa min// rdul gcig lan dus gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang// de dag gshags dang byon pa gang
yang med// 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i
phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// bam po brgyad pa// kyi rgyal ba'i sras ngag 3

de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po ma tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/

bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis yongs su dag par byas to/ bskal pa ra ra zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu
phra ba stod kyi zhabs kyi drung du smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis yongs su dag par byas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig can gyi khams

rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa de na rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shan tu phra ba snyad kyis shan tu gzung 'a sto/ de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni//
gzhi kun nas rton pa zhes bya ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i gzhis rton to// de'i stangan rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba
yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhas rton to// de'i stang na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril ngu'i gzhas/
rton to// de'i stang na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro mnyam par ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'irgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhis rton to/ 'di'i steng na rlung gi/
dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod do// 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ma tog gi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhi kun nas dri ma
mad cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ma tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba' song gi'i khri'i gzhis rton to// de'i stang na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su sgra sgrog cing kun tu rgyu ba
zhes bya ba yod do// mu tig dang mnol gyi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to// de'i stang na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i
rgyal po'i shing dang ma tog sna tshogs kyi grong gi gzhis rton to// de'i stang na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'ishugs zhes bya ba yod de/ spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi
sprin gyi gzhis rton to// da' stong na rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyim du kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang spos kyi khang pa brtsigs pa'i sprin gyi gzhis ston to//

kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shan tu phra ba snyad de dag thams cad kyi stang ma na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjod bzang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ste/ nor bu kun
@#/ nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i ltos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to// spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las pad+d+ho/
chen po spos kyi rgyal mtshan khyar ba'i 'od zer dang/ ze ba sna tshogs shes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ pad+ma chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po ma tog gi rgyan gyis
brgyan pa kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa// rnam par dag pa// shin tu brtan pa// rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gis bskor ba/ rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa/
shing gi rgyud rgya mtsho sa la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po ma rtog gi rgyan gyis rgyun
pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir/ sas rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs banur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag sas so// gzhi rgyan ma tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho de// rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te// rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i stan chad sangs rgyas kyi//
drung du sngon tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri ma med// rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun bkang zhing
rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na// 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad do// 'od snang btang ba na kha' yi dkyil na gnas ]
pa ni rlung gi phung pos btab kyang ma bskyodam g.yo ste// nor du kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs karan snying po 'o// ma tog ma dzod bkya gtor ba rin chen yid 'ong pa na// sngon gyi
smon lam dbang gis mkha' yi dbyung la gnas// rgya mtsho rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong/ nor bu
thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams // 'byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu 'dong/ 'od zer lo tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs// phyogs rnams
ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par taM// rin chen kun gyis 'od zer sna na rnams bkra ba na// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed// sdug bsngal thams cad
bcol zhing byang chub mchog la 'god// 'jig rtan rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar// 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams // dzan na kun dang
rnams kun nas rgyal ba 'gyod// brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor lo sgyur 'dra dang// 'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas sprul las 'od bkyi chos kyi dbyings
kyi tshad mnyam pa// 'od zar sgo nas sas rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa mig byas nas// tshul rnams sna tshogs sgo nas/
sems can rnam par 'dul// 'jig rtan rgya mtsho ma tog snying pod nang na// rdulaphran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi// rin chen 'od bkya sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar
bar snang// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par 'phrul pa'i zhing la ltos// bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal byas te// smon lam yangs pa'i sprin na chos kyi dbyings
mnyam dang// bzang po 'i spyod pa brtas shing ma shes sa ldan pa'/ dgongs pa las ni rgyan mardzas de dag khyud 'a yi// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po cha zhes bya
ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po ma tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya la sta le'u lnga pa'o// !kyi rgyal

ba' sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po ma tog gi rgyan gyis 'argyan pa'i khor yug chen po ni nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo nyima' u0f7a gzhu la brtan pa lta/ nor bu'i rigs rgya mtsho
spos kyi tsan dan thams cad las grub pa// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad lhun shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa/ nor bu'i spos zhim po gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par
snang ba'i snying po can nor bu'i rgyal po rdo Na sra zhing ma shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhrags shing spu ba/ ran po cha' chu thams cad kun s 'byung ba )rin po cha' ngebang gi nags tshal gyi
rgyan thams cad ma rtog shAn tu rgyas pa/ spos kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams rud kyi rgyan gyis 'argyan pa/ sbas kyi ma tog dbal can shin tu 'bad bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu'i

rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bras pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa rgyan bzang po' rnam pa 'jage rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho'ajul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis rab tu
brgyan pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang khor yug gi rgyan dang yon tan longs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa' phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi ban gyis brlabs
kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus mad sna tshogs rnam pa
can nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mdog/ de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas byung/ 'dra mo da lor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// nor bu mang po de bzhin spos
mang dang// mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas// kha dog mtha' pa su rin rgyan rnams kyis brtan// snying po nor bu'i sprin rgyan sna tshogs su/ 'dzam bu chu klu nga
[c©]// 'od 'phro snying po'i tshogs// 'od 'phro dam pa phyogs su snang zhing 'tshar// khor yug dri ma med pa rnam par mdzes// nor bu rdo rdzas 'dus byas shAn tu sra zhing brtan//
mtshams rnams ma phyid nor bu sna tshogs 'phrul// mtshan ldan nor bu rin chen rnam bkod pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang// spos chu'i sprin gyi kha dog mtha' yas te//
bde chen tsan dan ma rtog kun tu dgram// pad+mo sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog/ rin chen rtse mchog dri zhim rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs shing gi spyan gyis kun nas brgyu// nor pa zang
kun gyis kun nas gzi brjid 'bar// 'od zer sprin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// gos kyi mdzod kyis g+hAn tu 'bar bar gnas// sngos kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa'i gdugs 'chang
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyis gang// sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo// rin chen mdzes pa de dag
thams cad dang// nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'phro'i shing/ kun la rnam par snang mdzad sku gsal ba// gzugs b.ran tshul du nang na yod pa snang// thams cad gzugs su
sku rnams mtha' yas te// sangs rgyas lngal mang kha dog ma yod pas// thams cad phyogs dang chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing// sems can mang po tshad med rnam pa 'dul// thams cad rgyan/

las sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam 'khor lo ya// zhang rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag byas pa// de dag de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grag/ h+phun tu rgyas pa chen po' mdo sangs/

rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khor yug ga rgyan rgya mtsho shAn tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o/'a khor yug ga rgyan rgya mtsho shan tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o/// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la

thor yug chen po de'i nang na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni nor bu mang po 'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// rdo rje ltar gAn tu mkhrags shing sra la brtan pa/ rin po ma'i rigs
thams cad las grub pa rgya mtshos rnam par phya ba ma shags pa'i snying po can/ mi mtho mi dma' ba' thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po cha' tshor thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od
thams cad kyis rab tu baspyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'i nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po cha' tshon thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ 3
rin po chu yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo thams rud kyis gzhi byas pa// dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sngon gyis kun nas phug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis
gzhi ma 1ma par bdal ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rdzun gyi dra ba rnam par dris pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od/
dang : nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul lta bu s rnam par phye ba sta/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rkyen shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad do// danas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas taM/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam ngag mnyam//
'khor lo'i dra bas bsgrubs pas mngeshags su// rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gar gnas shing// rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu gang// yid 'ongs na rdo rje gsar gyi gzhi//
rin chen chu ba ri bo'i 'khor las bsgrubs// pado dkyil 'khor gzhi yin ma rtogs// tsan dan phyi ma rin chen kun tu bkram// 'od zer sna tshogs rin chen ma tog rnams // 'od
'phro 'gyang pas phyogs su sprin kyang 'bar// sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram// sa kun ma rtog yid du 'ong bas yog/ thams cad sprin ni phyogs na stag ldang bas// mi zad
yangs pa kun nas khebs par 'dug/ zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing// sangs rgyas chos na snyan par rab tu sgrog/ rin chen ltar snang sangs rgyas smon lam kum//

[d/ ]shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston// sngan chad spyod pa ci 'dra spyod pa dag/ kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang// de yi rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs gting// de yi nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul
snang sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams // rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang// ma tog snying po tshon gyi 'khor los bsgrubs// der ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'dong nga//byang chub
sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrog/ snying po byang chub 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo// rin chen 'od zer 'od dang ldan pa dag/ sa yi nor bu rgyan las rab tu 'byung// sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di
yang rtag tu ston// chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu kun tu 'gangs// sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chan dang// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sus shes pa// de dag phyogs rnams
rgya mtsho kun tu yang// zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul la 'jug/ kan tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po cha zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa'i gzha'i rgyan
sprin du bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas

kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i jul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po dang sngos thams cad kyis klur rab tu bsgrubs pa'o/
nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i du bas kun nas bris pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mdog tu snang ba'i spos kyi chus
yongs su rgyas pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi ma tog sna tshogs kyi klong du 'khyil ba'o// tsan dan gyi phra ma dang 'dres pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang

'tshe smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin ma tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu r rab
du 'byed pa'o// kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o// dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad

snang ba'o// phyogs kun nas rin po cha' them skas kyi 'phreng ba bcud rab tu bgyi ba'o// mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// na po che shel gyi rgyal mtshan

[– ]bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du mad pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang ma rtog gi khang pa brtsigs pa chu klung gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas

bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu thams cad kyi pad+ma yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba gling bzhi'o
'jag rkun gyi khams kyi rdul shan tu phra la snyad kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// rin po chu thams cad kyi ma tog puN+Da ri ka dang spos kyi chu yongs su rgyas pas kun s bskor ba'o// 'di lta sta/ pache'i

shing ga 'phrad ba rin po che 'bar zhing kun nas 'phung ba'i nor bu'i dra ba can gling bzhi'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// tsan dan dang/ spos dang/ nor bu ]

mang po sgra thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dekyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa chu klung gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma snyad kyis 'gram hani tu brgyan pa'o// 'ad lta ste/ nyi po che dad/

gos dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ dril bu ma nga po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan share tu rgyas pa'o// rin po che de du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi ra ba bya bakhrig khrig brgya stong brjod du med
pas kun nas bskor ba'o// de nas byang chung sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sgos chu'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'atsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// sa stangs don spos kyi chu bo yis// rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnam brjod de// gzhi rnams te chin gos/
kyis kun bting ba/ ma shig rdo rje lta bu sra zhing madz+dzis// spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang// nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'phro skyug sprin dang// pad+mo rin chen 'bud sha'ad kun nas khros//
gzhu rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba 'o// spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste// zhin 'od zer sna tshogs ma tog glong// sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong pa'i dbyangs kyis kyang/
sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sgrog/ tham skas 'phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan// gzhi rin chen nor bu mang pos brgyan// stogs bu kun bkod rin chen pado yi// sprin sdug
dra ba rnam par bris pa ste// mi chen nor bu'i shing gi 'phrang ba dag/ rin chen gsar gyi kha dog yid 'ong 'bar// 'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang// rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangs
T+Thiti/ su rab tu sgrog/ spos chus yongs gang rin chan bslabs pa ste// ma tog put+tAr kas kun nas bskor// spos dang 'od dang bdug spos 'od zer 'gyed// de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
sma rnam par yangs// rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can// gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing// rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag/ thams cad mkhyen par 'jug
tshod pa'i sgra[']ang sgrog/ pad+mo'agong khyen rnams kyis kun nas bskor// kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan// phyogs rnams kun nas mu ge sprin bkya ba'/ grong khyer rgya mtshos
da dag rab tu brgyan// dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste// sa chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyim gyi rnams // rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba// rgyu mtshos
bzang zhing mdzes par rab tu brgyan// snyan chad rnam par snang mdzad kyi// sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yongs sbyangs pa// shin tu rgya cha mtha' dang dbus mad pa'ang// de dag kun na
rnam par 'phrul pa byed// spos chu'i rgya mtsho da dgarar zhang yang spos chu'i chu klung g.yas phyogs su 'khor zhing 'bab bgade bzhi'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis 'khor
byas pa lta/ sngos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i pad+mo kha dog dang dra mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o// ra bu'i 'khor lo dang/ nor bu'i 'od rnam par dag pa
sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkris pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi 'o dog lta bu s rnam par sbyang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o// sems can
thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dril bu'i dri ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khabs pa'o// spyod pa'i 'od kyi glong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu
rab tu 'byung ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od shin tu 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bu r snang ba thams cad kyis shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o//
nor bu'argyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po'i ma togaban tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o//
dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems pa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo khungs su slog pa'o// skyes kyi rlu dang rin po rtsa stong 'phro ba thams cad kyi
'od dang/ 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba sto/ chu klung de dag ra ra zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan ba 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra 'a snyad do// de nas byang chub
sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sos chu' tu klung gi rgyan dang yon tan rgya mtsho 'ad nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu rnam par
tshes bltas te/ de'atsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung dri ma med pa'i chus rgyas shing gzhan nor bu'i rdo rje pad+mos cus/ shi chen mang po' sal bas gzhi
bkram zhing// kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong/ bum skas 'phrang bas de dag kun nas bskor// pad+ma 'byung ba'i mu khyud 'khor can te// ma tog brgyan pa'i mu tig
'phrang kha dang// ma tog lda ldis sna tshogs kun nas bris// nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba na// rinatsan kun gyi kha dog mdog ltar 'bab// rin chen nor bu ma rtog mdzes par bkod/
sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad rjod// de dag rtog pa nor bu zla ba ste// rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dpa' gong ngo// phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu rtag par yang// spos dang bdug pa
'od 'phro'i rgyan 'byung ngo// chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi// 'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu 'byung// ma tog nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang// rin chen kun gyi zur du rab tu 'bar/ de
phyogs bcu'azhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen rnams las snang// rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi rtan yid 'ong las// sbos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang
'bab/ na chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis// yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab// rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang// kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dzud// sangs

rgyas smon lam sgra dbyangs rnam pa dang// sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag/ rnam dag nor bu'i ngos dang ngogs kun nas// sgra rnams sgrog pa kun n rab tu snang// chu bo thams cad dba' klong
dag las kyang// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen 'bar ba dag/ chos kyi dbyangs rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun rab tu snang// chu klung de dag thams cad dri med cing//
nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa// mdzod spu'i dpal dang sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang/ spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar

dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa lta/ chu klung ga bar de dag re re zhing mang rin po che 'am tog puN+Daraka' 'brang ba gleng bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu
@#// phra ba snyad kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// chu klung ga bar de dag re re zhing yang ran po cha' shing ga 'phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis rnam par

za phya ba'o// shing ga gseb thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyi sngon rtag par rab tu 'byung ste/ nor bu'argyal bo byang rlubasams dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang 'od rnams kyang rab 'byung ngo//
shing ga bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin tu 'bar ba ste/ spos dang ma tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thoms cad kyi smon lam bskal pa thams cad du
byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongs su gang ba'o// spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sngon gyis mngon par khyab pa'o// sngos kyi rgyal po yid du
'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'argyal po rgyan bsamagyisam khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o// gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs sprin/
tshe lta bu s mngon par yog pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba'i spun gyis yog par byed bas rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyirnam par 'phrul
pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sams can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shan tu ston pas rgyas pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa chu klung gi bar de
dag ra ra zhing yang rgyun shin tu bstan pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad do/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi bar gyi rgyan
yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas taM de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung bar rnams
[à]na rtarnam par dag/ rin chen rgyan can gsar gyis rnam par bris// al ga ma tog sprin rnams 'phyang ldang ba'i// shing ga 'phrang bas kun nas mngon par khyab// shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor
sgo drug nus// rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung// ma tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can// phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed// gzhi rnams nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste//
ma tog rnam bris rin chen 'bru dang ldan// kun nas rin chen sprin gyis khyab pa sta// rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang// sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis// sa rnams
thams cad kun nas rnam par gang// phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sngon// rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur par snang// nor bu'i rkyen gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas//
mu tigagasal ba'i du bas rnam par phya// nor bu'i 'khor la kun nas rab tu bkod// kun na rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa snang// 'byam kas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis/ sangs rgyas
sprul pa bkyi ba kun n snang// sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog/ na chen sna tshogs puts+tsha'i ka yis//
chu rnams kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos// de las ma zad 'od zer rgya mtsho rnams // rab tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo sna tshogs 'byung// dus rnams gsum po'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang// nor bu de
dag 'bru yi nang na ste// 'byung ba med cing gzung du'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du// rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad

b+he rab tu 'gyed// sngan chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis// de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang ba ma dA// rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang// rgyal sras thams cad sbyang pa zab sbyong de//
rang gi zhing dang lung bstan sa yi rnams / bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong// kyi rgyul ba'isras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rtan gyi khams/

rgya mtsho'i rgyan gan tu bstan pa na bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po ma tog gi rgyan gyi brgyan pa'i dmigs pa dag

la'ang dmigs pa ra ra zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing/ yon tan mtha' dang dbus mdapas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang// rin chen rgyan can 'od zer gnas pa
ste sdug chung gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog/ rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam par 'bar// mu tig nor bu'i sprinamang zad ma nas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogs su rnam
par snang// zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams // khyang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed// sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis ma khyab ste// nor bu'i rgyal po thams
cad snyan par sgrog/ rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi spyod pa rnams // rin chen rnams las rtag par snang zhing sdug/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od// rgyan rnams thams cang nang na rnam
par snang// 'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang// sprul pa rnams kyis zhing gi rgya mtsho gang// sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni smyum 'dra/ de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med
sangs rgyas yul rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yi// zhing rnams kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// zhing rnams 'khyam klas par ni rnam 'phrul zhing// ji snyed zhing du de dag kun rgyu ba// de dag
nor bu kun la rab tu snang// de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs// sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste// thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snang// 'di ni rnam par
snang mdzad spyod yul te// smon lam rnam par 'phrul las byung ba'o// bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams byung gyur pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' shas mchog rgya mtsho can// de dag rdul
'tsha phran kun la rang rang gis/ rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sham dang/ bskal pa bya ba rgya chen bsam yas su// de dag spyod yul
sgyu thams cad mthong bas na// skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston// zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste// de dag mkha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med/ smon lam stobs
kyis kun tu gnas pa sta// sems can rnams la phan phyir rang tu sbyangs// kyi rgyal ba'i sras ngag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa gang

! zhe na kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams sbos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying po de dag la 'jig rnamagyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing

brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du mang pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
[z/ ]snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam kAs pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa// dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'jug pa// phyogs gzhan dang/
gzhan la lta ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gangs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'du ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan

du ma 'dres pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byas klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu
gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byas kus pa la la ni rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ma tog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byas kus pa la la na
na po cha' 'phrang bo mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ 'a jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la lan spos chu'i rgyalatsho la rab tu gnas so/ )'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam kus pa la la ni lo tog thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byas klas pa la la ni nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam kAs pa la la na 'od rdar gyi rgya mtsho klong du gyur pa'i chu bo la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'abyam klas pa la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i
nor bu'i cod panasna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnasaso// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'am klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten

shu gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam klas pa la la na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'am klas pa'i gnas shin tu bstan pa ni
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

'byam klas pa la la ni ri rab kyi dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khyam klas pa la la ni chu klung gi dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun tu 'khor ba'i
dbyibs lta bu 'o/ 'jig rtan gyi khams 'aa kas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'khyam klas pa la la ni 'khor lo'i dbyibs lta bu 'o/ 'jig rten gyi
khams 'byam kas pa la la ni mig mangs sa kyi dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni shing gi dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa la la ni khang pa
brtsigs pa'i dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rtan gyi khams 'byam kus pa la la ni rdo'i rgyal mtshan gyi dbyings lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni phyogs 'dzum kas pa'i dbyibs
lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa la lan khad pa'i dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni paro'i dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni
rtababs kyi dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byas klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu 'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni skran gyi dbyibs lta bu 'o//
'jig rten gyi khams 'byam kus pa la la na sas rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la lan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams
'dus kas pa la la ni dra ba sna tshogs bkya pa'i dbya'is lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dum kAs pa la la ni sgo kun nas yog pa'i dbyibs lta bu 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la
ni dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu ste/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'aa klas pa'i dbyibs rnam par phye ba shAn tu bstan pa ni 'jig zhan gyi khams kyi rdul
shin tu phra ba nyid do/ rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag na lhun gzhan dang gzhan du bstan ba sta/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni phyogs thams

cad kyi nor bu'i sprin gyi lhun can no// 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni 'od kyi lhan canano// 'jig don gyi las kyi tshul la la ni na po che dang spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi tshul la la ni na po chu thams cad kyi ma tog kha sprod las bsgrubs pa'i lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi lhun tsamano

'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la lan sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni in po cha'i 'od kyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi kha dog gi

lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po cha thams cad kyi kha dog gi 'od kyi lhunan no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya matso yang dag par 'byung

ba'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhan can no// 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi tshul la la na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la lan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la lan

u0fc4 sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra'i lhun canano// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la lan zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sgra'i lhan cam no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni

sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha' dang dbus mod pa'i lhunan no// 'jig na gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbrel pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra'i lhan can no// 'jigs gyi khams kyi tshul la/

ba sems can thams cad kyi dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag
la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'khyam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad du shes par bya'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang

pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'khyam klos pa'i tshul gyi lus rnam bar dgod pa shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas

taM da' tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skas so// zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin tu brtan par grub/ dri mad dri bral 'od 'khyang snying po can/ nor bu pado rgya mtsho kun la gnas// la la gad+ma'i rgya mtsho/
dag la gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gyi gzhi gnas shing// dbyibs kyang sna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang mang// ra rab grong khyer shing gi dkyil 'khor dang// zhing rgyud thams cad la la
phyogs kun lta// la la 'od lus ma tog snying po can// nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin dang chu// la la'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus// nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shig su// 'byas
klus la la kha dog sna tshogs gsal// 'od 'dra 'od 'phro ma mar sprin gyi mdo/ la la'i rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus// de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas 'byung// la la'i rgyud ni smon lam
[n/ ]@#// sgrub lus// spyod pa rnam 'phrul na gyi sgra yi lus// la la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi sgra// la la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tan sgra// zhing gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pa//
kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug/ rnam 'phrul yangs pa ma zad rgyan gyi rnams // tshad yod kun gyis phyogs kun rgyas par 'gangs// phyogs rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur to// sangs
[«]tsho pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyud zhugs par// phyogs bcu kun tu 'du bar snang ba yang// 'gro ba mad cing 'jug pa med pa min/ tshul gcig gis na rgyud rnams kun kyang 'gangs/ de thams
cad ma lus ra ror rab tu 'du// da la tha dad gang yang ma dmigs te// gzhi med kun 'gangs mtha' dang dbus kyang mad// zhing rnams tshul gyi rgyud la rnam 'phrul ba// sangs rgyas
rnam snang mdzad pa kun nas snang// smon lam sgra ni rgya mtshor rab brjod cing// nga ga dbyings na sams can kun kyang 'dul/ zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang//
bsam gyis ma khyab byang chub sems dpa' gang// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ma mnyam stobs ston cing// sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul// ban tu rgyas pa chen po'i
mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya pa las/ shing gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o/// bam po dgu pa/

kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyibasaden/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi rnam pas rnam par phye ba gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi/

zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad de/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gang chen mtsho'i dbyings kyi spos chu'i rgya mtshosangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi nad na/
spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma ni ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od zer mthab las pa zhes bya ste/ de'i nang nas nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs
brtan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi pado chen po gzhi sngos dang nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan can zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas
rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du mad pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ dmigs pa thams
cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma ni dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten khams te de da ni
rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi 'khor lo'i sa mtshams nor bu rin po rtsi'i ze ba mang po la rab tu gnas po/ nor bu'i 'khor thams cad ya rin po che'i ma tog gi rgyan thams cad
ba 0/ @#// kyis rab tu rtog par gyur pa ste// 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams da dag kyang gzhan
dang gzhan la gnas pa// rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma mang pa'i mar ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i stang 'jigarten
gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs kyi pad+mo dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/ rin po
che'i pad+mo g+hAn tu mang ba la rab tu gnas pa/ song ga' khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi 'bru ni po chu thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i klu ra'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa//
kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa// 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs po
song gi'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po
cha thams cad kyi rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che'i me tog ga 'phrang ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor lo
[]ga zi brjod bzang po' ma' spran gyis kun nas yog pa ! an lag brgyad du dma' ba'i dbyibs can// 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor
gyis bskor ba rna ma par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa 'od du ma chod pa'i yi shes kyi dpal gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stong
'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shan tu phra ba snyad pa na/ 'jig rten kyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs kyi yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sa mtshams man/
kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje brag gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i paro'i dbyibs ltar 'jug pa// rdo rje'i 'od zer dang rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas pa'i snang ba'i
'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ gcig tu dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod do/
da na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stong 'jig rtan gyi khams sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rtan gyi khams 'ong shin tu bkra ba'i ma tog sol ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i
rgyun gyi sa mtshams can/ shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i rin po cha'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ phyogs thams cad
nas grwa du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs su sgrog pas kun nas yog pa// kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
da' stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba skadu 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rtan gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
drug ga rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mos pa/ rin po cha shA la'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rdo rje'i khyim
gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa// kun nas gru bzhi'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla ri'i sprin gyis kun nas yo ga pa yod da/ de na de bzhin
ga shags pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stong 'jig rtan gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das na/ 'jig rten
gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od zar ma tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ras bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu ngag pa/
khang pa brtsigs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ ma tog pad+ma sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis mtshams can/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang rin po cha'i kha dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas
pa kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang/ mu tig dang/ stags bus kun nas yog pa yod de/ dan de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs dang/ yon tan
grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zeraras bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shinaM tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rtan gyi khams sa
yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyis zhang brgyad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba// kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/
nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po cha sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad+mo la 'dug cing nam mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mag 'phrul gyi
dbyibs lta bu r bdug pa/ 'od kyi ma tog gi dra ba'i spun kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshags pa grags pa rgya chen po'i yi shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal
klu/ mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// da' stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul gin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa
zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ na po cha yid bzhi gyi rgyal po'i 'khor
lo'i shing gi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sku'i rgya mtsho'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
sad ga' khri'i sprin rin po chu yid du 'ong pa mtha' dmas pa'i rgyan can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa 'i zla ba zhes
bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shan tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'a ji ga rtan
gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyun mtha' yas pa dang/ mu tig gi 'bru rab tu 'phyang ba dang/
rin po cha'i 'phrang ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che' sang ga'i khri'i rgyan dang mu tig gi 'phrang ba dang/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu
za/ gnas pa// kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ spos dang/ nor bu dang/ ma tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sa shAn tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba skad
'das pa na/ 'jig rtan gyi khams mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mo nga
shing rnam par dag pa// rdo rje ltar mi shigs shing sra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ ma tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla nga kham pa'i dbyibs
ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas rin po che'i bla ris kun nas log pa yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad mad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i stang 'jig
rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog cas bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra
ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 'od zer gyi rgyan kun nas snang ba'i sa mtshams can/ spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho ma tog gi gong can gyi
[p]/ dwagang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ ma tog 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa gos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod da/ de na de bzhin gshags ba
tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// da' stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba skad 'dus pan )'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'jig
'a7 rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa// rdo rje'i gzhi'as mtshams na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor
kha dog sna tshogs can gyis shin tu bzung ba/ pad+mo'i dra ba la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa/ nam mkha' lha'i khang pa can gyis brgyan pa 'di yod de//
de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das
u0fc4 pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul mad pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag ched
kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po cha'i gos sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i spyin
kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshags pa chos kyi dbyangs shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas

kyi shing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhare bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad
kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mang po thams cad kyi bla ri'i sa mtshams can/ ma tog gi dra ba rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal
kyi 'a'u ltar 'jug pa/ nor bu 'a shing dang spos chu'i sprin rgya mtshos kun nas yog pa yod do/ don de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pas kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba
bzhugs so// de'i stang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'dus pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro snang ba dri ma mad pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che mi zad pa 'gyod pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang
'od 'phro ba sna tshogs can gyi paro'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs rus sbal gyi mgo ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsan dan gyi sprin gyis kun nas/
dablad/ yog pa yod do/ de nad bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ 'di'i stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul nyin tu phra ba/
