snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rin po cha'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu brgyan gyis snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor
'tsha ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dbyibs sems can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug ba/ ma bu'i rgyal po'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams na// nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi snying bo
klu 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyings yan lag brgyad du 'dug pa/ khor yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang/ ma tog dang/ shing gi dra bas kun nas log
pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i ya shas phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing

ga rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shIn tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/
gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/ ma rtog gi sang ga'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs mu tig gi 'phrang la bskyil ba lta bu r
'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad kyi spos kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpalatshad med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes
bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig
rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po ran po cha'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu
'gyod pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ri rab kyi rgya mtsho la rang du gnas pa// dbyibs nor bu'i ze ba 'khyil ba ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i
dbang po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang ba'i
'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul gan tu phra ba skad 'as pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro 'khyil ba'i dpal yang
dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing ti sha'i rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i nyi zla rnam par snang ba'i
[s]@#// sa mtshams can/ dbyibs lha'i dbang po thams cad ltar 'dug pa// nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa du ma dang rin po che sna
tshogs thams cad dang/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu sgron ma'i 'bru'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis
tshe shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
pa gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ lhun gzhan dang gzhan na/ phyogs 'khyam klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang
gzhan gyis 'jug pa// rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gas pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba/ gzhan dang gan gyi rnam par ma 'dres pa/
rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyi rlabs gzhan canA/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba sbyo/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas
bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad kyis kun
[d ]/nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rtan gyi khams kun nas bskor pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'khyil ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor le sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shan tu phra pa snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
rdul shan tu phra ba snyad dang/ 'jig rta na gyi khams kyi shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phung po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs 'byas klas pas sangs rgyas kyi

zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul ban tu phru ba snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams pado sangs rgyas kyi zhingang+gacu'i rdul shan tu phra ba
snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul gaun tu phra ba snyad dang ) 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sams can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang lus kyi
dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang/ 'jig rtan gyi khams 'phyam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed dang/ 'jag rten gyi khams 'od kyi dekyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhade bcu'i rjel shin tu phra pa snyad dad/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sngon sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tshul shin/

za tu khru ba snyed dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulashAn tu phra ba snyad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam kAs pa sa la mngon par lta ba 'i debyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi

yaM zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang/ 'jage rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su
bskor pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tuphra ba snyad kyis kun nas yodas su bskor ba'o/ 'jig rten gyi
khams 'byamakas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'phyam klas pa rnam nga ra gdag la pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra pa snyid kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/
'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du mad pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad po de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'arnam par gdags pa shin tu bstan
pan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad de/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/chu klung gi 'khor dang bcas pa chu klung gi grong
dang bcas pa'i khongs na 'dug go/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs ba/gan sa chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen
mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jige rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nang kun nas 'khyil ba rnam par snang bzhes bya ba spos dang ni bo che'i rgyal po thams cad la
rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+me chen de la rang du gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i sgra rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i nga ro'i lhan ca na yod do// de thams
cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim gyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rnal shIn tu phra ba snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/
gcig tu dag pa/ na de/cha thams cad kyi rgyan gyi gang chen mtshol rang tu gnas pa// 'khor kun nas gru bzhin 'dug pa pado 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yong da
de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rnam par snang ba'i mdzod pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// rje'i steng du 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra pa nad 'dus pan ) 'jig
rten gyi khams zer ba'i dang khu gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhang gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra pa snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba
rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze brgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs kun nas dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa/ mu tig grong khyer dpal gyi dbal gyi sang ge'i khri'i sngon
gyis kun nas lag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyis mtshomatha' yas pa'i khyo gros shes bya ba bzhugs sa/ de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul

shin tu phra ba snyad 'dus pan/ 'jige rten gyi khams sprul pa'i sos zhim po dbal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rtenagyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tuwa ba snyad kyi 'khor kyis bskor
ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa// na po tsho thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril bu'i dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa ) rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyun sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi
dkyil 'khor gyi sngon gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang bzhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rduli na tu phra ba snyad 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 'ong zhes byab 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa// sbos chu kha dog mtha' yas par n po che' tshon dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor
le ltar 'dug pa mu tig nye ma'i tshul kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi khang pa brtse gas pa'i sin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor legs par byung ba rnam par snang mdzad
bzhugs so/ de'i snying 'jig rten gyis khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten kyikhams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa// spos dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la rab tuganas pa/ pad+de'i dbyibs
ltar 'dug ba/ 'od zer rdul dang bral ba dang spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyis shugs kyis dgyes pa mi zad pa'i blo gros shes bya ba

rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba// rnam par dag cig kun nas nyon mongs pa/ na po che thams cad kyis brtag par bsgrubs
pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa// zur gsum gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i cod pan gyi 'od dang 'od zer gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhi'i
gshegs ba dge ba dri mamed pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tuphra ba snyad 'das pa na ) 'jigarten gyi
khams rin po che'i pad+mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi sheng bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ pado'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya
mtsho la rab tu gnas pa// zla ba khom pa'i dbyibs ltar 'jug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi ma tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi smin gyis kun nas yog pa yod do/ den de bzhin gshegs pa
spyan rnam par dag pa me tog gi dbal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul gne klu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i
dbyibs dra mamed pas yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyud kyi rjel shin tu phra ba skad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba// kun nas nyon mongs shing
rnam par dag pa// rin po che'i 'od mang po'i rgya mtsholo rab tuganas pa/ 'an po che ram gyis gzhol ba' 'od 'phro pa snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu spos kyis 'bobs
pa' lus sna tshogs kyi sbone gyis kun nas yog pa yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub ba med pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ ! de'i stong 'jig

rin po che'i gos kyi klong ga rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog ga lnga ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 3 nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs sgrog pa' sAn gyis kun nas
log pa yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar pa'i pad+mo la rnam par rol pas shun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
ga rdul shan tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rin po che'i snying pos bsgrubs pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rtan gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba

gnas pa// lha ma yin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' las mgi yor kyi swAni rin po che'i cid pan rab tu 'bar ba'i lus can kyis kun
nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhani gshegs pa spyod pa'i stebs bdud rtsa'isgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdul shin tu phra ba

de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu gsal ba'i dbyangs nam mkha' rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdulashan tu
phra bsnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ga mdog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba nyid
kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa// sangs rgyas dran pa'i gling ga dbyas su 'jug pa/
sal stan gyasgra dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sngon gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu zhal ston pas shin tu 'phags pa 'a 'od ces
bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi cha la shan tu lnga bsad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i dpal gyi dbyangs

rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge 'a khri'i debyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng ge' lnga pad+makha dog sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sman gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par rnam par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jagi rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdul shan tu phra ba skad 'das
pa na 'jabag rten gyi khams rarab dpal kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta shu'i rdul shan tu phra ba skad kyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ rin po
pa/che'i gos dang smos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag ga dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis ma khyab ba rnam

khams mge 'phrul gyi dra ba shin tu marjes pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhan gshegs pa sgron mngashan tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
btsan/ no 'jig rten gyi khams ma rtog yongs su dag pa'i klong ga rekyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nyi ma'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stang
na 'jig rten gyi khrims shan tu mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba
bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mo'i nags tshal yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bsam gyis ma khyab pa
la 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rjerin po che ltar gzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
dpal gyi 'od gzi brjid kyi rgyal bo zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khamasalcos dang nor bu shAn tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod
nams rgyamatsho ma zad pa'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu phra ba 'byed pa zhes bya ba yodade/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs gzhal
du med pa'i dbyangs kun tu brjod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdulashin tu phra ba skyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams

gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa// rin po che yang bzhin gyi rgyal po yan lag brgyad du rnam par phye ba'i 'khor lo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa ) rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang bla
tshe ring sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan yongs su gsal ba'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de nas lho phyogs legs na

skyes chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i rdo rje ltar brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyangs kyis spyod pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshes kyi tshul
dang sa shani du sgrog pa'i lhun tsan rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jigarten gyi khams gzi brjid shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
ga rdul shan tu phra ba skad kyi 'khor kyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ mu tig bskyal ba'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i chu rtag ga 'phrang
ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas// nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' gtsug phud rab tu snang ba'i sman gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shani
tu 'phags pas rab tu snang nga zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jage rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shan tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yade du
'ong bas khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug spyod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du de'i stengan 'jig rten gyi khams ran

brtan pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri pad+mo gnon pa'i lte ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten kyi khams dpal
gyi dbyas pad+mo can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi phung po rnam par sangs rgyas pa' 'od zer ces bya ba pozhugs so// de' steng na 'jig rten gyi khams
rab tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzan gza brjod bzang bo'i rgyan ces bya ba bzhugs so// de' steng na 'jig rten kyi khams dga'

)khams mgi 'phrul gyi nor bu'i mdzod kyi snying bo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blta na don yod cing dga' bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//

na 'jig rten gyi khams rwa rab rnam par bris pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thums cad kyi sa ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
'jig rten gyi khams shang ga tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin po che'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i zla ba 'a blo zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stangan

grags pa dpal gyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgyamatsho thams cad rnam par gzags pa tha dad pa med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu' ge cha yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i nye ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stang na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od
'phro bas rab tu brgyan pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs kyi dpal rnam par snangab zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stengan 'jig rten gyi
khams smos kyi na bun gyi 'od zer cas bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhani gshegs pa blo gros dam pas dgongs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stang na 'jig rten gyi khams khon med pa'i

snang mdzad kyi sprul pa rgyu ba zhes bya ba mngon par 'byung ngo// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgyamatsho rin po che'agram du 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyayul zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgyamatsho kha dog kun tu 'bar ba'agaza brjid ces bya ba yod de//
de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od dam pa zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo// de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya chen thams cad kyi ra la
brgyan pa zhes bya ba yodade/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud ran po cha'od 'phro ba'i lce rab tu snang ba shane du 'phro ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya/

tshosangs rgyas kyi zhabarjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba skad kyaphyi rol shar phyogs logs kyi khor yug ga mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho ga zha dang sang bo shel ces bya ba/
yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud grol ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i bskal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi lhan can mngon par byung ste la/
de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med cing yadi du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdul shan tu phra ba nyid kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba
gcag tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhan gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa' teng nge 'dzin dang brtson 'grus kyi blo grosangashes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams

rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sas rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shani tu phra ba skad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gtsag tu dag pa yod de//

rdulangashani tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten kyi khams ma mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'dzag rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi mdzod rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya
pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings bsgrubs pa med pa'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams ca da kyi
rdul shan tu phra ba snyad 'das pa'i 'jig rtan cu 'ams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la/ 'a jig rten gyi khams lus dum pa' ses gya nom pa zhes bya ba 'dzag rten kyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
rishu'i rdulashan tuphra ba nyid kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi yan lag me tog 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs so/
spos chu'i rgyamatsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dri zhim po ma zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na gros chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjid bzang po dpal dang
ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi gsal zhing dra ma med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snang ba dang gzi b.ri/
kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa gzhol pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rani bo cheshin
tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten bya khams kyi rgyud spos dang rin po che'i chos yang dag par kanas ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos
chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi gsung zhi ba'i dbyas shes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par phye ba'i gnas yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya pa rab tu gnas go//
de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho skyes kyi rgyal mtshan rarab kyi sang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing yongs su gsal par snang
ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan dan shan tu yad du 'ong ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me
dog gi gling ga 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho byan gyis blorlabs kyi rlung zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jige rten gyi khams
kyargyud rin po che'i 'od zer gyi ni 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho brgyaban gyi gdong dang lus shani tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya
ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig ga rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs nasos chu'i rgya mtsho
gnas shin tu mnyam par yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'dzag rten gyi khams kyi rgyud be rma'i gram du sna tshogs bkram pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te// de dag la

sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rnal shin tu phra ba skad kyi phyi rol lho phyogs logs kyi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho shang gzi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de las

gnas so// de thams cad kyi 'og na 'dzage rten gyi khams kyi rgyud skar mda' 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba gca tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzag rten gyis mchod
pa yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdul shan tu phrab snyed 'das ba' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbus na/

chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs kyi phung po 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dang
chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjidi dgacang ya ngas pas rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud in+d+ra nI las dbyibs ltar 'dug pa skar mda' ltar snad
@#/ gab zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mad du 'ong bar gram pa'i nor bu mu tig rnam par snangab zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jige rtan spyi
khams kyi rgyud dbyangs kyis kun tu sgrog pa'i nga ro la dga' ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te// de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
rdul shan tu phra ba skyed kyi phyi rol khor yug kaM mtshams na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho in+d+ra nI la rab tu 'byed pa zhesabya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun tu snang zhing
tha na dad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'byung bar nga ro sgrog pa'i lhun tsan rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dag ba dam
pa' snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi tshul shin tu phra ba skad kyi 'khor gyis bskor pa gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshags pa gon
tan mchog ga blo gros dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'asnyingan 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
dbus gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'ardzagarten gyi khams yang dag par gnas pa'i rgyanaces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhag par 'phags pas rab tusnang ba zhes
bya ba bzhugs so// de la steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pe zla rgyas bsgrubs ba kun nas 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/
de na de bzhan gshegs pa ra rib mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ga rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba

mnga' bdag ces bya ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i rgya mtsho sgra rdo rje ltar shan tu brtan pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtshoran po che'ashang skugs kyis bskor
bshani tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten skya khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgrung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su smos
chu'i rgya mtsho me tog ga rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba thams cad shan tu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so//
de dang 'dab chags su spos chu' rgya mtsho rin po che'i spyan dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'od rnam/
bar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dang chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'ayishang ga ze ba'i kha dog gi rgyan ces bya ba yod du/ de na 'jig rten
gyi khamasakyi rgyud dag pa'atshogs kyi gzi brjid phal po che zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su smos chu'i rgya mtsho ran po cha' zhes dam pas shani tu brgyan pa zhes bya

du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chags pa med pa'i rdo rjekun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho

de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi nang brjod du med pa'i rjel shin tu phra ba sud kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho ma phyed par brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes

rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag thams cad kyang spos chu'i skye mtshod dag la nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sams dpa' lus rnam par dmags pa'i mag yor kyi

chags su gnas pa shastag go/ 'od rin po chagazhan dang gzhan gyi kha dog tu 'gyed ba sha stag go/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pAni gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun
nas log pa sha stag ko/ rgyan rnam par bros pa'i 'od gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go/ bskal pa'i grangs gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa sha stag go/ sangs rgyas nan/
dang gzhan skye zhing gshegs pa sha stag go/ chos rgya mtsho'i sgra gzhan dang gzhan rab tu skrags par sha stag go/ sems can gyi lus gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun tu yog pa
stag go/ phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la 'jug pa ma 'dres pa sha stag go/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'a byon gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan can
sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams nas rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten kyi khams kyi zla ba rgyan sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa thams
cad kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang sAng po me tog ga brgyan kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad
yongs su gang ngo// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyud nas byung ba de bzhan du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa mtshams dang/ sgo rnam/

brgyan pa 'ad deg thams cad yongs su gang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang bos yang 'jig rten kyi khams kyi rgyud mtha' dang dbus med pa dang/

rmatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten khams ni rgya mtsho'i rnams // yangs dang mi mangs sna tshogs pa// nam mkha' dag gi dbyas la gnas// chos kyi dbanges
na tha ma dad// 'jig rten khams 'di rgyamatshon// zhing gi rgyud nu bsam mkhyab// tha dad man par rnam par gnas// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag go/ rnam pa sna tshogs shin tu
gnas// kha dog tha dad rab tu 'dug zhung gi rgyud dag rnam phye ba// 'jig rten khams kyi gang chen Na mo// lhanA dang dbyangs rnams tha dad de// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul ba//
zhang gi rgyud rnams rab tu snang// las kyis de dag shin tu bris/ kar ba rgyan mo'i dra ba dang// 'khor lo gleng gi dkyil 'khor dang 2 )pado'i debyibs 'dra 'byam klas pa// de dag
de yas kun nas bskor// rdo ya skyel mtshan btsugs pa dang// rdo rje kun nas kher gnas pa// 'byam klas bsam gyis ma khyab pas// de dag skyid na
kun nas bskor// 'od kyi dra ba bsam ma khyang mu tig mdog kyang rgya mtsho ste// zhing gi rgyud rnams kun kyang 'bar/ pad+mol yang kun gnas so// re re dag gi rgyud las
kyang : 'od zer dra ba bsam mkhyab// 'od zer dag gi zhing gyur cing// myamatsho'i phyogs rnams kun tu 'gas// zhing ga rgyud rnams thams cad kyi// dmagis pa kun
kyi sgo nas kyang// thams cad tshul la 'jug pa yas/ 'am zang tshul rnams rab tu snang// zhing gi rnams na gsam ma khyab// rgyud rnams ma zad shan tu 'byung// rgyan rnams
bstan pa tha dad do// drang song chen po'i byin rlabs so// zhing gi rgyud rnams de dag ni// 'jig rten bsam gyis ma khyab khams// kun nas 'du zhing rnam par 'jig/ 'byung zhing
'jig par de bzhin gyur// ji ltarashang la le ma' rnams // 'byung zhing ltung bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na/ 'ag rten khams rnams 'byung ba yin[）/ ]
ji ltarangashang ka skyes gnas nas/ shing thog sna tshogs 'byung nga ltar// de bzhin nang gi rgyud rnams na// sems can sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// ji ltar sa bon khyad par gyis/
00 'bras bu sna tshogs snang ba ltar// de bzhin las kyi khyad par gyis// sems can rnams dang zhar byung ngo// 'di bzhin rin chen rgyal po'i rnams // kha dog kun tu snang ba ltar///
sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas// de bzhin zhing rnam rab tu snang// klu'i rgyal po spyan gyis rnams )/ nam mkha' dbyings la ston pa ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas smon lam gyis/
zhing ga rnams ni 'byung ba yin// sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gas// sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar de bzhin sems can las rnams kyis// bsam gyis ma khyab zhang
'byung ngo// ji ltar ra mi'i gzugs kyis rnams // ra mi'i las kyis bris pa ltar// de bzhin zhing rnams 'di dag kun// sams kyis ri mor bris pa yani/ gsems
can lus kyi rnam padag/ ji ltar sems kyis brtags pa ltar/ de bzhin du ni zhing gi mtshams// thams cad las kyis rnam par bris// ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan

nas 'on mongs 'jigs pa che// bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang// bsod nams chung ba'i gnas kyang yin// zhang rnams la la lcags kyi dngos// la la zangs kyi

myong bar gyur// la la rin chen bdun las byung// la la sna tshogs gzugs su gnas// dge ba'i las kyis byung ba ste// sna tshogs khyam gyis rab tu brgyan// mi dang lha
rnams la la na// mtho ris dag gi 'jig rta na na// dge ba'i bsod nams 'bras bur ldan// dga' bde myong ba de dag ltos// spyi yi rtse mo gcig la yang// zhang rnams bye ba )

ma khyab/ )'du shes sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i rnams // bde dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong// zhing rnams la la mtha' yas 'od// sems can mang don kun nas gnas//
yongs byung rdo rje ut+pa la// sna tshogs rnam dag dri ma med// zhing rnams la la 'od zer dngos// 'od kyi 'khor la kun nas gnas// tsan dan gsar la yongs su byung//
'od 'phro san gyi mdog dang mnyam// zhing rnams la la nyi zla'i dngos// spos kyi gos kyis kun nas g.yogs// la la pad+me gcig la sta// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su
tshe rgyas: ba khal mtshan gyi ma deg dang 'od// zhing rnams rin chen dri ma med// mig 'phrul 'od kyang rab tu 'gyed: 'od zer dra bas snang bar byas// zhing rnams la la rdo rje dang//
pad+mo'i dngos su zlos la gnas// la la nor bu'i 'od kyang yani// zhing rnams yongs su dag la ltos// me tog klong las la la khyung// bsam gyis ma khyab zhing la ltos//
sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu khyab// byang chub sems dpa' 'od dang mnyam// la la me tog shing rnams dang// lo ma'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs te// nor bu'i sman gyi kun tu
khyab zhing gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag/ zhing rnams la la pad+mo'i dngos// snang ba bzang pos rnam par mdzes )sangs rgyas sprul pa'i gsung yang yanaM// zhing ga dra ba/
bsam ma khyab// rin chen cod pan sna tshogs dang// byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnams dang// gdan las de bzhin la la byung// 'or dang sprul pa'ang rab tu 'gyed/ grwa
tsan dan phye ma sna tshogs dang/ mdzod spu rnam par snang ba' 'od// sangs rgyas spyan gya 'od zer rnams // zhing rnams 'byung ba rab tu brjod// la la rgyan dang 'od gcig
par/ zhing rnams dri ma med par snang// la la rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu brgyano// la la zhing rnams bcu dag go )rkyen gyis mngon
par rab tu brgyan// la la zhing rnams stong dag kyang// rnam par brgyan tsang rab tu gnas// zhing gi rgyun mang bye ba yasi// zhing rnams la la rnam par bris// rgyan
dang tshul rnams tha dad par// sna tshogs mag yor lta bu r snang// brjod du med pa' zhing ga rnams // rkyen gcig la yang rab tu snang// 'od na gzhan dang gzhan bskye
ba sangs rgyas smon lam mthu las byung// smon lam rgya mtsho rnam mang bas// zhing rnams la la rnam par sbyangs/ de dag rgyun mang thams cad du// nang gi rgya mtshosha'i
tu snang/ kun tu bzang bo'i smon lam gyis// zhing rnams yongs su gang sbyangs pa// de dag kun la dus gsum gyi// zhing gyi rgyan rnams kun kyang snang/
zhing ga rgyud kyi rnam sprul pa// kye ma rgyal sras khyed na ltos// ma 'ongs pa ya zhing rnams kyang// rmi lam bzhin du de dag snang// ji sad phyogs bcu' 'dzagi rten gyi//
'dras pa'i zhing rnams rgyamatsho yang// zhing kacag nang na thams cad snang// mag yor bzhin du sprul pa yani/ dus sum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rnam sprul
zhing rnams gang yod pa// nang gi rgyud na 'di la snang// kun kyang nang na yod par gnas// zhing gi rdul gyi rtsa mo la// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// 'ong ba
de dag kun na snang// mag yor mtshen 'di med pa'o// la la rgya mtsho'i dbyibs su 'dug 'azhing brgya mang po de dag ltos)/ ri rab ri yaM dbyibs 'dra dang// 'jig
rten khams na bsam ma khyab// zhing rnams la la rnam par bas// mag yer dbyangs su gnas pa ste// sna tshogs shing ga dbyibs su gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun tu
khyab zhing rnams nor bu'i 'khor lo'i dbyibs// la la pad+mo'i dbyibs su gnas// yan lag brgyad pa sna tshogs mang// sna tshogasakha dog dri ma mad/ la la tre yi de phyis
lta bu grwa ya dbyibs dang khyad khyud de// la la grong khyer dbyibs su 'du// tshangs pa' lus su rab tu gnas// lha yi dbang po'i gtsug phud dbyabs// zla ba khas
ltar la la gnas// nor bu'i ra ya de byis su 'khod// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs kyang 'dra// spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i gling lta bu r// 'jig rten khams rnams rab tuganas
'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbyibs 'dra ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sbyangs// 'khor le bkra shas dbyibs lta bu // 'jig rten la la dkyil 'khor te/ mdzod sbya'i
spyi gtsug dbyibs lta bu // la la mgo ga tshul yang 'dra// sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs lta bu // la la rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug/ 'od 'phro ra la dbyibs kyang 'dra// byang chub
sa mas dpas kun tu gang// zhing rnams la la seng ge'i dbyibs// nor bu'i gi char mngon bsgrubs pa// gzugs dang dbyibs na du ma ste// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab
tu gnas// zhing gi rgyud na gcig la yang// zhang ga dbyabs rnams ma zad pa// rab tu gnas pa byin rlabs dang// sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis byung// zhung rnams
la la bskal pa tsam// la la bskal pa bcu pa ste// zhing rnams la la rdul mnyam pa'i// bskal pa bye bar brjod pa yin// la la bskal pa gcig la yang// 'di rnams mang po
'byung bar snang// tshad med grangs kyang mad pa ya/'jig pa de bzhin bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas med// zhing rnams la la bsangs
rgyas bcas// la la'i zhing na sangs rgyas gcige/ la la sangs rgyas mang po'o// sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing rnams dang// 'jagerten gzhan gyi khams su yang// sangs rgyas
sprul pa gshegs mdzad cing// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// 'pho dang 'byung dang sku tshe dang// byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya dang// bdud kyi ste dag 'dul ba dang// chos
'tsho kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ston// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor pa// 'jig rten kun na tha mi dad//
N+NaM sangs rgyas zhing rnams re rer yang// rgyal ba gcig ni skye 'gyur te// lo grangs bye ba phrag stong du// chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston// sems can snod du ma gyur la// sangs
rgyas ston pa ma mdzad de// sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas na// de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong// sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing ga rnams // 'di rnams re re dag tu yang/ 3
sangs rgyas bye ba bsam ma khyab/ )rgyal ba rnams na rab tu skye// rgyal ba so so de dag na// sprul pa mang po rang 'gyad cing// chos kyi dbus na khyab mdzad nas// sems can
ma rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// zhing rnams la la 'od mad de// mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che// reg na sdug bsngal spu gru 'dra// blta na mi bzad skya yang g.ya'// zhing rnams la
la lha 'od can// la la khyim gyi 'od can te// la la nyi zla'i 'od dang ldan// zhing ga dri ba bsam ma khyab// zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od// shang ga 'od can dra ma mad// gang du
sdug bsngal ma mthong ba// de dag sems can dge bas byung// la la ra ya 'od can te// zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od// la la mar me'i 'od can te// sems can rnams
kyi las kyis byung// zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'od// byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang// zhing rnams la la pad+mo' 'od// 'od 'phro 'od can rab tu mdzes// zhing
rnams la la ma rtog 'od// spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa'ang yod// spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro can// smon lam dbang gis rnam par sbyangs// zhing rnams la la sprin 'od
can nor bu'i ge cha'i 'od kyis gsal// sangs rgyas byin gyi brlabs kyis snang// yade du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs ldan// na chen cod pan 'od dang ldan// rdo rdzogasar gyi 'od
kyis snang// yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can// de dag na na sdug bsngal mad// thams cad rgyan gyi 'od can dang// zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od// la la snying po
byang chub 'od///gakhor rnams kun tu rab tu snang// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba can// sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon par yog kun tu 'od kyis rab tu snang//
chos kyi dbying sa dang mnyam pa'i bodo// tshang+ga rnams la la 'jigs sgracan/ mi bzad 'jigs pa'i nga ro can// rtsa bcing brlang ba sgra rnams dang// yid myong 'jigs pachen po sgrog/
dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang// gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams // mya ngan mtsho zhing gi rnams // nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung// la la dag na yid 'ong
sgra dga' bar byed cing ston 'dem pa// dge ba'i las dang 'bras bu'i dbyangs// zhing gi 'khor na ra ba chu sgrog/ lal brgya byin lha dbang dbyangs// gzhan dag
tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te// 'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang// 'kha'i zhing na rab tu grag/ zhing rnams la la sngon gyi sgra// rin chen rgya mtsho' 'od zer dang// nor bu'i
shing gi gzugs sgra dang// rol mo'i sgra yis kun tu khyab// 'od zer glong gi sgra rnams dang// sangs rgyas sprul pa mi khrid dang// byang chub sa ma sa dpa'i sgra dag dang// 'od
ra sgra ni snyan pa 'byung/ d+hAchos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang// kha cig ni ngan bsam yas pagi/ smon lam rgya mtsho'i nga rdo dang// spyod pa'i sgra yang sAn pa 'byung// dus
0 gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang// de dag zhing rnams 'byung ba'i sgra// zad pa med pa'i dbyangs su sgrog )sangs rgyas rnams kyi
stobs sgra dang// tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin// chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang// kha cig shing na rab tu rgyag/ kun tu bzang po'i sgo na lam gyi// sgran shing rnams rtse
ba 'byin// bskal par gnas shing rab tu sgrog sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zad mishes// zhing gi dbyings rnams la la na// sangs rgyasarnam par sprul pa yi// sgra/
yas chos kyi dbyings bkang ba/ de dag kun na rab tu grag shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes byab las/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par dgod pa
shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste la bu dgu pa'o/// bam po bcu gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu dag sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de bas kyang pha snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshul jim med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su 'jig
rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgo zhes bya ba de ni rin po che'i pa blo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rnam par dag cing kun nason
@##// mongs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa ) gzhi rgyun mthapa/
ya sa pas brgyan ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsumagyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa//
ri rab dang/ grong khyer dang/ khang khyim dri ma med cing 'od rnam par dag par snang bas brgyan pa/ sras dang ) sgom dang/ gos kyi longs spyod
yid kyis bsam pas 'byung ba rgyan gyi rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang la gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na) spos chu'i rgya mtsho/
! 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las me tog gi ri rab me tog 'od 'phroba'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'in po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste/
ri rab de'i stangan nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba smos kyirgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgreng ba'i rgyan can/ mi
tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tu med pa 'phreng ba rnam par bris pa/ nor bu'i khang ba brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa rin po che'i rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas
ba0 brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog puN+Da ri ka dpag tu med pa'i 'phreng gis kun nas bskor ba// sbos dang rin po che'i nga blo mang po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyis rab tu/
brgyan pa/ rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sbyin dpag tu med bas kun nas rgyas pa ) spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sngon dpag tu med pas kun nas snang
bar byas pa/ grong khyer byeb khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltaranags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor

ni po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs legs na[）]grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba mi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khra khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i ba khor gyis
bskor ba/ ni po che 'ba' zhig las byas pa/ chudang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa// rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tags dang phru ma'i ba bdun gyis brgyan cing
kun nas bskor ba/ 'an po chab 'obs spos chus gang ba rin po che'i me tog ut+pal dang/ padodang/ chu mud dang/ me tog puN+Dar kas rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis
kun nas bskor ba/ shing rta la'i 'phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po 'byin pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ ni po che'i rgyan dang khang pa brtsegs pas ra bcu brgyan pa/ stang
@#/ nas gser gyi dra ba dang/ dril bu'i dra ba dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba'i dra ba dang/ in+d+ra nI la'i dra ba dang/ rdo rje'i pad+mo'i dra bas kun nas yog pa//
rin po che shing drung me tog gi dra bdang ro'o mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa/ ) sos dang 'phreng ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yod de/ de'i 'khor
kun na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong phrag bcu yod de/ sgo de ga thams cad kyang ban po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste/ sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang na po che'i rdo'i rgyal
mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// bza' shing gi re ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste/ bzang shing gi ra ba de dag thams
cad kyang smos dang rin po che'i snatshogs kun nas lces kyi dri kun tu 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba na rjes
bya ba der mir skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnamapar smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste/ nam mkha' las rgyu ba mi dang lha mnyam du sbyod pa yid bzhin gyi yul la longs sbyod pa sha stag
de nas lho phyogs logs na lha'i grong khyongashong gi me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba yod do// denas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba
yod do// de nas lho phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer dordzo'i dbal snatshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do// de nas lho phyogs logs na dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med/
khang babrang po zhes bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su 'dab ma bzang bo'i grong khyer
rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba'i bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyun bzang bo sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du mas brgyan pa nas/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stoshi'akhor gyis bsko
ba'i bar du ste/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor 'an po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ snying po byang chub rin po che'i mi tog rnam par snang ba zhi bya ba ni
po che thams cad kyangeshing yal ga sdug cing rgya che ba'i da kyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po tsho'i ma togagazugA dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po shin tu rgyas ba/
spos dang ma mar rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i 'phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i na kun tu bkram pa// rin po che'i 'od thur du 'gro bas shing kun tu khyab ngo//
@#/ ) 'od kyi dkyilo 'khor rnam par dag pa'i spyan gyis brgyan pa// phyogs bcu'i 'od zer mang pos rnam par snang bar byas pa/ ) rgyan thams cad rin po che
snatshogs mang pos smras pa/ rol mo thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu 'byung ba ) nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa ba lus 'byung ba/ phyogs bcu'i me tog
sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung ba yod de/ de'i mdun du pad+mo chen po me tog gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa/ (rtsa ba sos dang
na po tshadang/ rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la zug pa// chub rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa// rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i 'dab ma can//

rini po che 'od 'phro ba dang sos kyi khri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ ) snying po la rin po che kha dog maTha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phug bcu'i
'khor gyis bskor ba/ phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen bo thabatu 'byed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo// 'jig Ne/

laM gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul[“]shin tu phra ba snyad byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rib bcu'i rngul shin tu phra bsnyad de dag las bskal pa'i thog ma pa/
ba ba/ thams cad kyi thog mar than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan thams cad kyi bo'i ba kyi dbyangs shes bya rgyu/
des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de

lo brgya na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba tsho [） ]nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de yang rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur
te 'di ltar na po ti'i bong 'phro ba'i na bsam gyis mkhyab par b tu gtong pa'i snying po can du gyur nas ) sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byed//
phyogs bcu ngag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed/ gzhal med khang dang khyim gyi rdal thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed rin po che'i me tog dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
gyi sngon yang rab tu 'gyed/ sams can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra dang/ dus gsumagyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'abatu
gtong ba'i sgra dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang/ spyod pa dang/ 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra dang/ sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'onges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to de dag tidithazhin gshegs pa skye bab ltas te/
rgyan de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyidabang po rnams kyis khong du chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yong sa su smin
pa dang/ sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa dang/ snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol ba de dag thamAcad kyang ltas sngon du byung bas yang dag nga la bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi bor rab kyi dang la zhes byab mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can da sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros
bat+taM pa sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs dang/ gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam pa dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing bril gyis gasgo/
zla pa mtshan 'an po ma'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du ston pa//

sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mthu' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngon gyis khyab par mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas
pa rab tu gtong ba de pado chen po de la mngon par byung bar gyur to// ji ltar sbos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab tu gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan/
gser shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya bab rtse mo la/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig

gyi khams dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang ni rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs par kun nas snang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshulargya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdulashin tu phra pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam smras pa dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngodo// de
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ra rab dang la gyi sngon gyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams cad yongs su bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer
sangs rgyas kyi snying gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rab tu bkye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba thams cad yang dag pa'i bskul
to bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ro bor rab dbal gyi sprin gyi 'od zer de dag bkye ma thag tu de'i mod la semasacanathams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thamasaM
cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur ) bsgribs pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bsal/ sangs rgyas blta ba la bsgribs ba'i re thams cad kyang
rnam par bcom/ sems can thamasacad kyi rtog pa yang rnam par dag/ dge ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung/ mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang
yongs su dag/ mi khom pa dang/ ngan song dang/ ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par bsal/ lus dang sems kyi gnod
ba thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhil ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/
de dag 'od zer des yang dag par bskul ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder 'dong bar
gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i 'od ces bya ba der rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste/ de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// de la bu ze brjid chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yod/
ba do/ rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med phalta na bzang ba la sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos ) sangs rgyas kyi ma ]
par 'phrul pa mthong nas 1 sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyus chos bcu khong du chud par gyur to/ )bcu gang zhen )'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkya'i 'khor rtsis bya/
ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta sta/ tshul du
pa'i srin gyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa po khong du chudad// ni/
lta ste/ sgra'i sngan gyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snyingarjechen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i
dgabab chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ tshul gyi gzhi rgya chen po
mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong duchud do// 'di lta ste )mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi sgo
chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yi pags kyi 'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs shes bya ba'i so so yang dag par ra ga pa'i
mingashes chen po'i sgo kheng du chud do// de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de chos kyi snangal chen po thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smas pa nyi ma mang po steng gi rnams // mkha' la mngon par 'thags pa bzhin// snying po byang chub dri med la/
sangs rgyas bod ni shin tu snang// bskal pa bye ba stong dag gis// mgon po 'jig rten byung ba na// sangs rgyus yang dag skyes pa rnams // rgyal ba sku ni rab tu snang//
ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer 'a// sangs rgyas sngon na bsam mi khyab// gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gzhag/ 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams rab/
bkye ba// 'od zer spyin la zad mi shes/ 'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag 'a sa// 'od zer rnams ni dri med pa//
sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'gengs ltos// sangs rgyas gsung na yid 'ong ba// 'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags// 'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan/
sa[/]lag tu/ sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod/ sangs rgyas 'od kyi sa pog da yis/ 3sems can kun kyang bde bar bsgyur// sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi// 'gro ba kun kyang/
dga' ba skyes// byang chub sems dang 'i sprin kyi rnams // rin chen sA na rnams rab 'byed cing// bstod pa'i sAn gyis rgyal ba'i drung/ phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ongs/ snying
po byang chub bde la yang// sgra yi rgya mtsho zab mo grag/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// kun kyang srid zhu ldan gyur te// dga'
ting shin tu mos byas shing// chos kyi rgyal po bltaba'i phyir// 'jig rten mgon gyi drung du 'dong// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag ) rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa
'di brjod pa 'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dang 'a gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun tu shin tu grag par gyur to// de nas rgyal
po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smas pa ) zhang blon rnams dang
gzhon nu ngang )/ rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang/ tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du// yul ma rnams kyang kun 'dus shig/ grong khyer rnams ni kun tu yang/ rngasgra dag gis myur du sgrogs//
kun kyang mthun par lhan cig tu// rgyal ba bal ba'i phyir deng zhig/ sar rnams thams cad kun tu yang// dge ba dral gyi sgra sgrogs se// bu dang chung
ma 'khor bcas pa// rgyal ba bltaba'i phyir yang 'deng// grong khyer rnams kyang rgyan par gyis// rgyan rnams kun kyang kun tu res// rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams / )nodo
bu sna tshogs brgyan pa sbrengs// rin chen dra ba'i zla ze rnams // nam mkha'i dkyil du bre bar gyis// nam mkha' 'di las thams cad du// sil snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung/
lam gyi srang yang rgyanapar gyis// rin chen char yang kun tu thob// bzhon pa rin chen bstad par gyis// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo// rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams
kyis sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob cig/ rgyan gyi spron rnams thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dgab par gyis// thos dang pad+mo'i 'od kyi sprin// me
tog gdugasa rnams bsam yas dang// sa mo do dang 'phreng sngon rnams // gos kyi sprin gyi char phob cig/ rab rnams dang sbos kyi ri// nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgyan pa 'a gyis/ )
dri med tsan dan phyi ma'i rnams // nam mkha'i dkyil la rab tu ston// nor bu'i 'phreng dang me tog 'phreng// rin chen 'phreng ba dri med dang// rin chen sgron ma'i srin gyi rnams / rnam
mkha'i dbyings la sgrub par gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la// dga' shing sbyo ba'i sems bskyed de// bu dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams // rgyal ba blta phyir kun/
'dong ngo/ de nas rgyal bu bltan dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la sogs pa bud med stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ gzi brjid chen po la
sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang blo gros kyi stobs la sogs pa blon po stong phrag drug cu dang/ de dag la sogs pa 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis bskor cing
mdun du bdar te/ grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas de'i 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dbyings su mngon par 'phags te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang//
rgyal po'i mthu chen pos nam mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi sngon thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do) )lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas kyang/ lha'i dbang po rab mtsho ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
(lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas ) phyogs gcig tu 'khod
de//klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa nas kyang/ klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma med pa ba 'od ces byab klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig[） ]gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal
rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpa' bos rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod sbyin bye ba [: ]/ sa ba[”]bdun cu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang
bzang po nas skyong sde dri za'i rgyal po blta na dga' ba zhes bya ba dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig/ lha ma yAn gyi grong khyer 'khor lo' tshon nas kyang ) lha ma
yan gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las sems dpa' zhes bya ba lha ma yin bya ba stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba de nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang

po'i lte ba nas kyang/ nam mkha' lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig/ mi'am ci'i grong khyer rtsa ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang/
mi bam rtsi'i dbang po rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig/ lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po che rdo rje su ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang/ lto 'phye chen po'i
dbang po rin po che grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig/ rmongs pa'i grong khyer rgyun bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang/
tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo/
ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khed do/ de dag//
la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi bakhor dang bcas pa dag nas/ sems can gyi ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang nge 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams
cad kyi ri bo ni rab kyi dpal gyis sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang ste bar bzung ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i
chos rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'i 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams rdulashin tu phra ba snyad dang bcas pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su bstan to// de nas byang
chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di bstan pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi bo ra rib kyi dpal gyis sngon yang dag par
bsgrubs pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob yod/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes
kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ )'di lta ste/ thog ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/
chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po mige rnam par dag pa la shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang
zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang nga rang tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i
spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sgo yangs banas snang bo zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo//
'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying bo dang mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho ye shes snang bar tuklob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus
med par sbrul pas brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med par rab tu 'jug pa la mngon
bar sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho'i sngon gyi rgyun yang dag par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho la/
tu thob bo/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang ) 'gro ba thams cad/
mngon du bstan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// de nas khyadachub sems dpang gabarjid chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo ni reb kyi
dpal gyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la yeshes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'dedag sbas so// rgyal ba'i chos nyid 'di thos
nas: bdag gi ye shes snang ba skyes// des ni sangs rgyas sngon skyed pa/ rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong// sku tshe kun tu ji lta bu r// phun sum tshogs
'gyur kun kyang mthong// mtshan gyi rnam pa rnam dmigs dang// gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes// sngon chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyor spyad de//
sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang mchod nas// zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// sku yi rgya mtsho mang po dag/ rgya chen yongasu kun btang zhing
spyod pa'i dam pa rnab spyad do// rgya mtsho'i zhong ya shin tu sbyangs// snyan dngashangs mang rgya mtsho dang/ phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te// rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'o 'o
btang zhing// zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// shing rnams so so re re la// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// byang chub spyod pa rab spyod de// gang gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs//
kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgyas// spyod pa rgya mtsho kun sbyadanas// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du// zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs// ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas// timo'i
dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'od snang bas// sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong// byang chub 'tshang rgyazhi ba yi// chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i//
shing gi rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams // dri med 'od can kun kyang mathong// sangs rgyas kun gyi cinarlabs kyis/ byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa rnams //
! de ltar bdag gis spyad par bya/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de'i tshe) byang chub sems dpa' gabri brjide chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa yon tan thams ]
[/ cad kyi sde ba la rab dpal gyi sngon de mthong ba dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par khong du chud de/ 'jig rten thams cad ni snang bar byed//

sngon gyi sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho ni rab tu rjod/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rab tu sgrog/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul rishin tu rjod [） ]ngos kyi dbyings thugs

cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su sbyang ba napeshin tu ston) sAng po byang chub thams cad la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni reb tu brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi stobu/
dngam bsnyengs pa dang// shes thamo dod pa nisi tu rjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni rab tu rjod/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam
gyis ma khyab pa mi+in tu ston) sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan ni reb tu ston byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam ni mngon par sgrub

pa byed cing/ sems can ri reb kyi rduli na tu phra ba med byang chub sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi gong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin du btsud do/[”]
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis ) byar chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs ba/ sems
k+kha/ @#/ can kun la phan ba'i phyir// byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa/ )gzi brjid che'i gas so legs// bsod nams snying po grags pa che// snang ba/
khyod kyis rab tu non// chos kyi dbyings na khyab byas shing// bsod nams chen po sgra ldan pagi )sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ zhing
gtsugan yang spyod spyad cing// nga yi yingashesaji lta bu r// khyod kyis mthong ba de ltar 'gyur// tshul 'di kun nas shes par na// brtson 'grus chung dus minus te// brtson 'grus stobs
chen ldan pa'i rnams // rgya mtsho'i khong rnams dag par byed// thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du// bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod ba// rgya mtsho'i gong gi rgyan gyi rnams // de la 'di 'drar
ba tu 'gyur// sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad byed cing// 'khor kyang skyo ba med pa'i rnams // de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ bskal pa phyi ma'i
mthar thug pas// rgyal ba re rer mchod byed kyang/ de gang gi sems la skyo med pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun// khyod kyi smon
lam dbang gis gsal// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnamasan// khyed kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag/ mtha' dang dbusamed rgya mtsho la//
0/ blochen gang naMms 'jug pa na// de dag tshul 'di'i gnas par 'gyur// nga la mchod pa byas pas kyang// gzi brjid chen po'i stobs chen gyis// sems cana' ribardul mnyam nga//
byang chub yongs su smin par byas// byang chub semasadapa' grags chen dag/ kun tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams dngos kyi dbyings ni kun bakang zhing// zhing gi rgya mtsho dag par byed/
) kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bskal pa rgyan chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la// bskal pa bar ma chu klung gang+ga'i bye ma snyed cig byung ste/ de'i dus na rnams kyi tshe yang
bskal pa bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te/ rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri rab dpal gyi sngon de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to// de
yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ( de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i sman bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten dunags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po me'i
ma tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i sman bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos
mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo// ye shes rgya mtsho chen po 'byin gyi rlabs dang chos kyi klong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo//
kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang zab tu thob bo// dmagos pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis
rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po yang rab tu thob bo// )sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

yon tan rgya mtsho dang byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo//
rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus shes bya ba'ishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob bo// chags pa med pa'i de byings rnam da ra snang ba'i rjes su
song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo// rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i glong la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag pa ra rige pa yang rab tu thob
po sa ngas rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya bab ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu thob bo// de dag la sogs pa chas kyi sgo stong phrag bcu
(kun nas non par gyur te// denas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de sbas pa//
bskal pa bye ba bsam gyi mi khyab tu// 'jig rten gtso yi dam pa shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas zhing bad sems can thob rab thob// de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong/
sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab bkye ba/[） ]kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnams par dug/ 'od zer sngon gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab kun tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed//
'od kyi rig pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye// 'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi ]/phan tshun sri zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong//
sprul pa'i dra ba'i spron rnams bsam mi khyab// rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun kyang gang byas shing// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab
cu ston/ ) rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas// dbyangs sngon bkye bas nam mkha' kun bkang zhing// mun nagachen po kun nas snang bar byed// dmyal ba'i sdug baisngal
kun kyang rnam par sel// sangs rgyas dbyang sani phyogs rnams bcu pa nas// sems can rnams kyi sngon dge rgya mtsho rnams // thams cad dbyangs kyis kun tu sgra yang sgrog
sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ltos// sangs rgyas 'khor rnamasargya mtsho rgya che ba// mtha' dang dbus med yang dag rab tu byung// de nas rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//
yaglu// sems can rgya mtsho ma zad rnam sa kyang 'dul// tshad med rnam par 'phrul ba dag la ltos// zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs//
zla de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med// sems can don du rnam par mngon sangs rgyas// dga' shing mos par kun kyang 'dong bar gyis// dge ba'i de dang/
sri zhu spro ba yis// bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo// de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing// 'gro
ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cing// chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te/ de thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to// de dpa
pha dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sngun lnga sa nam mkha' thams
cad du kun nas yog par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo// 'ongs pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyin bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs
pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri mamed pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to// des de thos nas tshul
thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab tu skyes so// ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i
dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la yang shugs bar gyur to// shing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas
rnam par dag nga 'i dpa'i dkyil 'khob la yang rab tu zhugs so/ spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sun dri ma med pa'i bod kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par
gyur to// rjes su rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba la yang rjes su rtogs par gyur te/ 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen/
po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu shugs so// rang byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang zhi tu snang bar gyur to// smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa lo mos pa rgya mtsho'isnying
po'i rgyun lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam par dag nga ra gyur to/// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngan po brang/
po rgyan gyi rgyal pos/ byang chung sems dang ba gzi brjodachen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// legs pa yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can// sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yud
dag gnas// sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i// rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung// chos kyi
'tsho dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te/ )sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi byed nga 'i// bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan
mthong ba// ye shes sa yang mi brang non par gyur// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul// grags pa chen po yangs su rgyas par byed// gzungs kyi tshul sku
rgya mtsho mang po dang// so so yang dag rig tshul mi srid dang// spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs pas/ )gzhal med shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin
gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par bgyur// smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te// rnam 'phrul 'da' 'phar du 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab// chos
'a dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyang byas te// sangs rgyas sprin la rnam par lta bar gyis/ rgya mtsho'i shing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs//
nga yi byang chub spyod la 'jug par gyis// sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po ya/ spyod pa ngasar ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa/ de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis// ri mA
po rer sangs rgyas mang po dus// rgya mtsho brgya ma shin tu mchod pa byas// sngon spyad de yi 'bras bu 'di yin te// 'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos// las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad
rgya chen dang// zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang// smon lam bsam yas go bgos pas na// 'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing// zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mtsho sbyangs byas nas// bskal pa bcam klas kun tu spyad byas shing/ rgyal ba'i yon tan 'od chen mnga' bar 'gyur/
dkye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ debahin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang
dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gabri brjid chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas
dpa zhes bya ba der yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 2phags shing hril gyis mi non pa des bya ba gsum ba byung bar gyur te/ des deb
gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ 'khor thams cad dang dpung gi yan 'a gangaha'i tshogs dang/ rin po mi bdun dang/ grong gi mi dang
yul mi'i bcas te ) bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phagasangashing hril gyisam non pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas/ des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po
mi'i khang pa brtsegs pa spros dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul la// der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu lta nga'i spyod pa// byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa snang
ba zhes bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdulangahAn tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa brang yang dag par ba shad bar gyur to// de khros nas byang chub sems
dba' gzi brjid chen pos bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ming nge 'dzani rab tu thob bo// ting nge 'dzin de thob de thob pas kyang dus gsum gyisabyang chub sems dpa' bsu
cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtshomangon du gyur to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams rgya mtshoshin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pas da 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po latshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// yon tan ngasod nams kun gyi gabri brjid can//
byang chub mchog tu smon lam yid ldan pa// 'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya mtsho yis// nga yi drung du khyod 'ongs legs so legs/ )snying rje'i snying pa khyod ni sems can rnams //
sdug bsngal gyur pa kun grol don zhugs pas/ 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa'i
rnams // skyo med yid kyis sbyad pa sbyong padog/ mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i// ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur// de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang
po ya/ mthu chen smon lam spyod par thugs pas na// bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te/ )bsonganams 'byung gnas bsod nams mchog kyang yani//
bsam gyi mi khyab rgyal ba rgyam dag/ mtha' dang dbus med mang po khyod kyis shes// mtha' dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par
'gyur// khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong// de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang// sngon chad ji ltar
) )spyad pa bzhin du mthong// 'di tshul rgya mtsho 'di la su zhugs shing// ye shes sa la su dag gnas gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing//
thams cad gzigs par gdon mi za bar 'gyur// khyod ni shing kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi// bskal pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa spyad byas nasaM// rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams //
bslabs nas rang byung nyid du gyur bar 'ong// zhing rnamasargya mtsho yongs su dag pa rnams // phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar bathong ba zhin// khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te//
smon lam kun kyang ni tu sgrog par 'gyur// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang// khyod kyi smon lam thosagyur rab tu dga'// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag
gis byang chub mchog la rab tu bajug par 'gyur// mtha' dang dbus med zhing rnams 'byam klas par// bskal pa rgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod// kun tu bzang po'i
spyod pa thams cad dang// smon lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyis// nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i ma tog rgyas ba de nyid du de bzhin

gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dang bu zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to// rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas rgya mtsho'i steng na lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i
mtha0/ gnas shes bya bar phyin te/ der bsod nams dri mamed pa'i dang la zhes bya ba'i [“]lhab rgyal po chen por gyuratod/ de nas de lca'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te
rin po che'i me tog sngon gyi char 'bebs shing/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan padro'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo )/ de ru bcomo
ldan 'das de bzhAn gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gyis myul pa ngas ba'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra
