ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'apo dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to// des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob go dngosaM thams cad kyi
tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su ya nga zhugs par gyur to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu
ba'o// bam po bcu gsum pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shesaM/
gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa[） ]sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dugapa ) 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun
tu bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni yongs su 'jin pa/ gnyan 'phrul
dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni lhan cig byed pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa//
stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dugapa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas kyi dam pa/) mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi de bya
ltar 'dug pa/ gling na byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa ) grong rdal ni mdzod ma tha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa//
tshu bza'ashing gi ra ba ni mya ngan dang bral ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa// khang pa brtse gas pa ni kun nas smad du med pa ) 'jig rten gyi khams rang
bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te ) 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di lta
de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming mthun pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su
'jug pa sha stag dang/ gzhung de bzhin du byang chub semasadapa' dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par mang mthun pa//
thams cad nyan thos kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'jug pasha stag dang/ gzhung de bzhan du lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/
nam mkha' ldang dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang/ mi ma yin nga lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par mid mthun pa thams cad kyang
mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyitshog

kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i snyan dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa'o// snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
[p]/ )par grol ba chen po rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skye'o dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang ) rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam

par grol brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin phru ba
snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi brla dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi mA

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa
ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnamapar snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi dpral ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug/

rang bzhin gyis bod gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'o// byang chub kyi lam rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul

shin tu phub snyed kyi smiMn tshugs dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rjelashin tu thub
med kyi mig dang ldan pa'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa snyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho banu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rtswa
ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shangs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna dang
ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rtse dang ldan pago/
de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa

thugs kyi khams gang chon mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba nyid kyi yid dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtsamatshornam

par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi sku dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba dang/ nyamathos dang/
)rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyamatshobacu'i rdul ne tu phya ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub semasadapa'i dad pa'i dbang po rgyu

mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshobacu'i rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra pa snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o//
chos kyi ri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdu'apin tu phra ba snyad kyi skom dang ldan pa'o// sems can yongs sun pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra
ba snyed sras dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'o sngon 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtshobacu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog par kheb sa pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi na rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon pa

'bab pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshobacu'i rdulangashin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o// 'jig rten gyi ngamasargya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtshobacub rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnamapar bkram pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang ) la mtshan dang/ ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brtsan+d+ri rdul)

ma cu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khengs nga ra bkang ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ri ni kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul na tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o//
de bzhin du gzugs dang/ sgra dang// dri dang/ ro dang/ reg byadang/ chos kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan
pa'o/ mig sna tshogs kyin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shAretu phra ba snyad kyi snying po dang ldan nga 'od )de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/

lus dang ) yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ )kha dog gi chu rgya mtshor re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang/
me tog ut+pa la dad/ pad+modang/ ku mu dadang/ pud+d+hA ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ me tog utra la de dag re

ji dang/ me tog put+tA ri ka de dag re re la'ang me tog ut+pa la'i 'khor dang/ me tog put+tA ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa ste

mi rtogazhut+pa la dang/ me tog puN+Da ri ka'i bar de dag re re 'das kyang 'jigarten gyi khams ri rab rnam par phye ba'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba steng mngon par byung ba dag ste/
'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'chinadang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pablob tshul dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gamab tshul mang po dag kyang mngon par/

za 'thon pa sha stagago/ ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la khadog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems canagang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ngam khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyi
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa khas/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba bam/ nang gi'am phyi'i 'am/ che ba 'am/ chung
ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am: thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad khongasan snyang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong
bas/ de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri deng/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ sa
kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes bar bya'o// ci'i phyir mig gi rgya mtsho la mig ga chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhen/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'byung ba dang khrus byed pa de dag
thams cad kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phrab snyed dgan/ gzugs su snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ nga la
ba/byung ba 'am// nang gi kham ) phyi'i 'am/ che ba bam/ chung ba bam/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod

phade dag thams cad nang na snyang bar rang rang gi mig dang gzhan gyi mig gis mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgyamatsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/

lce dang lus dang/ yad kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra ba snyed kyis

lhashin tu brgyan pa ste sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra ba steng kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus canano//

chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rbabamo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig
rten gyi kham rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung ba'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rtenagyi khams rgyamatsho de bzhin
gshegs pa'i phyag rtsi mthol gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dil/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho zhes bya len//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i

nangan rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya/

mtsho b.rub rdul shinatu phra ba seng rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na nam mkha'i de byings rgya mtsho sa mtshams yongs su chad pa med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu

phru ba stong rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na nu'i

khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho ni bo che'i snying po can zhes bya ba/

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na me togamtshan mamed pa las skyes ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ngu chu rdul gan tu phra
ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshotsam gyi thag rgyu dang ldan pa dag ste/
ma 0 de dag gi steng na'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthile kyi snying po la rab tuganas ba de la/ de bzhi/
gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil kyi snying pa la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/ delta de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rini yon tshad med
ba dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulapashin tu phra ba snyad dugan/ yon tan ji snyed yod pa'i
yon tan de snying ni 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba tshangs
ba'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu rtsa ba skyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de//
'jig rten gyi khams dri ba kun tu bzang bo de su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spo mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang ldan
ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po'i khri 'phang du 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho b.ru'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid dang ldan pa'o// 'jage rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten gyi khamasar+yamatsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan ba'o// ci'i phyi na 'jig rten gyi khams ni ri ba kun tu bzang po de
la kun tu bzang bo zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab kun tu bzang po de na yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang med de/ der sems canagang ji snyed skyes ba de dag A
cad chos gang dang gang la yongs sudamigs pa byed pa'i dmigs pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu
bzang po de la kun bzang po zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ri ni de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
don yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyad kyi yon tan ni 'jig rten gyi khama'i ba kun tu bzang po de na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba kun tu bzang bo ri na stong gsum gyi stong
chen po 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhe bya bgazhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig/
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnamapar dgod pa 'jig rten
[p/]gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/ de bzhin du klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lhab
dang/ mi 'am ci deng/ lho phya chen po dang/ mi deng/ mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi rnam bar dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho bcu'i rjel shin tu phra ba snyed la pa rab tu gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang ba dang/ rang sangs
rgyas dang/ nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// stong gsumagyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin
pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang/ 'dushes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lamagyi rgyud la tha dad pa med do// skye gnas tha dad pa medad)/ thil pa grwa dad pa
med do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la/ ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams yongs su 'dzin pa der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la ngan song gyi 'jig pa'ang med/ theg pa dman par ltung ba'i 'jig pa'ang mod ser snar
ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod pa snang ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med dkyelar ltang ba'i
'jig pa'ang med/ rnam par 'khrug par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med ) shes rab chal par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med pas de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gyi stong
chen ngo bo 'jig rten gyi khams la yongasasu 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yon rmar tshad med pa mang bo
dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de steng skye yon tan ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams yongs su
'dzin pan yod do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba' thuladaga'i
lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasamang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong
gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bod rgya mtsho mang po dang ma 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer
ma/ gyi dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral la/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang ma ba phral lo/
rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi'akhor lo 'khor ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo//
rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtshodang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad phud dud du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral la[）]/
rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang ma 'bral la// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed
cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa// gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulanatu phra ba nyid la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/ stong
gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig skyed pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs
shing ! 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag
thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lanatsagi spyod pa de la lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yon tan
dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gnyis
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lcan tsage spyod pa de na yod do// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cige sbyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu
skyed pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lhagolus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba ste da ( 'khor gyi bsko
ba yod de/ stong ga'i jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ bde ba yapa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyanargya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed
kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha' yas kyi chos kyi sku 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba/ chos kyi dbyings
rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brgyan pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya bder/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes
pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdu'i na tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang/
bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa
nas/ yerashes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul shin thu ba snyed kyi bar la rab tu gnas pa mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba nyid la rab tu gnas pa/ sems can yongs susaMn par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/
byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu bskyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes
bya ba ro la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang bo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu sba ba snying dgon/ chos kyi khams rgya mtsho
dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i khams rgya mtsho dang// sems can gyi khams rgya
mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thamasacang kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogapa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni yon
tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu
spyod pa na yod do// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de na gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dem pa zhes bya mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling

bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba ser kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyidam pa zhes bya ba de ni/

snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyun 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyun de dag re re la yang seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed 'ab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i rgyan de dga'e re la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul ngashAne
tu phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/ gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der/ sems can gang ji snyid skyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dang 'a kun tu
bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sgomatha' yas pa nas mngon par sgrub pa'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rduli na tu phra bsnyeng la rab tu gnas pa sha stag
go ci'i phyir na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
'dzin pa na/ sems can rnams kyi babyang gnas dang gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog tu bya bas na/ de'i phyirje gling ba'i
ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhesaM bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni
yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling bzhi pa9[']'jig rten gyi khar
khya@#// gnas kyi dam pa de yod do// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces byang

sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su bdug pa// gling 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulapashin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba de
ni'on po mi'i rba khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'jug pa rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho bcu'i rdul we tu pra baed kyis kun nas bsko ba/ de bzhin gshegs pat+ti ye shes kyi 'od zer

gyi dra ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho b.ru'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khyab pa ngos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
mngon par brlan ba ste/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho Ang po byang chub

kyi rgyan gyi dam par gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu thu ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa tha dad pas 'byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rngulashin tu phra
ba snyed la mkhas pa// chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thami dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod nga pasha stag go

mtshan de labyang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi shing nam mkha'i rten ces bya ba byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan payod de/ der sang cig skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
bas de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang
ldan pa ste mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jigarten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yon tan gang ji snying yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan nge na yod do
gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa rtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra pa snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa gro nga rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho bcu'i

rdulashin tu phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi khobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phrab snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs ba'i gnas kyi rgya mtsho 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zho gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon/
gyi me tog ut+pal dang/ pado dang/ kun mu da dang/ put+tA ro ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra bsnyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/
grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni byang chub kyi sems rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa pha gu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las brtsigs pa [） ]sa
bcu'i khang pa brtse gas pa dang gzhal med khang gi 'phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba ste// grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der
sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang ngang+gatshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa skad cig skad cig cing
sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba 'jig rton gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams/

ba rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul na tu phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten kyi khams rgya ma tsho ba'i rdulashIn tu phra ba snyed bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go/
ci'i phyir na grong rdal mdzod many+dza' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mdzong mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhe na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i khams kyi rngul shin tu phra ba'am
rlu'i khams kyi rdulangashin tu phra bo 'am me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am rlung gi khams kyi rdul[%]na tu phra ba 'am/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rngul shin
tu phra ba yang rung ste ) de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dzag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'ajul shin tu phra ba skyed ma btug pa de lta bu gang yang med pas
de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa sna/
mdor na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan gyi yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na yod do// grong rdal
mdzod mtha' yas pa de na bza' shing gyi ra ba myangon dang khra' ba zhes bya ba'i snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa// bza' shing gi ra ba 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulan tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na nags tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'irjel shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshobacu'i rdzu la shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyud las grub pa )

chos kyi dbyings kyi bod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba'i

'tsho/ rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya mtsho'adzig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lo/
sgyu ma dang ldan pa'o/ se mas can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zla ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o//
sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshobacu'i rdulangashin tu phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba seng kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o// rang bzhin yongs su dag
pa'idar gyi lda ldi dang chun po rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o/ dri ma med cing yongs su dag nga 'i gdugs dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng mngon par bsgreng pa'o/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni rdzong rgya mtsho 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra bsnyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste/ rdzong de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin
tu dra ba steng kyis yongs su gang ba'o// rdzong de dag re re thang yang de bin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang/ yon tan gyi me tog ut+pa la dang/ pad+mo dang da pu ri ka
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul ngashin tu phra ba sed kyis kun nas khyab par gong ba'o// bza' shing rga ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can ji snyad cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad
kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sku dang thugs dang 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shIn tu phra
ba snying rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa 'i yeshes la rnam par spyod pa rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
ma@#/// phu ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir na bza'ashing gi re bamya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshekas pa myang n dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de dang mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de 'i phyir na bzashing gi re
ba mya ngan dang bral pa de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o// de dag la sogs pa bza'ashing gar ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste mdor na
grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na yon tan bgang rje snying yod pa de dag kyi yon tan ni/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do// bza' shing gi ra ba mya na
ts+tsha dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug/ khang pa brtsegs pa
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba nyid kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra bsnyad las byung ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshog

0 rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing snatshogasadam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong ba'o/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas stsad du med pa der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang 1 bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng kyis sprul pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya

mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba skyed kyis pha rol tu phyin
ba dam pa thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa gang ji snyid pa de dag las
cad kyis/ sems can de dag gi ba sdu'i bu ga re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stag go ci 'i phyir na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas snang du med pa sangs
zhen chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas
@#/ snang du med pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtse gas pa kun nas slad du med pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste//
zla mdor na bza' shing gi re ba mya ngan dang bral ban yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na yod do// de lta bu'i pho brang
brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lcan ngang ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam
pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyad kyis kun nas bskor cing/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'kho
gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'inyan thos kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya
mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing/ de bzhin du lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/
nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ nga ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dang
pa rgyu mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho banu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing bzhugs so// rnam par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa bdang pa rgya
mtshonas/ mi dang ma ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ nga ltar byung ba de dag las/ byang chub sems dang 'a de dag
re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang ) da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rduli ne tu phra
ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
tin tu phru ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa// nyan thos 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i 'jigarten
du phya ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan ba de bzhin du/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang ) mi ma yin pa dang 'dus pa dang ) ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa lnga dad pa rgya

mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulany+dzin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor dang/ de ltar 'khor dang 'khor gyi 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phyab snyed du shes par bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khoms rgya mtshobacu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med po de dag las/
byang chub sems dpa' re re dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pazla dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/

lus rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las lus re re la yang mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tur
ba snyed yod do// mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho banu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa de dag las mgo'i ri la yang mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi dbang po rnam pa ja
pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed yod de da mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dang nga rgya ma tsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i pa ang da/
nas yid kyi dbang po rnamapa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ de nga de 'a ya ngamig
gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho b.ru'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang 'a//
lus dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med yod de/ mig gi rnam pa bshes pa'i rnam par rtog pa/

rgya mtsho nas// yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la// rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag 'dus rnam
pa shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do: ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya ri 'jig rten gyi khams chu

mtsho bcu'i rdul pashin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la yingashes ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po rnga sangs rgyas tha dad pa cha ma tsho'i ye shes
rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bdad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul ne tu phra ba snyed rab tu skor ba byed do/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang/ de bzhin du nyan thos dang/ de bzhin du lhadang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang ) dri za dang/
lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams la yang shes par bya ste/ eshes la ji lta ba de bzhi/
du chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ mi dang ma ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang/
ston gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed
cig yodapa dang/ gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu phra
ba re re nas lus kyi rdulashIsitu bra ba re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs ba da dag ni/ sangs rgyas rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashAni
bka tu phra ba snyed kyis/ bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulang+gashin tu phra ba snyed du bstan cing brjod kyang phrad par mi rung ngo//
bam po bcu ni/ denus bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtshornam par snang mdzad kyis sku'i ba snga'i bu ga re re nas kyang/ 'od zer rgya mtsho'ajig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed bkyago 'khod zer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad+mo rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu
phra ba snying mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i jur 'in tu phra ba
snyed mngon par 'thon to// de dag las yang dag par skul ngatorligs su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang/ rdul shin tu
phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamus re re nga nga/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyid cig yod pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ngang/
nyan thos rgya mtsho ji sId rig yod pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam ra khang ldong
dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su skul bar byed do//
shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad ngu'angade bzhin te/ sa de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang/ mi dang mi ma yin brgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i 'i dang [°]) mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i
'khor rgya mtsho nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na bde
'dong bar gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang/ mi dang mam yin pa rgya mtsho'i khar de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ mi dang mi ma
yin pa ji snyad cig yod pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dbang re re dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tuphra
ba snyed ngang ldan pa sha stag ste lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten spyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ lus de se 'a ya nga mgo rgyu ma tsho 'jig rjer gyi

khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ mgo'i re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma ro bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed yodang/ ra'i sgo re re la yang rtse rgya mats+tsha
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul8shin tu phra ba skyed yod pa sha stag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho de dag dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de
ngag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongashes gang chen mtsho rnamapar snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.ya sa phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba'i
rdul 'ar tu thub snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashAn tu phra ba snyed kyis ma chod nas/ de bzhin du mar
ma dang/ sngos dang/ gdug spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de lce ze re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstong nas/
rang rang gi stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to// 'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su zhu ba byed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yishes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa rgya
mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dang 'argya mtsho dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar
rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thamasacad la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye'o rna ma par bkrol lo// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par
bstan to// de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma ro
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtshornam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs
shing mtsho gzhes te/ thog mar yang dge/ bar du yang dge/ tha mar yang dge ba'i chos/ don bzang bo/ yi ge bzang po/ dag pa/ yongs su gsal ba/
ba[/ ]yongs su byang ba/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing/ byang chub sems dang 'a 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ re ba/
gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad deb gnas kyi yon tan rnam pa 'a phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang sangs rgyas kyi gong gi yon tan rnam par phye

ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' 'dang [） ]sku tshe'i yon tan rnam nga ra phye nga rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang/ sems can yongs su sman par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed rtsig mnga' ba
dang sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang/ chos bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni/ sangs

rgyus rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyis dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te bstan kyang rdung par mi
da'ajig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams rud kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang

po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul89na tu phra pa snyed kyi 'jig chen gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang mi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rtenaM gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re/
dazhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag go
sgyur ba'i rgyal po ro'i chen mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ 'di ltar sangs
! rgya sa kyi sman rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang/ shangs dang/ lcags dang/ sku dang/ thugs zhi
po che rgya mtsho dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ rig bya dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po ni rgyu mtsho dang/ thamasaM cad kyis bltan yid du
bod ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ don thams cad grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtshodang/ kun tu rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ nam mkha'i mthas klo ba'i rta

rin poche rgya mtsho dang/ yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po'in po che rgya mtsho dang/ chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po tshe rgya mtsho dang ) kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi
nor bu rin po che rgya mtshodang/ nam mkha'i rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin poche rgya mtsho dang/ rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ zla ba'i zer lta bu'i/
rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ shes rab kyi lam gyi ral gri rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltar ma mthong ba'i spyi gasnug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho
dang thams cad du 'gro ba'i lham rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par bzhag pa thamasacad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ chos
gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi glong dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
mtsho banu'i rdulashin tu thu ba snyed yod de/ rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la rin po ni ji snyed yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing ya nga las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshobacu'i rdul shinatu
phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul/
tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ bod chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa// lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khamA
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed rab tu 'joms pa/
@#/ sa bcu rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge ba dzin 'jig rten gyi khamasarkya/

mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba sed rab tu thob pa// snying po byang nub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba snyed yongs su gnod
pa la mkhas pa// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang pa rdo la bu mo rgyu ma kun
kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba sed kyis sprul pa'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra ba/ yid kyi lus 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rjel shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya tsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed kyi mgo dang ldan nga [） ]chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'
rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu sba ba snyed kyi dpral ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
smin tshugs can/ shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan nga/ de bzhin gshegs nga khra mas rud/
las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa// sdom pa chen po yang dag par blang ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa// chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrogang rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa//
chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su s+sa ngas pas 'dzum par dgod pa rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po dang
snying rje chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng kyi lag nga dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su bsgrubs pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa/ bsonganams dang ye shes kyis tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa dmigs pa/
@#// 'thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i mthar thug pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying rjes surtogs pa dang ldan pa// rdo rje lta bu'i ting
nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta thu ra dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad
rom gyis legs par 'brel ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying rkang pa dang ldan pa// byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang
'phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba skyed mdzes par thogs pa sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/
rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang bar gyon pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan
rgya mtsho 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdulashin tu phra bsnyed kyi sbos kyis lus shin tu byags pa ) dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu/
phyin pa'i mchog theb pa// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rduli na tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi khanas yeshes kyi rjes mu 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed 'byung ngo// de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams rud nas kyang/ snying rje'irjes su 'brang pa'i tsan dan kyi sbos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulaM shin tu phra ba
snyed 'byung ngo// spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashal tu phra ba med kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par
'gengs te/ de dag gi ngaga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i dri zhim po rgya mtsho di jag tshor bar gyur ba de
dag thams cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdu'ashin tu phra ba steng rab tu 'thob bo//
sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang sngabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gi gzugs kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
shes rab dang/ ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdu'angashin tu phra ba med zab tu 'thob bo/
gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ de bau0f00na gshegs pa thamasacod las thos pa yongs su 'dzin/
pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul lci tu phra ba steng rab tu thob bo// gang gis lag nas bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang/ byams pa chen po dang/
snying rjechen porgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams rud kyang/ bsod cha
dang ye shes sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogasargya mtsho 'jigasten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sud rab tu 'thob bo// gang dang stan gcig la lhan cig tu 'khod pa
de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub kyi seng ge'i khrirgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtshobacu'ajulashin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi kha dang khar phrad par
byas pa de dag thams cad kyang/ rnam par bAr pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rang phyobathob bo// gang gis pang du 'khyud
pa de dag thams cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// / gang dang chos kyi dbyings su rten par
gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ga Ti snyed yod
ba de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabasa'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng rab tu 'thob bo//
yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur par sa bon rgyamatsho rab tu 'debs so//de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des yang dag par bskul

ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab pa'i rna ba rgya mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya mtsho chags pa med cing bsgrub+be
pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis
la mgo chu mtsho'i spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrogs pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar yang dag
par bskul ba'i tshogs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags/ de skad ces gsol
pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de
bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs so//
chos kyang ston to// yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed byung ba 'di yang de'i mthus byung ngo//
de nas rgyal po don chen mang pos ) de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ )bcom ldan
'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa yeshes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang
mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang/ dal phyag bgyi ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol
dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams rud kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal/
to// rgyal po chen po de'i dus la da bab par shes na 'gro la rag te/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas
pa der ni 'gro bar dka' ste/ der 'gro ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal blta ba dang/ de la phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ chos mnyan pal ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabasam gtogs ban/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
la rab tu gnas pas kyang bde blag tu bya bar sla ba ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po de lta ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba zhig yod na
de khyod kyis sngan chad mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyags ni gang na 'dug/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'di nas ni'u 'am 'ang )de na da ltar de bzhin gsheg
pa ni gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang chos ston ba mdzad pa shes sam/ rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
rgyamatsho de mthong ba'am/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtshodi phyogs gang mchis pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni dba'am/ ring zhig na mchis pa dang
daltaraden de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang/ 'tsho gzhes pa'angachos ston pa ni skyes su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sngon chad bdag gis ma thos so//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang de nad ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing mtsho gzhes pa dang chos sten pa legs
par soms shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshe thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba snyad la mnyam par bzhag kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i phyogs gang na yod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye 'am ring ba dang/
dend ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang/ chos ston pa yang ma shes te ) 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo//
das rgyal porin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te ) de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtshornam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol
ter dbcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho de 'di nas
ring ba 'am nye ba dang/ dbazhin gshegs pa gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang/ chos ston pa lta skyes kyang na 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jigarten gyi khams rgya
mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis// rgyal po rin chen mang po la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de lta bsan rgyal po chen po rnam grangs des kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs ba'i phyag gi mthil gyi sung re la rab tu gnas pa de na ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par/ ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phya ba'i snying bo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i lan tu phra ba gdal gnas
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'grokhor bya ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs la blta ba 'am/ de la phyag bya ba 'am/ bstanabakur ba'am/ de las tshos mnyan pa bde blag ma
yin par shes par gyis shig/ denas rgyal po rin chen mang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad/
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni thag ji srid cig
na mches/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang chos ston pa bstan du gsol/ denas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis// rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nub phyogs legs kyi sa mtshams kyi
mtha' 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi rdul[“]shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/
dan de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs so// 'tsho'o// gzhes so//
chos kyang ston to// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang/ rgyal po rin chen mang bos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mashes ma mthong nas de 'di snyam du bsams so// jig
'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshe de de ltar nyana'ang bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring ba lta la nye skyes snyam nas// de ltar rjes su bsams te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
brlabs legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bsgribs pa med pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyad la mnyam par bzhag go/ de ltar
mnyam par bzhag pa'amed la rgyal po rin chen mang po la de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rtenagyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyadanA/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
gang jisnyad bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra bsnyad kyis byin du brlab pa mdzad do//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi
mkhril gyi snying bol rang du gnas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang tshon mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang/ dam yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshomang po 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyad dag na ) sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang jisnyad bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma shas kyi stobasadam pa/

rgya mtsho la sogrwapa'i ya shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis rab tu shes so// dus gsumakun tu ltakharnam par rgyu ba rgya mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho'ajig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na 'a ga mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa 'am/ me long shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la
ngo snang ba bzhin no// de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag la sa 'angs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chenamatsho rnam
par snang mdzad la yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyagag mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
yang shas gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi ba dang// mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o//
danas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i dus la
da bab par shes na song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen
mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la rdul ga/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad po de dag dang/

bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phrubasnyad po de dag dang lhan cigaste/ bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khamaso ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho rir zhing na/ stong gsum gyi steng chen de'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor
los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing// stongaganyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig/ stongani

'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni// 'jag rten gyapham gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu/
phra bsnyad dang lhan cig/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor les sbyar ba rgya mtshor re zhang ni/ glengagacig gi 'khor lososgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra bsnyad dang lhan cig/ glang gcig gi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtshor ro zhang na/ khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig/
khams kyi rgyal porgya mtsho rer zhingani/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi khamaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra bsnyad dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar mas ba dang// 'khor 'dres sbyar ba'i rgyal/
bo rinachen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang/ bum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad bo de dgagis 'di skad ces smras te/ lha'i zhalasnga nas gsan
du gsol/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tuganas pa der/ de bzhin gshags pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par
snang mdzad de zhal blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi ba gsol lo// de skad ces smras pa dang/
rgyal bo rin chen mang bos/ chungan 'i 'khor de dag dang/ bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ji lta khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i zhal blta ba ni don du mi gnyan//
chos rgya mtshomanyan pa ni tshol bar ma byed/ dge 'dun rgya mtsho bstan bkur ban denadu mi gnyer/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni tshol bar mi byed/

rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ba na don du ma gnyis/ nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer/ yul rgya mtsho
'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod pa med ) yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni 'gro bar 'dod pa med la/ gal te khyod sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ nang
sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa 'am/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang ma gnas/ sems can
thams cad gsod phod kyang zhe sdang ngam byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stags can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug cing spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam yang dag pa'i e shes la mi gnas//
chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo zhin/ dang la bag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po
ma @#// des bstan pa 'di shinatu bstan pa'i tsho/ chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang/ bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung mar re dang/ bu mo re res kyang mig gi khamasar

[】 ]ras chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho la sogs pa// sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phru ba sud rab tu thob par
gyur to// rna ba'i khamasur res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud pa'i rgya mtsho la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyad rab nublo ba
par gyur to// sna'i khams re red kyang gcig la rten pa'i sa rgya mtsho' sogs pa// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshobacu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad rab tu sleb pa
gyur to/ lce'i khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra bsnyad rab tu thob bo// lus kyi

khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri mamed pa rgya mtshol sogs pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba skadar ba tu thob bo// yid kyi khams na
des kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad rab tu thob bo/ dad nas rgyal po rin chen

0 ]mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang/ bume rgya mtshe de dag gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyad kyi gting rud nas// spyod pa rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyad la gzhag gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de sasar/ bdag cag kun gyis sangs
rgyas rgya mtsho mthong// yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis// 'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho'i chos ma thos// sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur// da ni sangs rgyas
'phrin las sgrub pa yi// sa mang rgya mtsho'i mig kyang thob par gyur// byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su// rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi// sa yi khams
kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste// rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur// lces kyang nyan thos su mang rgya mtsho theb// des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshos bar gyur// lus kyis
sa mang rgya mtshe theb bsan// sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrub par bgyi// yid kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mcho'i rnams // 'tshal bar gyurapas gzhan la bstan par bgyi//
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba'os/ de bzhin gshags pa phal po che'i le'u ste bcu gcig go/
lnga pa/// bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga d+hA'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te/ blo shin tu rnam par
dag pa mi gnyis pas yang dag par byed pa/ chos mtshan nyid med pa shin tu gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid bsdus
pa/ bsgribs pa dad pas rtogs par thugs su chud pa/ phyir ma ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrogs pa med pa// rnam par dgod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dus
gsum mnyam pa nyid lashin tu byung ba// pho brang kun tu 'od na sang ga'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyad kun kyang skya ba gcig gis thogs pa// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa// sams can gyi khams la dpyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la dpyod pa/
'jig rten gyi khams la dpyod pa// mya na las 'das pa'i dbyings la dpyod pa// las kyi rnam pas sman pa la dpyod pa// bsam pa'i rgyud la dpyod pa/ don dang yig la
dpyod pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la dpyod pa// 'du byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dpyod nga/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung
ba la dpyod pa sha stag dang thugs cig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar
dgos te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan kyang rung/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rkyen yongs su bstan kyang rung/ sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid yongs su bstan kyang rung/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan kyang rung ! sangs
rgyus kyi chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung/ sungs rgyasakyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bstan kyang rung/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/
byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu'i ji ltar rnam par dgod pa de dag yongs su bstan kyang rung byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung/ byang chub
sems dpa'i tshad med pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung/ byang chub sems dpa'i kater rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung [/]
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung/ byang chub
sams dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung/ byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'byung/
ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshags pa'i gdung ma gnyid pa dang/ semasacan thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye bar nyon mongs pa med par
bya ba dang/ 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang/ chos thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thamasacad rnam par dag par bya
bdang/ the tsom thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang/ nom nur thams cad shin tu bsal ba dang/ gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom bar bya ba'i phyir/ gong du du bzhin
gshegs pa'i sa bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bstanakyang rung ) gong du de
bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul bstan kyang rung/ gong du da bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyangs pa bstan kyang rung/ gong du
[d]/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'irdzu 'phrul bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshags pa'i mnga' chen po bstanakyang rung/
gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'phrogs pa bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan bstan kyang rung/
gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshags pa'i ljags bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshags pa'i sku bstan kyang rung ) gong du
de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa bstan kyang rung/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung/ gong du
de bzhin gshags pa'i khyu mchogagi mthu bstan kyang rung snyam bdung// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gisams kyis
yongs surnam par rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de dag mngon par 'du
mdzad pas/ shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra bsnyad 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gsar gyi mdog ces byab/
[f]@#// de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi g.yo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sta phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal to shar phyogs su brten nas song
ga'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyel mo krung bcas nas 'bod do/ )lho phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul ngashin tu
phru ba snyad 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'o dog yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed ma bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas ) byang chub sems
dpa' sas rgyas dang la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
la phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogs su brten nas sang ga'i zhwa pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par gal to/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phashin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol kyi 'jig rten khams pa'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed bcings med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas//
byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulashin tu thu ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub phyogs su brten nas sangaga' khri pad+mo'i snyingapo can dag mngon par s+yalate/ lamo krung bcas nas 'khed de// byang phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi
khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed kun spyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/
byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sta phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang phyogs su brtan nas seng ge'i khri bablo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ lamo krung bcas nas 'bod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten/
gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed 'das pa'i b.rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed nyi na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/
byang chub sems dpa' yen tan dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
[s/ ]@#// phyag 'tshal te/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'bod do// shar lho'i
