phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rduli na tu phra bsnyad 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gosar gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed
mtha' rnal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mgi gi dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulashin tu phrab snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der dong ste phyinanas 3 bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su brtanAnas sang ga'i khri pad+mo'i snying pocan dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas
nas 'khod do// lhanub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rinapo che'i mdog ces bya ba/
de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dang 'a brtson 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshamasasu brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul ti/
skyel mo krung bcas nas 'bod de// nub byang gi phyogs mtshamasasu 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog/
ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dar la zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tshul yin/
tubru ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gongan bder dong ste phyin nas/ bcomaldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying/
po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyelame krung bcas nas 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulashin tu thu ba snyad 'das pa'i pha rol gyi
'jig rten gyi khams shel gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed tshangs pa'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sams dpa' ye shes dpal byang chub sems dpa'
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ be ma ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi phyogs su brtan
nas seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprulato/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'bod do// stong gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulapashin tu ]

yang dag sangs rgyas sus shes pa// de dag mag gi lam mi gnas// shes rab chen po sus mthong zhing// dngos po'i 'du shes mi 'jug la// rnam par bsgoms shing shes gyur pa//
de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// 'jig rten khams 'di mthong gyur te// sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la// gang gi sems ni mi g.yo ba// de dag mi yi mchog tu 'gyur//
sangs rgyas chos la gang gi rnams // nyams pa'i sams su rab 'jug cing// me gnyis mngon 'gyur brtan pa'i rnams // de dag bsam gyis ma khyab 'gyur// gang rnams bdag
dang sangs rgyus dag/ rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing// mi gnas len pa med pa'i rnams // de dag bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// gzugasadang tshor ba 'du shes dang/ rnam
parang shes dang sems dpa' dag/ grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams // de dag thub pa chen por 'gyur// blta bar bya las 'das pa dang// rnam par blta las de bzhin te//
chos la gang dag rmongs med pa// de dag rab tu 'od byed 'gyur// gang gis shes rab chen po'i rnams // sems bskyod kun la rab gnas shing// thams cad mthong yang skye med pa//

[52 ]mdog dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang/ pad+mo'i mdog dang/ tsam pa ka'i mdog dang/ ut+pa la'i mdog dang/ sa le sbram gyi mdeg dang/ rinapo che'i mdog dang rdo rje'i
mdog dang/ shel kyi mdog dang/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes
bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed ma g.yo ba dang/ rig byed mi bskyod pa dang/ rig byed bcings pa med pa dang/ rig byed kun spyod pa dang/
rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang/ rig byed mtha' rkul dang/ rig byed dam pa dang/ rig byed dbang phyug dang/ rig byed tshangs pa dang/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go/ byang
chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig gi ji
ltab de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes byabasha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i
tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyisgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// thugs su chud nas bsgribs pa med gzigs te// zil gyis ma nonam
pa mi mnga' bar// skye dgu rab tu 'dul bar shin tu snang// la las gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de// sku tsher skye bar gyur ba rab tu mthong// skye dgu'i zla ba
rnam par mdzes pa de// tha ma'i sku yang 'dzin par la las mthong// yon tan tshad las 'das pa kun mnga' zhing// dgos pa mkhyen bzhin shin tu mkhas gyur pa// skye dgu'i
seng ge don med gshegs pa de// la las 'chag cing gshegs pa shin tu mthong// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par snang ba de// la las mthon mthing spyan du de bzhin mthong//
'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i skya dku rnams // gzigs nas bzhad par de bzhin la las mthong// gzi brjid mtshungs med mnga' la la la yis// sang ge'i nga ro gsung pa de bzhin
mthong// zil gyis ma non ma log gsung mnga' ba// sku yi bla mar ston pa la las mthong// bcings pa kun las rnam par grol ba de// la las khab nas byung bar rab tu
mthong// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyod pa rnams / gzigs dang zhib der gzhol la las mthong// la las byang chub snying po dam pa la// chos rnams thams cad
mngon par sangs rgyas shing// yon tan thams cad pha rel phyin pa dang// mun pa rdul bsalanyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong// la las chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang//

nas bar gyur to// shes rab dpag med chos rnams mtha' yas pa// srid pa'i rgyu mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag/ tshe ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od// yon tan mnga' de dag sbyor
'di'o// gang gisasangs rgyas chos rnams dngos rtogs shing// dus gsum kun tu brtags kyang mi ngoms te// dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa// bsam yas mos pa de dag sbyor 'di ko/
sems can ul mos sems can 'du shes med// 'jig tshogs tshos shes lam kyi rgyud dang bral// bsam gtan nang dad sems la bcings pa med// chags med yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin//
rtog mkhas rab tu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams // mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag/ thar pa'i lam brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa// zhi ba thob pa de dag sbyor 'di 'o// ded dpon rjes seng sangs
rgyas byang chub mchog/ thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings bzhin rtogs shing// bden 'jug mkhas pas sams can rnam 'dul ba// bde gshegs bsam gtan de dag sbyor 'di'o// sangs rgyas
don tshigs rjesasu shes bya zhing// chagasamed blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed// kun tu 'gro bar song bas rtsol spyod pa// rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di 'o// nam mkha'i dbyings dang sprul
@#// ba yid ldan rnams // gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag/ mya ngan 'das rig sa spyod pa ma pa'i 'dra rnams // thob dka' thob pa rnams kyi sbyor 'di'o// zla ba zla phud/
nyin dang nub bgrang zhing// le dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su soms pa// 'jig rten 'du zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba dang// grangs tshul sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di 'o// zhing gi sems can ji snyed
skya 'che ba// gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med// de dag med dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa// bsam gyi ma khyab rtogs pa'i sbyor 'di'i// 'dus pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da lta la//
ngag gi lam gyis gangan rtog byed cing// dus gsum rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs gyur pa// mnyam med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams dedag
nas 'dus te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu snang bar byas nas/ stong gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te ! 'jig rten gyi
khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phragabargya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste ) gtogs par gyur nga
de dag thams cad rel gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba stod dang thabs
gzhug par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten kyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag kun na yang ) de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyus kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo//
thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes
byab dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya banas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ! 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag
nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdeg ces bya ba'i bar dag ko/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed ma g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas// rig byed sna tshogasashes bya ba'i bar dgago/ byang chub sems dpa' de
dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'o re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyad dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams
cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stakaden 'di nyid rjod do/ gcigan ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad n yang rjod de// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag kyang so so nas skyabar gyur to// 'das dus gang gis bsgrub dka' brtul zhugs che brtsams shing/ nam yang zhum pa'i sams su gtong bar ma byed de//
bsgral dka' brgal te bdag gis sems can kun 'dul zhes// sang ge'i sgra sgrogs de dag spyod yul 'di yanano// gang zhig 'dod dang srid pa 'byung zhing 'jug ba dang// ma rig ga zhel ba
gti mugamang bsgribs 'jigs chena rnams // sems can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'jug/ bdag kyang 'jig rten mgon 'gyur zhes ba de yul 'di// 'jig rten sems can
'tshe mang po 'dod dregs 'dam byang ba// med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas// sangs rgyas spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing// bdagagis sems can kun bsgral
de dag spyod yul 'di// mngon mtha' nas dka' tshad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing// bdag rten sems can pharel mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa// de dag rgyal bas theg pa na ba mchog la bkod/
bdag gis de 'dra'i chos bstanA de yi spyod yul lo// semasacan khams rnams mgon medand kyis gzi'i gyur cing// ngan song gzhol ba 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gdungs// ma lce
'bar phud 'jigs gzugs mi bzad bsregs gyur pa// mthong nas dgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di 'o// lam gel lamam yin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing// mun pa chen po rtol
ta bar dka' red 'gro mthong nas// snang ba chen po bskyod de gas rgyas chos bstan ces// 'di skad tshig brjod de dag spyod yul 'di yinan// srid pa'i mtshos g.yengs sems can rab tu/
mang ba drag/ mtha' ma ma mthong skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba// mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing// pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag skyed yul 'di 'o//
sams can rtsa ba mad la gnas pa mi mkhas kun// g.yang sachen por lhung zhing sems nyams rmongs mang nas// snying rjes chos kyi zam lamakhas pa su dgod cing// dran par kyis shes
su sna de dag spyod yul 'di 'o// shin tu dog pa'i btsanarar sdug bsngal sems can rnams // nu dang rga bas gzir ming tsam gyis mnar ba dag/ mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams //
kun brtsams te// sams can kun dgrol sems pa de dag spyod yul 'di 'o// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos gyur the tshom med// chos dbyings sbyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu
rgyas bkangaste// 'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang ma gzigasashing// sems can kun la snyoms byed de yi spyod yul lo// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi
khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so// 'ge rtanagyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bya
du bya// ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so// 'jig rten kyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang bar byas so// 'jug/

zla rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rtenagyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phragastong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snang bar byas so// 'jig rten
gyi khams gzhal du med pa snang 'byas so// 'jig rtan gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar byas so// da bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis ma khyab ba/ mtshungs pa med pa kun tu
mtha' yas pa/ mu mad pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyidabyangs kyis klasar/ namamakha'i
mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// kazhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ de bzhin du nub phyogs dang/ de bzhin du byang phyogs dang ) de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs
mtshams dang/ de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang de bzhin du lhanub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ dbazhin du 'og gi phyogasanas
stang gi phyogasakyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye bsnang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas pa nas/ nam mkha'i mthas
gtugs pa'i bar kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// de ltar phyogasaba'ur shin tu rgyas par byas nas// ches kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so///
'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bya ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du 'og min byeb phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rtenagyi khams de dag gi 'ongs sugang ci yang
rung ste/ gtegs par gyurapa de dag thams cad kyang ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyasakyi gdan la bzhugs shing ) byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i

rdulashin tu phra ba nyid dang thabs cig pa'i snang ba de bzhin du ! 'jig rten gyi khamasarera'i gling bzhi pa byab phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa byeb phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyigadan la bzhug
par snang ngo// thams cad duyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabasakyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming
'di zhes bya ba dgaste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dkake/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas
'ongs pa dag sta/ 'di ltar gsar gyi mdog nyes bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'imadeg ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya
da @#// ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste ) 'di ltar rig byed mgayo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rigabyed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag// byang chub sams/
dba' de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' rore zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ a rig ji ltab de bzhin/
thams cad do// thams cad n yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcigan ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod de/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa
'di dag kyang so senas smra bar gyur to// bskal pa gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la// gang gis mthong yang bsags med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'i/
lam du rab tu 'jug pa de ni thams cad shes gyur te// stobs bcus tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur// grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tumatshungs
med grags gyur cing// bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos nyid 'di la dkar spyadade/ tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas// de phyir phyogs rnams kun
bkang bde gshegs chos nyid 'di stonato// dgengs pa ji bzhin de ni spyad pa'i 'bras bu mthun pa ste// 'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa yang byab/ shing// de dag tha=
tsa cad so sor mthun par ye shes rnam bsgoms pas// sams canadam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra phyogs bcur ston// thog mar nyan 'dod bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des byas/
shing/ darang bzhin med pa'i sa la rab rtog bsam gtan bstan byed pa// bde gshegs 'di ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnam snyemasams tshim byed// ches nyid de 'dra spyod pa myur du bde
gshegs thob par 'gyur// snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams rgyas byed rtse gcig thub byed cing// rgyal ba'i yon tan mes las mi zlog spyod pas ma byed pa// dngos dang dngos med tham
cad shes byas srasashing dngos zad pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag med dang med mthong ba de dag lus 'di yin// bzang po' spyod yul can gyi gnas kyis phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing//
zhing rnams thams cad chos kyi gtor gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa// ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tshem med pa'i rnams // stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhinagyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go/
bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang sgra brjod de la 'jug byed myong// chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin blta dka' gzhal yas rtag bskor ba// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsungs kun byang
chub yan lag rtogs// de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong// mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med// rnam shes skyam bzhin pas mig stong
stobs bcu ma mthong ngo// 'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas mthong pa yin// shin tu chags med yulamed de ni rgyal bamathong pa yin// sems can las
zla mdabasags pa de dag shin tu blta dka' ste// nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang mdogatu phyogs bcu kun na med// de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnam kun 'gengs pa// shes rab
! dka' ba 'dren pa chen po bsgribs pa med pas brnyes// nam mkha' dag la zhing rnams bya ba dngos poraganas pa snang// de nas 'ong ba med cing phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba med// tshig nyung
gnas par 'gyur yang de dag nyid la'ang gnas pa med// de bzhin rang 'byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyis rtag tu 'gangs// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdosangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba lnga/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste btubazhi pa'o////de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
glu dpa' sangs rgyas dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lta ste/ bde 'gror 'gro ba dang//
nasong du 'gro ba dang/ dbang potshang ba dang// dbang po ma tshang ba dang/ skye ba mthun pa dang/ skye ba mi mthun pa dang/ sdug pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang/ bde ba myong ba dang sdug bsngal
myong ba snang ba dag la ltos/ las kyis na sams ma shes so// sems kyis ni las ma shes so// tshor bas ni rnam par smin pa ma shes so// rnam par smin pas ni tsher pa ma shesaso//
sems kyis ni tshor ba mi shes so// tshor bas ni sems mi shes so// rgyus ni rkyen meshes so// rkyen kyis ni rgyu mi shes so// dngos pos ni dmigs pa meshesaso// dmigs
pas ni dngos po meshes so// de nas byang chub sems dba' sangs rgyas dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcud de sbas pa/
sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir// gang 'di yongs su dris pa dag/ chos rnams chos nyid ci 'dra ba// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/ tshes rnams 'di dag g.yo bamed/
shin tu dngos po med pas// de phyir grazhan gyisAgazhan dgagi/ dro bo nyid kyang ma shes so// ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams // gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang// gcigags gcig ni
e shas te// chos kyi chos nyidad bzhin no// ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can// 'od 'bre gzhan dang gzhan 'akrogs kyang// gcig gis gcigAni mishis te// chos kyi chos nyid
de bzhin no// ji ltar rlung gi ston tshulakyis// gzhan dang gzhan du rab tu rgyu// gcig gis gcigan mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sa yi khams kyi rnams /
gcig la gcige nik+kanas gyur kyang// gcigagis gcig ni mngeshes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// mig dnganab sna dag dang// lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams //

'di dag las ni smyu 'khod kyang// byed pa po ni gang yang med// 'byung ba'i rang bzhin mad pa yis// 'byung ba nye bar bstan byas kyang// bstan par byas pa gang yang med// bstan pa la ni dngos med do//
mig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong/ rnabasnayang rang bzhin gyis// lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang// med de yongs su brtags pa yani// gang yag rang bzhin dngos med par// tshul bzhin
rab tu rtog byed pa// de yi moka la 'khrul pa med// chos mag bsam kyis ma khyab pa'o// yang dag pa dang yang dag min// bden nam 'on te brdzun yang rung// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten kun//
tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa'o// denas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can
thams cad semasacan med mod kyi/ 'on kyang dbazhin gshegs pa nasams can 'dul ba'i dus laji ltar bab pa dang/ sams can gyi tshadziltab dang/ lus ji ltab dang/ spyod pa ji
ba dang/ mos pa ji lta ba dang/ mtshan ma ji lta ba dang/ bsam pa ji lta ba dang/ sbyor baji lta ba dang/ sams ji lta bdang/ spyod pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can
'dul ba'i phyir mthong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpalakyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de sa pa/ gang rnams rab tu zhi byed cing//
thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin/ 'di don ci 'dra de bzhin du// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis// bdag gi lus la su gnasashes// gang gis nang na rab shes pa/ yang dag yod dam
med pa'i don// des ni rab tu shes pa yin// lus kyi rnam par dgod pa ni// phyogasanam gnas brjod pa yin// de pasashes pa de gnas la// nam yang chags par ma byed do// lus ni rnam bar
spyod pa yis// dngos po kun kyang rnam par bsgoms// sems ni phyag ldog ma 'gyur te// dngos po kun ni brtags pa'o// gang gi tsho ni rjes su 'brang// gang gi tsho ni phyir ldog 'gyur// ji ltar
mgalam 'khor lo yi// thog ma tha ma 'khor ba bzhin// dngos po thams cad ma rtag par// skya bo gang rnams rtogs pa yang lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir// 'du shes phyir yang ldog par 'khyug
bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi// las ni kun tu rab tu 'byung/ rnam par smin pas rab tu 'byung// phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin// sams ni dbang byed yin par bshad// dod pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin
[]dun/ tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ 'jig rten thams cad ston par byed// ji snyed 'jige rten brda yod pa// de dag thams cad brtags pa ste// chos nyid de ni nam du yang// /
chos gcig la yang mi gnas so// rkyen rnams la ni rten bcas te// chos rnams so ser rab tu 'byung// de dag ldog pa'i de bzhin 'gyur// phyi ma ji ba zhan
sngon de bzhin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces skus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems canams
cad kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams yongs su 'dzin ba med cing/ bdag gi mad la mnyam pa yin yang/ 'on kyang bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang snang ) sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang snang/ med du
'ong bar byed padang/ yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang/ nang du byed pa dang/ phyi rol tu byed pa dang/ tshor ba chung ba dang/ tshor ba che ba dang/ tshe 'di la myong ba dang/ tshe gzhan la myong
bdag kyang snang la/ chos kyi dbyings la ni yid du 'ong ba 'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni chen dbal gyis/ byang chub
! sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ ji ltar las rnams byas gyur pa// tshorab de bzhin 'byung 'gyur gyi/ 'di la byed pa gang yang med// 'dinisangs rgyas
! bstan pa'o// shanitu phyis pa'i me long la// ngon ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin// de la de ni de bzhin snang// chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag/ gcig gis gcig
[/]na mi shes kyang// rang bzhin nye bar ston par byed// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa zhage/ lam po cher ni song 'dug ste// gzugs rnams ston par byed pa

bzhin// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar shing gi 'khrul 'khor rnams // snatshogasaM sgra mang rjod byed kyang// de ni bdag dang bdag med min// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar byarnacha
mang po yi// sgo nga'i sbubs ni phye ba las// sa skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur pa// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar ma yi mngal du yang// bu ni 'pho bar ma 'a gyur te// 'on kyang
dbang po sna tshogs 'gyur// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar sems dmyal 'jigs pa na// gshinarje'i rigs gtogs sdug bsngal ba// de dag la ni 'ong ba mad// las kyi rang
bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar ranachen mchog rnams dang// lha yi bu rnams kun ldan yang// 'pho bar snang ba gang yang med// de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no// ji ltar 'jig rten la lo dag/
bsam gyis mi khyab 'bar gyur kyang// de dag 'ong ba gang yang med// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// denas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub semA
dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig mngon par sangs rgyas na/ 'on kyang chos tshad med pa yang yang dag par
0/ @#// ston cing tshad med pa yang rnam par ston/ sems can tshad med pa yang rab tu ston/ gsung tshad med pa yang shin tu sgrog/ sku tshad med pa yang shin tu ston/ bsam
pa tshad med pa yang thugs su chud/ rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu skyod/ rgyan tshad med pa yang byin gyis rmob/ spyod yul
tshad med pa yi na tu ston la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du ma snang ba 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i
'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris// de ni mkhas pas rnam par shes// yon tanams pa dpyod par byed/
ji ltar san gcig pu yang// sems can mang po rab tu rgyu// de la gcige dang b+hadad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhinano// ji ltaraman gcig pu yang// 'jig rten kun n kun kyang 'bud//
du lam lce tha dadAmod// sangs rgyasachos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig pu yang// chu klung tshad med 'bab gyur kyang// de la chu yi bya brugamed// sangs rgyas chos nyid dbazhinano//
! ji ltar rlung na gcig pu yang// 'jig rten kun tu rgyu zhing ldang// de la gcig dang tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// sprinemen rnams ni 'brug bsgrags shing// sa rnams kun
kyang mas par byed// de yi char la bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltaras gcigapu yang// myagu snatshogs 'byin cing ston// sa la bye brag 'byed pa mad sangs rgyas
chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sgrub mad nyi ma ni// phyogs bcu kun n snang bar byed// de la 'od zer tha dadamed// sas rgyusachos nyid de bzhinen// ji ltaranam mkha'akhruban// 'jig rten kun
la rab tu snang// gnasanas 'gyur ba gang yang med// sangs rgyasachos nyid de bzhinano// ji ltaratshangasabamimajed bdag/ stong gsum nan 'dug mdakyi/ de la lus nibyabrag med//
sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// denas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpalargyus/ byung chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces saso// kye rgyal ba'i sras de
bzhinagashigs ba la dge ba bskyed par gcigekyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dgaba'i rtsababaskyod pa'i sems can rnams // gzugs sna tshogasadang/ khadog sna tshogs dang/ rigs
sna tshogs dang/ dbangaposnatshogs dang/ losaspyod sna tshogs drang/ dbang sna tshogs dang/ 'khor sna tshogs dang/ phyug dbul sna tshogs dang/ yon tan snyatshogs dang/ shes
rab sna tshogs su'ang snang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la'ang ma mnyam pa 'am/ tha dad du dgongs pa gang yang medan 'dico zhig/ denas byang chub sems dpa' mig
gi dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// ji ltaras ni ro gcig kyang// sa bon tshul bzhin myu gu ston// byams dang sdang
bar sems pa med// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar muni ro gcig kyang// snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul pa// rgyud kyi rnams la rnam
par 'gyur// ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ni// rtag tu 'khor yang mgu bar byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// shin tu sbyangs ba dga' bar byed// ji ltar mkhas pa'i
rgyal po dag/ 'gro ba mang po shes par byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed// ji ltar dri mad ma long la// ci 'dra'i gzugs rnams
de bzhin snang// de bzhin sems can bsam tshul du// sangs rgyas yon phul rnam dag 'gyur// ji ltar dug phan sman gyi rnams // dugand thams cad sos par byed// de
bzhinusangs rgyas yon phul pa/ nyon mongs dugan chen po sal// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni// 'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed// mun pa dag kyang rnam par sel// sangs rgyas yon
phul de bzhin no// ji ltar zla ba dri mod pa// kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te// sa ni rab tu snang bar byed// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu yi stobs shugs kyis//
[el]/ sa ni thams cad g.yo 'gyur pa// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin du// srid gsum 'khor ba rnams kyang skyod// 'bar dang 'od 'phro bcas pa'i mi// thams cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngos//
de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul pa// 'du byed thams cad sreg par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal
la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na thams cad lta ba mthun pas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyire ma 'gyur/ de dag
kun la yang gzugs ni gzugs nyid du zad/ tshor ba yang tshor ba nyid du zad/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes nyid du zad/ 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed rnams nyid du zad/ rnam par
shes pa yang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/ 'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad/ gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad/ gzugs med pa'i kham
kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad/ ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zad/ srid pa yang srid pa nyid du zad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang phan par byed pa 'am/ gnod
bar byed pa ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ !
[z]@#// de ltar khyod kyis gang dris pa// la la myur du rnam 'grol zhing// la la dka' bar 'grol 'gyur pa// sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon// 'di ni dpag tu
za med pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan gyi sa ma yin// dad dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis// rtag tu khyad par 'gyur pa yin// ji ltar rtswa dang shing gsher ba// mar bcugashin tu nyam chung
zhing// ring por ma thogs 'chi bar 'gyur// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar gtsub nas gtsub pa'i tshe// ma byung bani myur bteg na// myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin// de ltar
le lo bstan pa la// nyi ma'i nor bu lci ba pa// yang dang yang bzhag bteg pa ni// de la me 'byung mi 'gyur te// de bzhin le la bstan pa la// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe// byis pa rnams ni
mig btsums shing// mi mthong ci phyir zhes smras pa// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// rku nga lag med par skyes pa'am// ji ltar smig mda' kha bug gis// sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin//
de ltar le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar byas pas rgya mtsho las// yang dang yang du bsu byas shing// skam par la la 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar bum pa chus bkang
bzhin// bskal pa'i ma ni byung ba'i tshe// la la gsad par 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yi// nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'o// gzugs kyis rgyas/
par dgang sla ba// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i
sras chos kyi tshul nyon mongs pa thams cad skyems pa 'di nyid blangs kyang/ sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro/ la la zhe sdang gi dbang du 'gro/ la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro/
nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro/ 'chab pa'i dbang du 'gro/ khon du 'dzan pa'i dbang du 'gro/ phrag dog gi dbang du 'gro/ ser sna'i dbang du 'gro/ sbya'i dbang du 'gro zhing 2 g.yo 'a dibang du 'gro la/
chos de dag kyang sems med par gzung du yang mi nus te/ nyon mongs par gdags pa kun tu sems kyi rgyun du zad na/ de ji lta bu // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos
dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smos pa// gang gi don du dris pa'i rnams // sangs rgyas sras po nga las nyon// yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa
'di// thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub bo// la la stobs med chu klung gis/ nad kyis khyer bar gyur pa dag/ skoms zhang shi bar gyur pa bzhin// ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no/ ji
ltar 'gro ba mang po la// zas dang skom dag sbyin byas kyang// bdag nyid bkres pas shi ba ltar// de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar sman pa la la zhig/ sman rnams thams
[9]@#/// cad bdog bzhin du// lto yi nad kyis shi ba bzhin// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu// rin chen mang po bgrang byed kyang/ nam phyed/
ba tsam yang mi 'thob pa// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar bde pa kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor skyes kyang// zas dang skom dag ma bdog pa// de bzhin chos la ma
bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar 'on pa rol mo yi// sal snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig/ gzhan dag de yis dga' byed pa// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar ramus long ri mo mkhan//
tshong dus dbus su 'dir 'jug kyang// bdag nyid kyis ni ma mthong ba// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig/ skye bo ma nga po sgrol byed kyang//
bdag nyid de nanga'ami 'gyur pa// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang// phun sum tshogs pa kun rjod cing// bdag gis thos par mi 'gyur la//
chos la mi bsgoms de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dbal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i
sras de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can bkalan sbyin pa brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni tshul khrims/ la
la la ni bzod pa/ la la lan brtson 'grus/ la la la ni bsam gtan ! la la la shes rab brjod pa mdzad/ la la la na byams pa 3 la la la ni snying rje/ la la la ni dga' ba//
la la la ni btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang/ thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar ma nus so// de nas byang chub sems
dba' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste// de ltar
gang gi don dris pa// sangs rgyas sras po bdag las nyon// smra ba'i chog ni gang yang rung// chos gcig gsan byung pa med// gang yang 'byung ba yod pa min// 'byung par
'gyur ba de bzhin med// skal ba gang la gnas pa yi// bsam pa rnams ni mkhyen mdzad cing// gang la ci dag tshul mthun pa// de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad// ser
sna can la sbyin pa brjod// tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams // mi bzod la ni bzod dang des// brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o// rnam par 'khrugs la bsam
gtan brjod// shes rab 'byor pa shes med la'o// gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad/ 'tsho ba rnams la snying rje ste/ zhum pa la ni ngaga' ba bshad// 'khyor pa'i
sems la btang snyoms te// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyapa// rim pas de ltar 'byung pa yin// ji ltar sa la las bya ba// khyim gyi dngos la ma pa
yin// de bzhin sbyin pa tshul khrims dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro// rgyal po'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams // rubapa'i phyin re ba ste// de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag
byang chub sems dpa' rub phyir ro// ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni// sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed// de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no//
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po na// bad ba thams cad ster ba ltar// de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang// byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin// de nas byang chub
sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'byung ba gcig na//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasan sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag 'ad ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ sems can 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang/
tsho'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ bstan/
pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar gyur/ sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la chig su bcad de spus pa
chos kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid ni// 'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste// bsgribs pa med pa gzigs pa yi/ 'byung ba de yang gcig pu'o// sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste// de
bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste// mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no// sngon chad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe// ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa/
'khor du chos rnams bstan pa dang// de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur// zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa// sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub// sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa'i
rnams // de yi rnam pa de ltar mthong// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du// kun gyis sas rgyas mu mthong ste// sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang// 'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no/
gang rnams smon lam phun ldan zhing// sngon chad bsam pa yongs sbyangs pas// thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyis rnams // ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong// sems can/
bsam pa ji bzhin dang// las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa// de lta de ltar mthong 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas zhing la rtog/
zla/ mamanga'// de dag byams sdang yod pa min// bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du// srog chags rnamasakyi de bzhin mthong// rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams// de ltar snang bar gyur
pa de// drang srong chen po kun gzigs pa'i// nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med// gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// skyes bu drang srong
rnams kyang snang// de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces
smras so// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa'i rnams sbas pa yin na/ da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul la rtsoms te
spobs par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul na gang/ sas rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni gang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni gang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la
'jug pa ni ji lta bu / sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni gang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba nigang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pani gang/ sangs
cas rgyas kyi yul shes par byed pa ni gang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni gang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni ji lta bu / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji tsam du yas/
nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dang la gyis// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smas pa/ nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste// kun tu 'od la 'dra ba med//
sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste// chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med// tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni// bskal pa bye bar ma nus te// ji snyad rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba// de
ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// blo gros sems kyang de bzhin na// sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug/ de la bstan pa thogs pa med// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// 'jig rten thams
cad 'jug pa dang// 'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa// de dag kun la ye shes gnas// gozugs med snang ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de// dus gsum kun la chags
pa med// nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin// de ni ye shes yul yin no// chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad// sems can khams rnams rtogs par mkhyen// dbyings rnams thams
cad rab tu bsus// de nisangs rgyas yul yin no// sger gdags ji snyed yod pa dang// sems can kun gyi sgra skad du// sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang// rnam par rtog pa gang yang
med// rnam shes rnam par shes bya med// sems kyis brjod pa'ang ma yin te// ye shes rang bzhin shin tudag/ sems can rnams la'ang rab tu bshad// nyon
za mongs med cing las med de// dngos po med cing gnas pa med// snang ba med cing rgyu ba med// 'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par sbyod// sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams // dus
lca gsum kun tu rab yangs pa// sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jug/ de nas de'i tsho 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ soms

can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang/ chos kyi rgyud jisnyad pa dang/ las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang/ lus kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang/ dbang po'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang/ skye
ba'i rgyud jisnyad pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang/ tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud jisnyad pa dang 3 yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad

zla sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad
med pa/ dpag tu mad pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa// kun tumatha' yas pa/ mumed pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du
[/ ]med ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i dbyas kyi mthas gtugs pa// thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyu ba ji snyad pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras
bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ de bzhin du nu phyogs dang/ de bzhin du byang phyogs dang/ de
bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ de bzhin du ltonub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 3 de bzhin
du 'og gi phyogs mtshams dang/ de bzhin du stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshadamad dpag tu med pa// grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa ! mtshungs pa med
pa ! kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa// brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa/ rnam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/
sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to//
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpas dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///
bco brgyad pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa'aye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpa la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyalaba'i
sras byang chub sems dpa'i rnams ji ltar na khan ma tho ba med pa'alus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lan ma tho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan
pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma smad pa yin/ ngag gi las ma smad pa
yin/ yid kyi las ma smad pa yin/ lus kyi las ma 'phrogs pa yin/ ngag ga las ma 'phrogs pa yin/ yid kyi las ma 'phrogs pa yin/ lus kyi las ma zlogs pa yin/ ngag gi
las ma zlogs pa yin/ yid kyi las ma zlogs pa yin/ lus kyi las ma 'khrugs pa yin/ ga ga las ma 'khrugs pa yin/ yid kyi las ma 'khrugs pa yin/ lus kyi las
bsngags pa yin/ ngag gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid kyi las bsngags pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par dag
pa yin/ lus kyi las nye ba nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ yid kyi las nye ba nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba
[sj]yin/ ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin//
gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ mtshan bun sum tshogs pa yani/ dran pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dga' ba phun
sum tshogs pa yin/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros mchog tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/ blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros tshad med pa yin/ blo gros
grangs med pa yin/ blo gros bsam gyis ma khyab pa yin/ blo gros mtshus pa med pa yin/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo gros brjod du med pa yin/ rgyu'i stobs can yin/
bsam pa'i stobs can yin/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin 2 rkyen gyi stobs can yin ) dmags pa'i stobs can yin/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs can
yin/ zhi gnas kyi stobs can yin/ lhag mthong ga stobs can yanaM/ nges par rtog pa'i stobs can yin/ phung po la mkhas pa yin/ khams la mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la
mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'dod pa'i khams la mkhas ba yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas
[9/ ]@#// pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/ da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin//
chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas
ba lan/ rab tu byung ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la
mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ mtshanamamad pa yongs su bsgoms pa yani/ smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/
byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pashes par bya
ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su
[co]/ rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ khams sna tshogs dang khams du ma'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ mos pa sna tshogs dang mos pa du ma shes par bya/
pa khong du chud pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ kun nas
nyon mos pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsgrubs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i mig chags pa
med pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag nga 'khadab shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ klu'i dbang
pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongasasu bzung ba yin/ nam
mkha' lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i debang pos yongs su bzung ba yin 3 mi'i dbang pos yongs su bzung
ba yani/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yengs su bzung ba yin 3 lta'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/
! dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang bos bkur ba yani/ nam mkha' ldang ga debang pos bku ba yin ma 'am ci'i dbang pos
bkur ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang bos bkur ba yin/ ma'i debang bos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin/ skyabs su gyur
pa yin/ dgung garkyen du gyur yin/ mgon du gyur pa yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin ( snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su
'dren par gyur pa yin/ sams can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab du gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yin/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med
pa yin/ kyargyal ba'i sras ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub

sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'isras khyod de ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ lta dang ma rnams /
kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ bde bar rnam par gzud spyod pa'i phyir zhugs shing/ de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su dri bar soms pa ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
x
thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/
da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba
yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ kun tu bzang zhing kun tu
mdzes pa dang/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa gnyis par 'gyur ba'i soms kyi las yid la byed
pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur
ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sems can thams
decad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas/ khyim gyi thibs pos zil gyis ma non par gyur cageces sems bskyed do// pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub
sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa dang shin tu bral bas dga' ba dang mi dga' ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig ces sams bskyed do// rgyu dang/ gar dang rol mo dang/
sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyi tshon lta bu r mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig
cesasems bskyed do// chung ma'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing/ 'phags pa'i sar chud par gyur
cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin par khur bor bar gyur cig cesasems
bskyed do// khang tog tu phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing/ chos kyi khang stangs su phyin par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do//
sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdag gir bya ba med de/ yongasasu 'dzin pa'i sems med cing bdag gi thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig ces
sems bskyed do// ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar phyin te/ 'du ba dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig ces sams bskyed
do// btson ra la kha na ma tho bar mthong ba'itsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa laspyod cing gang du dga' bar 'dong bar gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// khyim nas khyim
mad par 'byung ba'i/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing/ chags pa med de ma dgos ba dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/
dge 'dun gyi ra ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing/ mthun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems
bskyod do// mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do/[u0f8b]ga tu
@#// 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bar chad med cing/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ ('byusarab sal la cha/
dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe/ byang chub soms dang sa sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa sbyangs te dag ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// skra dang kha spu 'dreg pa'i
tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// gos ngur smig gon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
dpas sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rtog pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu 'byung ba'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang
chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon bar bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung ma 'chad pa'i don du brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyad do// chos
la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe//
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chags pa'i gnas dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bslab pa'i tshig yang dag par len pa'i tsha
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing/ bslab pa thams cad la shin tu bslab par gyur cigacesasems bskyed do// slob dpon
gyis bstan pa'i [ ]/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la spyod cing tshul dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi skye ba'i yid shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sams/
bskyeng do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin de/ thabs mkhas pa'i nga rol du
phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ phyung chub sems dpas sems can thams cad m 'phrogs pa'i chos can du gyur blam
mid pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// stan 'dang ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing/
ma @#// legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'dug pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi gnas ba'i sems kyis
snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'cha' ba'atsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma g.yo ba'i mal dgo ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par
gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zhu gnas yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i tsho 3 byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug ba la brtson zhing zhi ba dang dul ba la
rab tu gzhol bar gyur cigaces sems bskyed do/ lhag mthong yos su sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin du nyon mos pa med pa'i chos can du
gyur te/ chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par
gzhag cang/ 'du byed thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa rnam par mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang mthil gzhog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces sams bskyed do// rkang mthil 'dogs pa'atsho/ byang chub sems dang sasems can thams cad kha na
[s]ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste/ khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thon par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nga tsho
shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ska rags 'ching ba'i tsho 3 byang chub sems dang sa sems can thos
cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'bral bar gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// bla gos gyon pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol du phyin pa thob ste gong nas gong du dag ba'i rtsa ba thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de// sbyar ma gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad ma 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ thabs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// so shing len pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po 'thob pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// so shing za ba'i byang chub sems dpas
sams na thams cad nyon mongs pa shan tu bcom ste ! soms dul zhing sems dag bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dben par 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug spangs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu ngogasasu 'gro ba'i tshe/
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu byung bar gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// gtsang sbra'i las byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub
sems dpas sems can thams cad shAn tu dag pa'i dngos pos gtsang zhing des pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lag pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
sams can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gzung zhing btsang ba'i phyir/ bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// ngo 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chud/
sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing/ chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khar ba len pa'i tshe/
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas pagang/ lam ston par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dang sa
sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snod du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyod yul du mngon par zhugs pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dbas
sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam du zhugs pa'i tshe/
byang chub sems dang sa sems can thams cad phyin ma lus par 'gro zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'gro ba'i tsho byang chub sems
dang sa sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa mad pa grub par gyur pas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems
bskyed do// lam mtho ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu zhum pa med de/ khams gsum las gyen du 'phags par gyur cig ces sems
bskyod do// lam dma' ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dag ba'i rtse bas shin tu brtan cing/ sangs rgyas thams cad la shani tu 'dud par gyur cig
ces sems bskyod do// lam nyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lta ba yo zhing mi drang ba dang bral te/ nyam nga ba yongs su sbyangs par gyur cig ces
sams bskyod do// lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad g.yo med cing sgyu med de/sems drang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam
rdul chen bo mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rdul med pa'i chos yang dag par thob ste/ 'dod chags par gyur pa'i chos
[3 ]las rnam par 'grel par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yos su
bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de// g.yang sa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa rtogs
par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bsalate/ dag ba'i chos la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khor mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
sems can thams cad dus gsum du gtogs pa'i chos zab mo bstan pa dang mthun par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// ka ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dang sa sems can thams
cad khro zhing khon du 'dzin ba dang bral to/ 'ongs pa dang 'khrug pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur cigecasasems bskyed do// nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
tshe thams cad lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig ces sems bskyad do// ri mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thob par dka' ba dang
thibs po med pa rab tu thob chung/ dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de// gnying ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug med cing/ tshor ma dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shang lo ma can mthong ba'i byang chub sems dar sa sems can
thams cad bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rab tu log par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// ma rtog ma shong ba'i tshe/
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas/ me tog lta bu r gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ma rtog gshing mthong ba'i
! byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsumacu rtsa gnyis kyi mi rtog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing thog mthong ba'i tshe/
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying po byang chub tu gzhol zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba thams cad 'bras bu yod de/ 'bras bu'i dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig
ces sems bskyad do// chu klung mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ chos kyi rgyun la mnyam par gzhag par
@#// gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// lum mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dang sa sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ sa
gol gtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdzing bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi tshig shin tu bstan/
pa la mkhas shing/ chos thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i tshig gi'os dang ldan par gyuracig/ces sems bskyed do// khron pa mthong ba'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
chos thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mtsho mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmigs
pa la rab tu brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// zam pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sku bo thams cad yongs su
bsgral ba lazam par med par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// yur ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dang sa sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi sems dang bsam pa la mkhas shing bag la
nyal ba dang/ kun nas 'khor ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ra ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang// ngo dang
[d; ]reg bya la srid pa rab tu byang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa shin tu med cing mya ngan/
med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// bza' shing gi ra ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtang ba la
shin tu brtson bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum cu rtsa gnyis
kyis brgyan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan
mad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dga' bo mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' zhing mos pa dang/ spro
bas dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sams bskyed do// mi dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dus byas kyi dngos po
thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sams can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sams dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo
byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sams can sdug bsngal bo mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nad mad ba ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas
sams can thams cad shin tu mya ngan med pa'i chos can du gyur to/ tha dad pa man pa khong du chud par gyur cig cesasams bskyed do// sems can sdug gu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la chos pa mang bar gyur cig ces sams bskyed do// ma sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tsho
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la gos pa chung bar gyurdza cig ces sems bskyed do// dun gzo ba'i sams can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mdzad pa shes par gyur cagi rus sems bskyed do// drin gzo bamed pa'i sems
canamathong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma dge ba'i lta ba la drin du gzo ba med par gyur cig cesasams bskyed do// dag sbyong mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing/ zhi ba dang dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ bram ze mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas/
sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dam par gyur te/ sdig pa sbyangs par gyur cig cesasems bskyed do// dka' thub can mthong ba'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing dka' thub la shin tu gzhol bar gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// brtul zhugs la zhugs pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su ma gtong ba'i phyir/ brtul zhugs dam por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// go gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tsho/ byang chub sems
dpas sems can thams cad rang byung gi chos yongs su btsal ba la go cha bzang po shin tu bgos par gyur smug ces sems bskyed do// go ma gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma dge ba'i las bya ba thams cad la go gyon pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
sems dpas sems can thams cade phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// 'tsho ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
@#// sems can thams cad sprod lam bcos pa med cing 'tsho ba dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems ngang sa sems can
thams cad thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces soms bskyed do// rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dang sasams can thams/
cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa/ chos kyi sprul par gyur cig ces soms bskyed do// khyim bdag mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rnam par
gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te/ grong gi chos sbas por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// blon po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i
chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la bzang po yod la byed par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sams dpas sems can thams cad gdul dka'
ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ mthu bo ma'i lus dang 'du bar gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
yon tan gyi rjes su 'brang bar mthun pa la mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces sams bskyed do// nags tshal gyi 'dab mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsngags par 'os par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// slong du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs
pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos kyi dbyings su chud par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// sgor phyin pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
kyi skor phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nang du phyin pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyus kyi theg pa dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin par gyur cig
ces sems bskyed do// mi sbyin no zhes ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing phyir spang ba mad par gyur cigaces sems
bskyed do// ma sbyin no zhes byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las
phyir sbyangs par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed stong pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stongs par gyur
cig ces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed gang ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig ces sems
0/ @#// bskyod do// rim gror byas pa'i/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rim gro byed par gyur cig ces
sems bskyed do// rim gror ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed
do// khral yod pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dbang po dben pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod par gyur cig ces sems bskyad do/
ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas shing ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed
do/ kha bras bsod pa thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thang thing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ra
gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas ma bsod pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur
cig ces sems bskyed do/ kha zas snum bag thob ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan zhingasams/
[po ]]'jam pa gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// snum bag med pa'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi srid pa dang bral te snam bag med
pa'i sems su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyus
shing bsam gtan gyi zas za bar gyur cig ces sams bskyed do// ro myang ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i res ngoms par gyur cing skyes buchan
po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zan zos pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin cing
bya ba byas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos ston pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpasasems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing/
spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyuracig ces sems bskyod do// phyir 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong
sta khams gsum thams cad nas phyung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu 'bog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrus byed pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mtha' yas
pa dang ldan zhing/ lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drob la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mu med par phyin te/
gongs su gdung ba sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsal ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu bsil bar gyur te/ bla na med pa'i
bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos thob par byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpasasems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam gyi rjes su
'gro zhing ! chos kyi dbyings dang 'dris par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de// sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad
dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob ste/ bsgribs pa mod pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// migam 'gabs par lta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dang sa sems can thams
cad kun tu mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig cesas mas bskyed do// mchod rten mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing
mchod rten lta bu r gyur cigaces sems bskyed de// lta ba'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis blta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyod do//
spyi bos 'thug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtan gyis spyi gtsug ltar mi snang bar gyur cig ces sams bskyed de// g.yas phyogs su
bskor ba byed pa 'tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang mthun par gyur cig ces soms bskyed do// lan gsum skor ba'i tshe/ byang
chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i re ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces sams bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyayon tan rjod pa'i tsho/ byang chub
sems dngasasems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do/ mtshan rnams rjod pa'atsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cigaces sems bskyed do// lus sbyong ba'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad bsam pa la rtog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyodado// gnyid sad pa'i[& ]/ byang chub sems 8 nyams can
thathams cad thams cad phyogs bcu tham cad du mthuchan po thob bar gyur to/ thams cad makhyen pa'i shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'is ngas rgyas su gyur cig ces sems
bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisoms kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag ngang gnyan thams cad kyang
thob par 'gyur zhing/ ltadang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang/ bdud du bcas pa dang/ tshas par bcas pa dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ skye dgur bcas pa dang/
lha dang ! bra dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa thams cad kyis mi'i phrogs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub
sems dpas sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i me do sa sa rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste bcu
drug pa'o/// bam po bcu dgu pa/ la yo na tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa// de skad smras nas sems can dri med pa//
'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub yon tan rnams // sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris// spyod yul yongs dag rgyal bas spyad pa'i rnams // bdag gis rgyal sras rnams
la 'di'i bshad do// yon tan spyod pa ji snyed gang yod pa// rgyal sras rnams la da na khyod kyis shod// bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon// yon tan ma tha'i las de dag
yon tan las// mtsho las thogs pa ji bzhin nyung shas shig/ mgo skyes tsam du cung zad brjod par bya// byang chub don du rang byung 'gyur bya zhes// thog mar byang chub sems
skyes gyur pa yi// yon tan brjod pa 'ang mtha' yas dpag tu med// dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad ma gyur// pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan la// bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci
zhagi gos// de dag yon tan chu bo thams cad ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad ma 'gyur/ yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las// dpe tsam cha shas nyung tsam brjopar
bya// mkha' las 'dab chags lam ltar ni tu chung// sa chen lhung las rdul phran gcig kyang 'dra// byang chub yon tan bsam pa'i sems skye pa// rgyumad ma yin gyin 'byung ba yin/
rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang// dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed bas skye// de yang 'dod pa skyid pa rgyal srid dang// bdag bde'i don dang grags dang snyan phyir min//
[5]/[© ]/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhal pa'i phyir// 'jig rten phan bskyed sems ni yongs su skye// de ni sems can rtag tu bde don dang// zhing sbyangs sangs/
rgyas mang po mchod pa'i rgyur// yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing// ye shes rnam par sbyong ba'i sems skyo 'o// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang// de bzhin bla mar
gyur pa thamasacad la// dad dang mos pa dga' ba bskyed byas te// sri zhur mchod byas byang chub sems kyang skye// rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid ches nas// rgyal sras spyod
pa rnams la yid chos te// byang chub blon mod la yid ches shing// skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skya'o// dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar skyed pa ste// yon tan thams yongs su skyong
ts+tshA zhing 'dren// nem nur rnams la nad 'dus rab tu sgrol// dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed// dad pa sems gsal rtog ba med pa ste// nga rgyal rnam sbyangs sri zhu'irtsa ba yin// dad
ba spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te// lag pa lta bu r dag sdud rtsa ba yin/ yongs su gtang la dad pa dga' bar byed// rgyal ba'i chos la dad pa spro bskyang/ yon tan ye shes khyad
par dod pa byed// sangs rgyas lam la ston pa'ang rnyed par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab tugasal ba dang// gzhan gyis mi thub dngos la dad pa stobs// nyon mongs thub pa med la
gnas yin te// dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin// dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang ma 'grogs te// ma khom spong zhing 'du 'dzi med par byed// dad pa bdud kyi lam las zlo ba ste// bar
lam dam pa yongs su ston pa yin// yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul bzhin// dad pa byang chub shing rab rnam par spyod// ye shes khyad par sgo rnams 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba
rnams kyi ston pa yin// de bas dad mos khyad par dga' ba la// spyod pa rimagyis rnam par rjod par byed// chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon// rin chen sang ga'i rgyal
bo ji bzhin no// dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa// de dag tshul khrims slob pa ma gtong ngo// tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams mi gtong ba// de dag yon tan gnas pas yon
tan ldan// tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste// bslab pas sa yi yon tan legs la brtson// tshul khrims bslab pa yongs su ma btang na// rgyal ba rnams kyis
bstod cing bsngags par 'os// dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs pa byed// rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas
mos pa bsam mi khyab// dad pas chos la phud dud gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis ma ngoms nyan// rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms su nyan pa// de dag bsam gyis
n+d+hag ma khyab chos la mos// dad pas dge 'dun phud dud su byed pa// de dag ma ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos/ ma ldog dge 'dun rnams la su chos pa//
thad dag dad pa'i stobs kyis phyir ma ldeg/ dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing// gang rnams dbang po rab tu gsal rno ba// desan sdig
pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs// gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa// de dgachos kyi bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin// chos kyi bshes gnyen ga nga gis yongs bzung ga/
da dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su sogs// dag brgya chen yongs su gang sogs pa// bdag nyid cha bde dag rgyu mthu ldan// bdaganyid che ba rgyu mthu gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par
mngos pa 'thob// mos pa yangs pa'i khyadapar sus thob pa// de dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams brlabs gyur pa// de dag byang chub don du
sams kyang skya// byang chub don du gang gis sems skyes pa// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson// drang srong chen po'i yon tan su brtson pa// de dgasangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan
skyes// sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa// de dag 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs// 'du dang 'bral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa// de dag bsam pa dang zhi rnam par g/
[s/]gang gi bsam ba dang zhing rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog/ lhag bsam dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa sprod/ pha la phyin la rtag tu
su spyod pa// de dag thog pa chen po 'di la spyod// theg pa chen po 'ad la su spyod pa// de dganan tan dam pa sangs rgyas mchod// nan tan dam pa sangs rgyas su mchod pa// de dag sangs
rgyas rjes dran phyed pa med// sangs rgyas rjes dran gang la mi phyed pa// de dag rtagatu sangs rgyas bsam ya/sa mthong// rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas sus mthong ba// de dag rtag tu
sangs rgyas mi 'grogs man// rtag tusangs rgyas ma 'grogs su ma yin// de la chos nub 'gyur ba nam yang med// gang la chos nub 'gyur ba med gyur pa// de dag spobs pa bsgribal
tshad dang ldan// spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang su ldan pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang yas// gang gas chos rab bstan pa mtha' yas pa// de dag 'gro la byams pas
phan pa tshol// 'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba bstan// snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba su bstan pa// de dag chos kyi dga' bas dbang po gang dga' ba//
de dag 'du bye da nyes la btang snyoms so// 'du byed nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa// de dag nga rgyal rlom sems bag med spangs// nga rgyal rlom sems bag mad sus spangs pa//
