de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// bdag dang gzhan don rtagatu su brtson pa// de dag 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med// gang la 'khor bas yongs su
skyo med pa// de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan// brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag mngon shes rnam dag mngon par skyes// gang gi mngon shes rnam dag
mngon skyes pa// de dag spyod pa mchog gi dra bar zhugs// spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas// 'gro ba yongs su smin par gang
mkhas pa// de dag 'gro sdud ye shesatshul la mkhas// 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// bsdu dngos bzhi la gang rnams brtson gyur
a pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha'i yas byed// 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas su byed pa// de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan// shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog su
rdza ldan pa// dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas// bla med lam la dpa' bo gang gnas pa// de dag bdud kyi dpung gis grub pa min// gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub min pa/
de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongs su 'das// bdud lam bzhi las yongs su su 'das pa// de dag phyir mi ldog gsar yang phyin// ma ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa// de
09) dag mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin// ma skya'i bzod pa gang gis thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan// 'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag rgyal ba
kun dang mngon du gnas// rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa// de dag rgyal ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la mkhas// rgyal ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la su mkhas pa// de dag rgyal bkun gyis
dgongs pa yin// gang rnams rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis su brgyan pa// de dag bsod
nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs// bsod nams dam pas gang gi lus sbyangs pa// de dag gsar gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag
mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan// mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang su ldan pa// de dag dpa byad bzang pos lus kyang bris// dpa byung bzang pos gang gi lus bris pa// de dag
lus 'od kun tumatha' yas so// gang gi lus 'od kun tumatha' yas pa// de dag 'od zer rgyan kyang bsam mi khyab// gang la 'od zer bsam yas rgyan yod pa// de dag 'od
las pad+mo mang bo 'byung// gang gi 'od las pad+mo mang 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba pad+mo'agingan bzhugs pa// ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang// don yod rnam paspyod
[/ ]@#// cing sems can 'dul// gang rnams rgyal ba pa'i gdan bzhugs pa// ston cing de dag phyogs bcu kun tu yang// don yod rnam spyod sems can 'dul byed
pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// gang gi mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// de dag bsam gyis ma khyab chos ston cing// sems can bsam gyis mi
khyab dgar byed pas// bsam gyis ma khyab zhing na rnam par spyod// gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhang ston cing// bsam yas sems can dga' bar su byed pa// de dag bsam
pa ji bzhin 'jig rten na// tha dad yang dag shes mthus sems can 'dul// tha dad yang dag shes pa'i ye shes mthus// bsam ba ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba// de dag
lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung// gang gi lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar rab tu 'byung// de dag smon lam/
stobs kyis ci dga' bar// sems can rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston// smon lam stobs kyis gang rnams ci dga' bgrwa/ sems can rgyud du gzugs mang ston byed la//
tshe de dag tshig tu brjod cing smra ba yang// sgra la dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab// tsheg tu brjod cadi ci dang ci skya yang// gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yas pa// de dag
[z/ ]'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam par shes// gang gis ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes ga/

de dag skye dang shi 'pho nam yang med// nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang de bzhin skye bamed// skye dang shi 'pho gang la med gyur cing// nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye med pa// de dag yon tan chos nyid/
yashasalus// chos kyis smos par 'jig rten kun tu spyod// yon tan chos nyid yi shes lus ldan zhing// chos kyis smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa// de dgas bcu rnams dang dbang bcu
ya// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar la spyod// gang rnams sa bcu dbang rnams bcu po yi// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa// de dag mngon shes rgyan gyis rnam par
'thul// ting 'dzan dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob// mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing// ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod gus thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'irgyal
ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad nod byed pa//
de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mtha'i bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang bskur// gang gis spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud
rtsis mngon par dbang bskur ba// de dag ma lus nam mkha' rgyas byas shing// phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas pa byed// gang rnams namakha' ma lus rgya bkang
zhing/ phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brten gnas byed pa// dpe med de dag spyod yul shes par ni// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas ma nusaso// dpe med gang gi spyod yul shes bya ba la/
'jin rten lha dang bcas pas ma nus pa// de dag brtson 'grus thams cad don kyang yod// mthong dang ma thos srobs pa'ang don yod do// gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod
cing// mthong dwang mang thos spobs pa don yod pa// skyes chen de dag spyin bdag gtong ba yin// sbyin pa'i gnas te thams cad don kyang yod// skyes bu dam pa de dag byin mthu yis//
dam chos tshul ni mi yig brten par gnas// dag pa'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang// rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgya zhing gnas// rdo rje stag po'i rin chen tshogs yod pas//
de yi mthu yis rgya mche rin chen rnams // ma zad 'phel zhing 'gribs pa gang yang med// de bzhin yon tanamatha' yas yon tan mtsho// sangs rgyas ma bzhugs zhing rnams gang
yod pa// de dag kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang na dam chos mad gyur pa// de dag kun tu'ang chos kyi gter ston to// de dag ma rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/[I]
lhun gyis grub par phyogs rnams thams cad du// zla ba lta bu r gzugs b.ran ston byed cing// thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag skad cig re rer byang chub tu//
rnam bar sangs rgyas phyogs bcu kun tu ston// 'khor lo skor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang// sku gdung rgya chen de bzhin dba' bo ston// mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyal sa// sangs rgyas
rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams mtha' yas pa// yongs su ston cing bskal pa bsam yas su// thego ba gsum gyi sgo nas sems can 'dul// khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus// skyes pa
lha dang lha min klu rnams dang// gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phya chen po'i gzugs// mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongs su ston// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rgyu yi sgo dag nas// 'gro ba'i
gzugs mang rgyud ni ji snyed dang// cha byad spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams // thams cad ma lus dpa' bo ston pabyed// de dag zhing rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab ste// phyogs bcu'i rgyal
pa thams cad mchod pa byed/ de dug 'od zer mang po bsam mikhyab// sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yang yas// tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul dang// lus
kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab// sbyin pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa dang// bzod pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag bsam gtan shes rab rnam 'phrul
dang// thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas tshogs kyi ting 'dzin sgo dag nas// yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas//
de dag rdul phran 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin rnams // rdul phran kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing// rdul phran rtse gcig bsam yas zhing gi rnams // ston pa byed kyang rdul la 'phal ba med//
rdul gcig rtsa la rang sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing dang// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing yang de bzhin ston// kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa dang/ yangs shing phra dang cho
rma ba'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig cing 'du ba dang// la la spyi'i tshugs rim gyis gnas par ston// la la stsal zha smig rgyu lta bu ste// de bzhin gzhan rnams
mig 'phrul lta bu r ston// de dag rdul gcig rtser ston ji bzhin du// ma lus rdul rnams kun la de bzhin te// drang srong tong 'dzan rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o// mtha' yas
grags pa'i rnam thar de 'dra 'o// rgyal ba mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon pa sgrub byed kyang// lag pa'i mthil gyis stong gsum rgyas
bkang zhing// skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu kun na ma rtog 'phrong ba dang// spos dang byug pa rin chen rin che ba// de dag byang chub shing drung bzhug
[E3]0/ pa yi: rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'gyed// na bza' phyi ma rin chen ji snyad dang// rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs dam sna tshogs dang// gsar gyi rgyan dang rin chen bla
re dag/ lag mthile de nas char du mngon par 'bebs// phyogs rnamasamatha' yas kun gyi yo byad rnams // drang srong chol mchod par gang 'os pa// de dag lag mthil re nas char du 'babs//

byang chub shing drung rgyal ba mchod pa byed// jol mo'i rnam pa phyogasan jisnyad pa/ rnga chen rnga dang pa wang sgra snyan dang// rol mo brdung dkrol gling bu sgra rab rnams // de dag lag mthal de nas
sgra yang sgrog/ phyogs bcu'i dpa med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna tshogs dang// bstod pa'i tshigs bcad bsgrubs pa sna tshogs kyang/ lag
mthal de nas sgra rab snyan par 'byung// de dag 'od zer las dgas yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyod byed cing// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams sbos chus ma lus par//
kun tu btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod/ 'od zer yid 'ong snang zhing brgyan ldan pa// lag pa'i mthal bkyi pad+mo bsam mi khyab// pad+morgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs//
mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod pa byed// 'od zer ma tog rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing// ma tog rgyan dang me tog blare dang// me tog sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing// bdag nyid che/
[r ]@#// ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer sbos kyi rgyan rnams rob bkye zhing// spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang// sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yo sa bkang zhing//
bdag nyid cha ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer pha ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing// phyi ma'i rgyan dang bya ma'i bla re dang// phyam sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing// bdag nyidar ba de dag
rgyu rgyal ba mchod// 'od sbar na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing// na bza'i rgyan dang na bza'i blar dang// na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing// bdag nyid chab de dag rgyal ba mchod/
tshu 'od zer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing// rin chen rgyan dang rin chen bla re dang// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer
'i pasmobagyin rnams rab bkye zhing// pad+mo'i rgyan dang pad+mo'i bla re dang// pad+mo sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer 'phreng ba'i rgyan
sgyu rnams rab bkye zhing// 'phrang ba 'argyan dang 'phreng ba'i bla re dang// 'phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rgyal mtshan
mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing// de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang// sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan can gyis// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas rgyan pa byed// de dag bde
gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog/ rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa// dar gyi lda ldi ba dan yongs spya ngas shing// dril 'phrang rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin pa byed// lag
ba'i mthil nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// mchod ba rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar// ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o// de dag 'gro
ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis// rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing// bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du// thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// la
la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang// sbyin pa bsam gyis ma khyab gtong ba'i sgo// sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims sgo/ khazod pa ma zad mi bskul sgo dag dang// la la
brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo// bsam gtan rab du zhing gnas sgo dag dang// don rnams rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo// tshul rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang//
tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu ba'i dngos bos phan tshol sgo dag dang// bsod nams yongs su bsags dang ye shes sgo// bden pa rten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang//
la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo// nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang// rang rgyal thog pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo// theg pa dam pa rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang// la mi rtag pa dang
sdug bsngal sgo// la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang// ma sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral ba'i sgo// la la zhi 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dag tu// 'gro ba'i spyod
sgo jisnyad yod rgyu ba// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te// de dag kun gyi sgo ya sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang rnams kun gyi sgo la sgo dag nas//
bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus te// ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra 'o// de dag dga' ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba
thams cad yongs smin byeng 'thun pa// dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas// bsam gyis ma khyab yongs stonasems can 'dul// gang tsholo nyos thams cad dkon gyur pa//
de tsho 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams // thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir// sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing 'gro don byed// de dag zas mchog skom dbamchog dang// gos
dang dgab pa rin chen sna tshogs dang// rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug yongs btang bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba byed// de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing//
gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te// 'phrang bas rnam brgyan spos kyis bsku byas pa'i// gzugs rnams yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul// mthong bas
tsam dga' bde rab tu mos pa la// de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byad mdzes// gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing// gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul
ba byed// de dag ka la pang ka'i sgra snyan dang// ko kal kun ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang// rnga dang tshangs pa mi'am ci yi sgras// mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin chos kyang ston//
de dag stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po// gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul//
de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang don mang grogs kyang de bzhin te// sems can dgos la grogs su 'gyur byas pa shing// grogs kyi sgo nas sems can
rnam par 'dul// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams // grogs kyi don du de dag bzod par byed// 'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du// de dag grogs don mi
bde nyams su len// gang na 'byung ba med cing chos med de// dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa ma dmigs pa// de dag kun tu rgyal srid cha sbyangs shing// zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas
med mngon par 'byung// de dag khyim gyi btson ra srid gnas pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ mngon par byung
zhing thar pa yongs su brjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing// skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod drang srong sbyong pa thams cad ma lus bar//
yongs su sgom zhing 'grol shokyang byed/ gang na sems can tshad med cha ldan pa// bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa// de dag kun tu nad gzar nad pacan// bdag la dbang
mdatsam gyi dbang sgyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te// gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mer 'bar zhing// rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i// 'jig
rten bstan cing sams can 'dul ba byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu ma 'jigs bzhi// chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che ba
rjod byed cing// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyi 'gro don byed// de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjed ston gyis// gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba// de bzhin gsheg
pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyi// 'gro ba'i don du 'jig rtan rim gror byed// 'jig
rten mi chags tshul pad+mo bzhin// dga' bamos pa skye bar rnam par spyod// de dag rjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal po byed// gar mkhan rdza mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan// mdzes shing sdug
pa bzhan bod byed pa dang// sgyur mkhan gzugs mang kun tu ston pa khyed// grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang// ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te// rgyal po blon po mda' rab bo
nya dang// sman pa mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa byed// dag nags tshal sdong bo chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin chen ma zad gter dag dang// yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin pashi dang//
lam gol 'khyams la de bzhin lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas marongashis gyur cing// sems can las kyi tshul la mishes pa// de dag kun la rmos thabs tshong thabs dang//
sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang rjod ba byed// 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams // sems can bde spyod mkhas pas rab bsngags pa// rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs
rnams // kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par brjod// drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog/ gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dad 'gyur dang// brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' thub
mchog gi rnams // kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston pa byed// de dag rgyu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can// dka' thub spyod yul mi snar spyod pa dang// sgron mo gos med ri yi dge spyong la//
mu stegs can gyi mkhan po mkhas pa byed// de dag yongs 'tsho chos la spyod pa dang// bla na yod dang bla na med pa'i rnams // rol pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhugs can// de dag tu
yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur// nyima'i rjes 'brang dka' thub lnga ldan dang// khyi dang ba glang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod// glecan mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa'i
rnams // de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang// mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang// rtsa ba 'bras bu tshul spyod pa'i rnams //
chos sems nang na de dag dam par 'gyur// gnas bteg gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang// tshor ma rtswa dang thal pa'i mal can dang// dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod pa'i rnams //
de dag kun du'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa// de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing// bsgrub dka' ma bzad drag shul dka' thub kyi//
mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bas 'dul// 'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas// lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stagaso can// kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs
tshul gyis// bden pa ston pa de dag kun tu byed// la lar dra byi la yi sngags tshig tu// shin tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal zhing dang tsheg gis//
la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang// don nges rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang// rgol ba 'dul ba'i shes tshig rnams dang// bstan pa
ba thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la ma skad tshig rnams dang// kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams dang// la la dag la lha yi tshig rnams dang// klu yi tshig ces
gnod sbyin tshig rnams dang// la la dag la srin po'abyung bo dang// dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen po'atshig/ ma ce lhamin nam mkha' lding tshig gas// bden pa bstan cing thar pa
'dren par byed// de dag bden pa'i nges tshig tshul shes bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston// de dag ting
'dzin rnams 'phrul du 'dra 'o// de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing// 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer
bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul// 'od zer mthong na legs par b bkye zhing// soms can ji snyad 'od zer do shes pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na
med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas// dag 'dun bstan nas ma rnams lam bstan te// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten
bstan pas na// des ni mthongon legs pa'i 'od zer grub// lha ya 'od zer zal gyi gnon pa yi// 'od zer 'od byed rab tu bkye byas shing/ mun pa kun dang rdul rnam kun bsal
te/ 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de thab tu snang// 'od des sems can ji snyad yongs bskul ba// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir ma mar 'dzin// rgyal ba mchod phyir
ma mar bzung byas pas// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'irgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar ma mar mar gyi ma mar dang// shing dang rtswa dang rmig ma sba yasgron// spos dang ro mchog rin
chen sgron ma dag/ rgyal ba rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo// 'od zer sgrol zhes bya ba rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyad 'od zer des bskul ba// de dag srid pa rnam yangs srid pa'i
mtshor// sems can bsgral don go cha brtan pa gyon// gang rnams srad pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor// sems can bsgral phyir go cha bzhin gyon pa// de dgachu bo bzhi las sgrol ba byed//
mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston// stags drang zam ba gcig min byas pa dang/ chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te// 'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na// des na sgrol ba'i 'od zer
de grub bo// 'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhib// sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab sbyangs shing// chos kyi rnam grol ro la don du gnyer// 'dod
pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs te// chos kyis grol ba'i ri la don gnyer bas// sangs rgyas bdud rtsa char pa 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten sred pa'i sgom pa rnam par sel// rdzong dang
tsamacha chu klung khron pa lu ma dang// mtshornam byang chub don du byed btsud de// 'dod pa rnam smad bsam gtan bsngags pas na// sgom pa rnam sul de ni de sgrub bo// 'od zer dga' bar byed pa ram
bkye zhing// sems can ji snyad 'od zer des bskul ba// dga' bas rgyal shing byang chub mchog don du// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sams bskyod do// thugs rje mnga' ba rnams kyi sku
gzugs mtshan brgyan pa// pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing// rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na// dga' ba byed pa'i 'odon des sgrub bo// 'od zer mos par byado
pa rab bkye zhing// sems can jisnyad 'od zer des bskul ba// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'// de dag rtag tu sangs
rgyas mos dga' ste// chos la mos dga' dage 'dun mos dga' bas// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang// rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med 'thob// sangs rgyas
rjes dren chos dang tshogs mchog la// sems can mang po bskul cung dran byas te// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pasan// des na 'od zer mos par byed pa grub// 'od
bsod nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// blan med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing// sprin pa sna tshogs dum yongs su gtong// de dag
mchod sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe// slongamo ba yi bsam pa rdzogs byas te// bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin bas na// des na 'od zer bsod nams bsags
grub bo// 'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyad 'od zer des bskul ba// chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes
sushes// chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de// nges rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing// chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pasan// des na ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer
grub// 'od zeshes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyad 'od zer des bskul ba/ stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba'i// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/
dngos po med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa// sngon dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos// rmi lam lta bu gzugs b.rAn rang bzhin rnams /
rgyu bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo/ 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// ma khrod gzungs kyi mdzod rnams rab thob cib//
de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzan// chos 'chang rnams la yongs su phan btags te// drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing// 'gro ba kun la chos bzhin
phan btags pas// 'od zer chos kyi rnam 'phrul de grub bo// 'od zer gtong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing// sems can 'jugs pa ji snyed de bskul ba// skyid pa mi bskyon mi rtag
shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur// 'jus pa 'dul dka'i sems can ma dul dang// nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas// dga' ba' yid kyis
sbyin pa rnam spel bas// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer yongasasu gdung med rab bkye zhing// tshul ngan sems can ji snyad des bskul ba// tshul khrims
rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes soms skyod do// dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang// tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul cing//
byang chub sems la yang dag bsal byas pas// yongs su gdung mad 'od zer de grub bo// bzod pas rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing// mi bzod sems can ji snyod des ba
ba khro ba'i tho ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing// de dag bgrod mos rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// sdig sems ldan lanyes pa bzod byas te// byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas
shing// bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas// des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de grub bo// 'od zer brtson dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing/ le lo' sems can ji snyed nges
bsal ba// rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur// rigs par brtson pas dkon mchog
gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te// myur du byang chub bla med rab tu thob// sems can mang po
brtson 'grus bskul byas te// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas// tha ma'i dus su dam chos yongs bzung bas// des ni brtson ldan 'od ther de grub bo// 'od zer/
zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing// rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyad des bskul pa// de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams // nyams su ma gnod mnyam bzhag sems su
gyur// sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang// 'du 'dza yongs su rnam par spong byas te// bsam gtan zhi ba'i dgon pa rab bsngags pas// des ni zhi byed 'od
zer de grub bo//'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing// shes rab 'chal pa ji snyad des bskul ba// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang// dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs
bar shes par 'gyur// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang// dpang po rgyus la rtogs par shes gyur cing// nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// bshes pa rtsod
gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bor 'gyur// rgyal srid nor dang bdag 'phangs yongs btang ste// byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba// de dag rim gror rab tu brjod bsapas: 'byed
rab rnam brgyan 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer sangs rgyas ldan pa rab bkye zhing/ sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// sangs rgyas bsam gyis ma khyab shin tu mang ba'i
rnams // pad+mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che dang rnam thar dang// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te/ sangs[– ]dusA stobs
dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas// sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa rab bkye zhing// 'jigs mnar sems can ji snyad des phog pa//
'byung po gza' dang gsad sud brdag pa dang// nad kyi 'jigs pa kun las rab tu 'grol// ma 'jigs sbyin pas sems can bskyab pa dang// srog gcod las sa serdzas/
rgyud phyir bzlog cing// 'jigs pas skyabs tsho rnams la bskyab byas pas// 'od dra' ma 'jigs sbyin pa des grub bo// 'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing// nad pa
yin ba ji snyad des reg pa// thams cad nad kyisdug bsngal rnam par 'grol// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob// nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang// rin cher
ro mchog sbos dang byug pa dang/ bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang// 'bru mar zas skom byin pas de grub bo// 'od zer sangs rgyas ston pa rapa bkye zhing//
tshe zad mthar n ji snyad des bskul ba// sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de dag gi 'bos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'gro// 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran
byas te// dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing// 'tshakarasangs rgyas skyabs su btang byas pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob bo// 'od zer chos
rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyad 'od zer des bskul ba// chos nyan rjod cing de bzhin 'dri ba byed// chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// chos kyi mu ge'i
dus su chos brjod de// chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byaso shing// mos pa bskyod de chos la brtson gyis shig/ brjod pas chos rab rjod pa de thob bo// sangs rgyas sras
rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir// 'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing// khams gsum sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag/ kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du bres//
gsal ba'i debyas sgror drang srong che bstod de// rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams // 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung don du// yos su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob// 'od
zer 'chi mang sbyin pa rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyad 'od zer des bskul ba// bgamad spyod pa thamasacad rnam spangs te// yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len// 'dus
byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongs su gang// 'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi dga' zhes// brjod pas 'chimad sbyin pa de thob bo// 'od zer khyad par
ldan pa rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyad 'od zer des bskul ba// tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par dang// shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams la nyan// tshul khrims 'bag
pa ting 'dzin 'phags pa ste// shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes// byang chub don du bsngags shing bstod byas pas// des na 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob//
'od zer rin chen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// rin chen gter mngam zad thob gyur te// drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod// rgyal
ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la// rin chen bstad de rin chan sbyin btang bas// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub// 'od zer
sros mchog snang ba rab bkye zhing// sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// mi la med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi
dang lha yi sngos dang byug pa yis// mi yi gtsol mchod pa rab byas te// spos kyis rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten dag/ byas pas 'od zer sgros mchopa
za snang ba grub// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs mchog/ rol mo sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis// pho brang dam pa
ts+tsA yongs rgyan me tog 'gengs// sngan chad rgyal ba rol mos bsu byas te// ma tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan mchog dag gis/ mchod
ba byas pas sna tshogs rgyan 'grub po// 'od zer shin tu dang byed rab bkye zhing// sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed// mchod rtan drang srong gnas rnams sbyang
T+Tho/ byas pas// des na 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub// 'od zer chen po'i srin ldan rab bkye zhing// spos kyi char 'bebs sngon rnams kun nas gnas// mchod rten gam yo sngos chus
( yongs btab pas// 'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob// 'od ze lhab lhub rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing// gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur// gos dang bgo ba 'phrang ba sna tshog
ngag 3yododas su btang bas lhab lhub rnam brgyan grub// 'od zer bro mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing// bkres pa kha zas bro mchog thob par 'gyur// zas dang skom dang blo mchog sna tshogs
[4/ ] rnams /byin pas bro mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob// 'od zer nor ston rab tu dgye byas shing// 'phongs pa'in chen gter rnams thob pa 'gyur// gnas dang gter rnams ma zad dkon mchog
gsum// gsol bas non ston 'od zer de thob bo/ 'od zer mag sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing// 'ong ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur/ rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod stel//
mar me gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub// rna brnam sbyong 'od zer rab bkye zhing// rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod ston la// sal snyan
phul bas rna ba rnam sbyong thob// 'od zer sna sbyong rab dgyo byas shing// sngon chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba rnam dang rgyal ba'i mchod ston la// sbos zhim gsol bas
sna sbyong 'od zer grub// 'od zer lce sbyong rab tu dbye byas shing// sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod// mi snyan brlang bar smra brnam sbrangs te// 'jam par smra bas lce sbyong
'od zer grub// 'od zer lus sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing// dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod ston la// lus kyis rab btung lus sbyong
'od zer thob// 'od zer sems sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing// smyos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur// ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gro rab byas bas// des ni sems sbyong
[55 g] ]/'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing// bsam yas sku mnga' ma yi dbang po mthong// sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang//
mchod rten rgyan byas gzugs sbyong thob par 'gyur/ 'od zer sgraspyong rab tu dbye byas shing// sgra sgra men stongapor rab tu shes// rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'dra 'o zhes/ sgra rnams
! bstan pas 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer dri sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing// dring thams cad dri zhimamchog tu 'gyur// spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub shing
@# ga 'od de yin/ 'od zer bro sbyong rab tu dgya byas shing// dug can dug med ro ya mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la// bro mchog thams cad thul ba'i 'od de yin/
lho'od zer reg sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing// reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam bder 'gyur// kr-ishul mdung dang ral gri mda' yi char// 'phreng ba yid 'ong ut+pal pad+mor 'gyur// gosam
ba 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams // rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du bting bkram ste// me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang// 'phreng ba bla re gsol ba'i 'od de yin: 'od zar chos
zla sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing// kha spu kun nA'ajig rten phan mdzad pa'o// bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur// mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed// rkyen las
byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin// rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te// chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin du rtag gnasags// brjod pas chos sbyong 'od zer de thob bo// 'od zer sgo mo de dag la sog
pa// drang srong rnams kyi ba spu sgo gcig nas// gang+ga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung// kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul can no// lhab spu gcig gi sgo gcig nas// 'od zer gang+ga'i bye snyed
yongs 'byung ba// de bzhin ma lus skya rnams thams cad nas// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o// yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub gyurapa'i// yon tan de la bstang grogs
sus byas ba// de drag 'od zer de dag nyid kyang 'byung// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o// de dag bsod nams bstang grogs byas pa la// rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus
btab dang// gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa// de dag kun kyang 'od zer de dag shes// gang gis bsod nams byas shing dge bsags te// sangs rgyas yang dang yang
du mchod byas shing// sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod cing don gnyer ba// de dag kun la 'od zer de dag skul// dmus long rnams kyis nyam mi mthong yang// de med ma yin 'jig
rten kun tu 'char// mig dang ldan pas shar bar shos gyur nas// kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug/ de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang// byed ba ma yin kun tu
'phro ba ste// de dag mos med log pas mnar ba yin// phal gyis ma mo thong blo gros yangs la mod// rgyan dang nor bu bzhon ba gzhal med khang// rin chen sogs
zamchog spos dang byug pa'i rnams // de dag bar gyur la yod mod kyi// nyon mongs 'bongs pa rnams la yong pa mne// gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'du thos tu// dad lta yang ches
mos bskyes gyur na// bdag ni yon ka chen po'i rgyal mtshan du// ma 'gyur snyam du nem nur des ma bskyed// de dag 'khor gyi brgyan du rnam 'phrul bar/ tang lA+on dam pa/ don
par sgrub byed cing// phyogs bcu kun tu dang zla med pa yi// rgyal sras 'khor rnams yongs su ston pa khyod// de dag pad+mo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam// 'od kyis rnam brgyan byon/
gyis bodrub byas shing// lus gcig skyil mo krung gi pad+mo de// yongs su rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul// de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed paro gzhan/ 'a bor dang/ rus
la byin gyis brlab byas shing// rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs bskor bar// de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par spyod// drang srong des ni yongs su sman byas te/ rgya/
ba'i legs la yongs su gang bsgrubs pa// de dag parno chen po'i 'khor byed cing// kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor ya nga lta// skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de 'dra ste// gang rnams
ting 'dzin rnam spyod zhugs gyur pa// kun ya nga rang rang slob mas bskor 'gyur te// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin// de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing//
sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du:/ ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o// de dag ting 'dzin rnams rab sngon sgrub
cing phyogs kyi dra bar stsal zhing spyod pa byad// la la mnyam pazhag la la rnam langs par// rangarang lus kyang phyogs rnams kun tu ston// de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam
bzhag cing// dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas sdang// nub kyi phyogs su de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing// shar gyi phyogs nas bdag 'di che ba sdang// de bzhin phyogs bcu kun
du 'jug byed cing// phyogs rnams gzhan du mnyam par bzhag byas shing// ye shes yon tan mang po gzhan las sdang// drang srong ting 'dzan rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o// shar
phyogs zhing bgrangs ji snyed yod pa'i rnams // ma lus de dag kun gyi rang byung gi/ spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzan la// zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang// der ni
mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas// nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo'i rnams // langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na/ mched pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang//
nub kyi zhing bgras ji snyed yod pa'i rnams // ma lus de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi/ spyanas zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang/// nub kyinangapas nganyid
der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas// shar gyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo'i rnams // langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang// phyogs
bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dra ste// phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus dpa' bo'i rnams // la la mnyam gzhag la la rnam par langs// 'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed snying// de dag
mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing/ khadag nyid che ba gzugs kyi lam las ldang// 'jig rten lhar bcas myos par 'gyur ba yi// bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kyang kun tu ston//
gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing// dran dang ldan pa mgo ga lam las ldang// migan ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa ste// de dag rna ba'i
lam la mnyam bzhag cing// bdag nyid chab sgra yi lam las ldang// sgra dbyas thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// sgra yi lam la
mnyam par bzhag byas shing// dran dang ldan pa rna ba'i lam las ldang// rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong par byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag/
[d ]cing// bdag nyid che ba dri yi lam las ldang// dri rab mchog la 'jug par rab tu zhugs// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// dri ya lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing/ dran/
dang ldan pa sna yi lam las lhung// snani ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med bar ston pa byed// de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhagatsang// bro mchog kun gyi lam las ldang
ba byed// bdag nyid che ba de dag bro mchog shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas dal mos par 'gyur/ bro ba'i mchog la mnyam par bzhag byas shing// dran dang ldan pa lcel lam las lhang
lcanam skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhagacing// bdag nyid chab reg gi lam las ldang// 'jig rten bde babaskyed
pa' rig la zhugs// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// regag lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing// dran dang ldan pa lus kyi lam las ldag/ lus ni ma skyes
ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa mdu par ston pa byed// de dag sems kyi lam lamanyam bzhag cing// bdag nyid tshab chos kyi lam las ldang// chos sgrub 'jug par bya la/
rab tu zhugs// 'jig rten ltar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing// dran dang ldan pa sems kyi lam las ldang// simasazhim skyes ma
@#// byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// byis pa'i lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing// gzhon nu dar la bab pa'i lus su ldang/ gzhon nudar
la bab par mnyam bzhagacing// rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus su rnam par ldang// rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing// dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus su rnam par ldang/
t+tA dag bsnyen dmagi lus su mnyam bzhag cing// dag bstan dad pa'i lus su rnam par ldang// dge sasnyan dad pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing// dge slong ma yi lus su rnam par ldang//
dge slong ma yalus su mnyam bzhag cing// dag slong mang du thos pa'i lus su ldang// dag slong mang thos lus mnyam bzhag cing// slob dang ma slob lus su rnam par ldang/
slob dang mi slob lus su mnyam bzhag cing// rang rgyal lus las de dag rnam par ldang// rang rgyal lus la de dag mnyam bzhag cing// sangs rgyas sku mchog phul du rnam
bar ldang// sangs rgyas sku mchog yul la mnyam bzhag cing// lha yi lus su de dag rnam par ldang// lha yi lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing// 'phrulatshan klu yi lus su mang pa ldad
'phrul chen klu ya lus su mnyam bzhag cing// 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su rnam par ldong// 'phrul chen gnod sbyin las sumanyam bzhag cing// 'byung po kun gyi lus su rnam par
ldang// 'byung po kun gyi lus su mnyam bzhag cing// spu rtsa gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang// sa rtsa gcig gi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing// spu rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang// spurtse
kun gyi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing// skra rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang// sku rtsa gcig gi sgo ni mnyam bzhag cing// skra rtsa kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang// skra rtsa kun gyi sgo ni mnyam bzhag
cing/ rdul phran gcig las de dgarnam par ldang// rdul phran gcig la de dag mnyam bzhag cing// rdul phran ma lus kun las rnam par ldang// rdul phran kun la de dag mnyam bzhag
cing/ rgya mtsho'i rdo rje gzhi las rnam par ldang// rgya mtsho'i rdo rdzogazhil mnyam bzhag cing// rin chen shing gi 'bras las rnam par ldang// ni chen shing gi 'bras la mnyam bzhag cing/
rgyal ba'i 'od zer rnams las rnam par ldang// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing// rgya mtsho'i chu dang chu klung kun nas ldang// rgya mtsho chu klung kun la mnyam bzhag cing//
bdag nyid che ba ma ya wam las ldang// ma yi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing// dran dang ldan pa rlung gi lam las ldang// rlung gi lam la de dag mam bzhag cing// bdag
nyid che ba sa yi gzhi las ldang// sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag byas shing// lha yi gzhal med khang nas rnam par ldang// lha yi gzhal med khang du mnyam bzhag cing// dran dang
ldan pa klu yi gnas nas ldang// yon tan mtha' yas bsags pa de dgag/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba kun gyis bsal ba bsam yas
su// bstan pa mdzad kyang zad par ma rung ngo/ rgyal ba kun gyis de skad ma gsungs min// 'gro ba'i las kyi rnam smin bsam mi khyab// klu ya rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul
dang// bsam tan pa yi rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya// de la 'dra ba'i dab lta yod min te// mkhas shing gsal ba'i skya bo dpa rnams kyis//
bstan na myur du rnam par don shes 'gyur// sems kyi lam la rnam thar brgyad gnas pa'i// nyan thos gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur// mang por gyur cing de bzhin gcig gyur te//
nam mkha'i 'di la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar// 'og nas 'bar yang steng nas chu yargyun// stanganas ma 'bar 'og nas chu yi rgyun// 'gro 'dug nyal zhing 'greng ba de bzhin te// skad cig
gcig la lus 'phrul bsam ma khyab// de ni snying rje chen po ldan pa yin// byang chub ma tshol 'jig rten yal bar gzhog/ 'on kyang lus 'phrul bsam gyis ma khyab ston// 'jig rten

phan tshol ci phyir de mi ston// nyi zlamakha' las rnam par rgyu 'dong zhing// phyogasa rnams kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang// lteng ka khron pa rin chen rgya mtsho snod// chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyanaston
was pa byed// de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kun kyang// skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston// ting 'dzin rnam par kun gyi tshul la mkhas/[——] de la de bzhin gshog par ng byung
dpal/ mtshogasal dang b.rayan lag bzhi yi dpung// so sor rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong// ral gri shing lasogs ka mde'u thung mda'/ bzhon pa theg pa go cha
bcas par mthong// gang ga ga nga gzugs cha byad tsa'adra ba// chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong// / chu la zhe sdang byams ba rtog pa med// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o//
rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra dang ldan yod pa// sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes pa'i rnams // de dag sgra yi yan lag dbyas tshul shes// sgra skad kun tu rang rang skad du brjod dbyangs ldan
de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang can// 'on kyang sgra kun dbyangs kyi tshul la mkhas// gzugs dang chos kyi stobs dang dbang thob rnams // 'jig rten lhar bcas ci phyi ra mgur ma byed//
dga' byed chung ma sgrasnyan ldan pa'o// tshangs pa'i bu mo sams las byung ba ste// dam tshig bden sgrub ma 'tsho dga' ba yi/ sams yid ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa khyad// sgra snyan ldan
pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can// brtul zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brang// 'jig rten yid 'ong sgras kyang tshim par byed// ye shes yon tan mang ba ci'i mi ston// sngags kyi
da/ @#/// tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang// sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs mang ston pa byed// nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang/ khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes
ba ston// 'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang// sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed/ bsam gtanamangon shes rnam 'phrul rab bya rnams // spyod pa'i tshul mkhas
ci phyir dga' mi byed// lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe// lha min lha yang rung ste gang 'tham nga// de dag bzhon pa theg pa gdugs bcas par// go cha gyon bzhin 'jigs pas
kun tu khyer// lha dbang de dag 'dod chags sdang ldan yang// lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston// dbang phyag rdzu 'phrul dbang la gnas pa'i dpa' bo rnams // lus kyi rnam
'phrul caphyir ston mi byed// rdo rje 'dzin ba'i glang bo shugs ldan pa// 'phrul chen glang chen dbang bo'i 'khor gyur ba// mgomang sum cu rtsa gnyis sprul pa byed// mgo rnams kun
zla la'ang bache ba drug drug ste// sornamasar re kun la'ang phreng gi rnams // bdun bdun chus rgyas yo sasu sprul pa byed// rdzing rnams rer kun tu bad+mo rnams // bdun bdun rgyan/
gyis rnam brgyan sprul pa byed// pad+mo re re la yang lha yi bu mo dag/ sgyu rtsal kun makhar bdun bdun spyal po byed// de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul lamakhas/ dosum cu rtsa gsum
dbang po de dang rtse// glangakho de yang klu yi lus btang zhing// lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'di bar rdzu// spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun dang mthun// glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrulatsa
'dra ltos// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// shes rab thabs kyi stobs la byang 'gyur rnams / la/ ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab
'phrul mi byed// sgra gcanAci dga'i tshul du lus rdzu na// rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i mtha' bor zhung// rgya mtsho'i blabs ring lci bar yun tsam byed// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom//
de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// 'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams yongs 'dul ba// rdzu 'phrul mthar yus ci rob ston mi byed//
bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul yang ltos shig dang// lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe// lha min bye ba 'byas pa ji snyed pa// de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed//
lha min dbang po lha min phal kun gyis// brgya byin rung rang mdun na 'dug par shes// de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung gyur ces// lha min dbang po kun kyang mgorkyes so// 'jigs
pa'i gzugs kyi mig stong rab bstan to// de rjes lce 'bar ba rab gzas shing// lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'i// brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang bo 'brel/
de ni bsod nams phal gyi stobs dang mthus// lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur pa'i/ khasod nams mi bzad rnam/
ko cari ma 'phrul// lha rnams bskul ba lha rdzas rnga yod pa// lha yi las rnams rnam par smin pas byung// lha rnams bag med spyod pa shes gyur nas// mkha' las rdza yi dbyas
kyang rab tu sgrog/ 'dod pa thams cad ma rtag ma bstan te/ 'jig cing ma gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu'i zla ba bzhin// srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi
dngos// bag med thams cad gcugs can mya ngan ldan// tsham gyi lam yan 'chi med lam ma yin// ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa'i rnams / bdud kyi chu srin chen pos
zos pa yi// yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad sdug bsngalatsu// skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyis sman// 'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin gyis// chos la
mos pas rtag tu dga' bar gyis// brgya byin lhar bcas rnga yis bskul byas nas// kun kyang chos bzang 'dun sar dong phyin te// lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams //
'dod chags bral dang rjes su mthun pa brjod// sngarab de na gzugs med ma mthong yang// don chen rnga ya sgra ni sgrog byed na// bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa/
'gro ba kun gyi don chanatsang ma byed// lha dang lha min 'thab nga ra gyur pa'i tshe// lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis// lha rnams bsal ba'i lha rdzas rdza yi mchog/ lha
rnams 'jigs sa re zhes sgra yang sgrog/ rngas bskul lha rnams yongs su dga' ba skye// 'jig mad stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur// lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngas gyur
nas// de ma thag tu 'jigs shing kun tu 'byor// de bzhin rnga 'dra 'chi med stobs pa'i rnams // 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung 'gyur te// bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snyang
rje can// zhi ba'i sgra sgroganyon mongs rab tu sel// dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te// dbang po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur// gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin
rtsa bar shes// gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/ lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang// sa bzang 'dun sa kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug/ lha rnams kun la chos
rab ston par yang// brgya byin skad cig gcig gis rnam par 'phrul// brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang ba/ti mug can// sprul pas rang gi 'khong rnams dga' byed na// 'gro don mi
skyo spyod pa ci yi phyir// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten dgaram byed// bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba// de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong// las dang
@#/ nyon mongs kun tu 'khri zhags kyis// so so'i spyi bo bdud 'khrug des kyang bcings// de na 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang
byed na// dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ci rob ste// 'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs ma gzhog/ stong gsum bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang// stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i
gnas rnamasan// ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrog/ de ni 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi// bsam gtanamangon par
shes pas rnam par 'phrul// 'jig rten yongs 'dus bla namad pa yi// bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos/ rgya
mtsho'i sprin gyis char rnams rab bkye ba// skad cig gcig gis thams cad bgrang ba byed// thigs 'ga' zer kyang ma lus des shes na// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab tshul
bslabs te// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams // su rib 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// skad cig gcig la sems bsam shes ma 'gyur// sems can las smin
bsam gyis ma khyab pas// rlung las 'jig rten thams cad yongs su byung// rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med dang// sa bon rnams mang kun kyang de las byung// rlung las sprin
0/ 'byung char pa kun tu 'bab// sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba'ang rlung gis 'gyur// lo tog rnam bar 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te// 'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde ba skyed// de ni pha rol phyin la
ma bslabs te// sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bsrubs min na'ang// 'jig rten rnam grub bsam yas ston byed na// rang nyam thob pa ru rob ston mi byed// rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra sbran
gyi chu tshogs ni// bya skad rnams dang ji snyed ri dgas skad// khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skang// thams cad sgra bzhin 'gro ba rnam par sgrog/ de bzhin sgra brnyan rang bzhin
sgras shas nas// bsgribs pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas// 'gro ba kun tu sgra b.rAn brjod byas shing// 'jig rten thams cad yid 'ong smras tshim byed// rgya mtsho 'di
la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing// chu dang 'byung po rin chen yong ma zad// chu rnams bzung bas yongs su ngoms pa med// de bzhin de dag
'gro kun rgyur gsal te// bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes// shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun// bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngoms pa med//
rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par rtsa byed na// sa ya gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar// gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gas// de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs ldan/ ]
de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi/ gser gyi mdog tu sprin mang rnam par sgrub// 'phrul dgar mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu / dga' ldan gnas
su kha ba ba mo'i mdog/ mtsho mar mthon mthing ba cha mu yi mdog/ sum cu gsum du a gar ba 'dra// rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu // rdo rje ma byed sumadog chu mtshor ro//
mici gnas su spos mchog 'dres par te// klu yi gnas su pad+mo'i mdog lta bu / gnod sbyin gnas su ngang pa chu skyar mdog/ ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su lo// byang du gser gyi kha
ngog 'od ston te// gling rnams gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan tu ston/ 'dzam bu'i gling dur gnag 'dra bar tu// sprin rnams gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin// dbang sgyur gnas
su gser gyi sprin bstan nas// nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu 'gyod// dbang sgyur gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang// dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston//
kha ba ba mo'i mdog du mtshamar to// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su gser mdog tu// rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyisnying po'i mdog/ mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor ro//
ma ci gnas su mthon mthing bai DUm// klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste// ats+tsha'i mdog tu lha man gnas su 'o// byang du ngang
gis snang ba'i rin chen mdog/ gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan dang gzhan// 'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an da ril// sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul mthun glog kyang 'gyang// de ni
tshangs pa'i dbang rgyur gnas su tshangs dbyangs su// 'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dga' rnga yi dbyas// rol mo'i sgyur yang dga' ldan gnas su ste// lha mo' debangs su mtshe ma dag
tu 'o// sum cu gsum du maso'i skad du ste// rgyal chen gnas su dri bra'i skad du 'o// ra 'thab dbyings su rgya mtsho kun tu ste// mi 'am ci yi gnas su gling bu'i sa// ku yiganas
su thal mo brdabs pa'i sgra// gnod sbyin gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra/ lha man gnas su lha rdzas rnga yi sgra// rgya mtsho shugs sgyur mi yi gnas su'o// dbang sgyur gnas su lta rdzas
bsung zhim pa'i// me tog sna tshogs rgyun mang chur yang 'bebs// zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar te// ma tog man da ra ba'i 'phreng ba'i char 'bebs so// dga' ldan
gnas su rin chen po yi char// rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang// gtsug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang// gsar 'od bzang po'i char pa rab tu 'babs// rgyal mtshanugadug
dang ba dan bzang po dang// 'phrang ba byug pa rgyan gyi dam ba dang// mu tig dmar po la ltar btogs mdog tu// rol mo yid 'ong char nga mtsho mar 'babs// sum cu gsul du ron
chen sna tshogs te// tsan dan dam pa'i sbyos dang a ka ru// gur kum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la// spros tshu'i rgyun dang me tog 'dres par 'bab// nyam du 'gyur ba'i
kha zas sgom gyi rnams // kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang// de man rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang// rgyal chen bzhi yi gnas su klu dbang 'bebs// de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du
yang// char rgyud rgyun ma 'chad pa gnya'ashing tsam// mi zad rin chen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i/ rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun du 'bab// ma ci gnas su 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang//
pa ut+pal dngos dang rin chen dang// ma tog bar sha ma la phya ma pos// pa wang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro// klu yaganas su mu tig dmar po ste// gnod sbyin gnas su rin chen dang
snang ba// lha man gnas su ral gra mde'u thung mdung// dgra 'dul gzhu dung sto'u ka'i char 'bebs so// byang du de ni 'phrang ba rin chen dang// ma rtog b.rasha ma la tsam pa ka'i//
'phrang ba bzang po ku ran mug ta ka/ gling rnams gzhan du'ang char pa sna tshogs so// 'dzam bu'i gling du chu'adang rab gsal gyi// char rnams chos bzhin shin tu phra bar 'bebs/
me tog 'bras bu snyan dang gros dang shang// lo zas de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel byed// de ltar sprin rnams bsam gyisam khyab dang// glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnam byed kyang
babs/khyim nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med// klaya 'phrul yang de ltar bsam ma khyab// de ltar chu yi rgya mtsho gnas pa yang// klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na// chos kyi rgyu
mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag/ mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang po mi ma ston// dper bya de dag kun gyis mgo smos tsam// skyes bu do dag yon tan brjod byas te// dpa' bo de
dag dpa dang rnam par bral// de dag de 'dra'i rnam thur dbang sgyuraro// mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can// mnong blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can// ye shes mchog
dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i// rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du baishad// gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos gyur nas// yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni// ngo mtshar rmad
kyi chos dang de ldan te// ma yul kun na de ni dka' ba byed// 'di 'dra'achos la yid chos dad byed pa// so so skye bo' tshogs na'ang shin tu dkon// dag bsags bsod
nams byas pa de dag ni// rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la yid ches 'gyur// gang rnams nyan thos thig la'ang yid ches pa'i// ma rnams 'jig rten kun tu dkon pa ste// de bas/

rang rgyal theg la dad ba dkon//thegatshonadad byed dbasashin tu dkon// theg chen 'di la zhugs pa dkonab ste// 'di 'dra'i chos la dad ba shin du dkon// 'dzin cing spel byed smos kyang ci dgos te// yang dag
ma nor 'jug ba smos ci dgos/ la la stong gsum ra dang mtshor bcas pa// bskal par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byed na'ang// 'di 'dra'i chos la dad
par byed pa las// de 'dra de ni dka' bar brtsi ba ma yin no// la la stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams // bde ba kun gyis bskal par bstod bkur na'ang// bde 'dra'i
chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de las man// la la zhing bcu ra dang mtshor bcas pa/ lag pa'i mthal gyis nam mkha'i dbyings 'dzin kyang//
'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i// dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min// la la zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can rnams // bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur
kyang// 'ang 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min// la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams // bskal par bde ba kun gyis
bsnyan bkung te// la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas nas// bsod nams 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags// rnam thar de dag yongs su bstan pa'i tshe// phyogs
bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos bar gyur// lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan// 'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi// phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge
[rej] rnams // thams cad kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te// phyag brkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang mdog la// bzang po'i dpal gyi mgo la bzhag bar gyur// phyag gi mthil gyis mgo/
la byug mdzod de// sangs rgyas de dag kun gyi gsung brjod pa// rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyis legs bshad kyis/ legs par bstan la rjes su nged dgyes so// shin tu rgyas brtson
po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya blta bcu bdun no// bam bo zhishu pa// de nas sangs
rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byung shur gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ shar
lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og gi phyogs dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/
gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gleng bzhi pa re re na yang de bzhin gshagasal de dag de bzhin du bzhugs par snang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshags ba'i byin gyi
rlabs kyis chos ston cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par yang so so nas shes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ma bal
bar byang chub kyi shing drang nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal ba gang na ba der gshegs par snang ngo// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri reb kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag ga ra rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma
dag kyang mnyams par snang ngo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcomaldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa logs su mngonapar gshigs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong
nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin/ sang ga'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po can/ bog re stong phrag bcus bskrun pa/ gsar gyi
dra ba stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ gnam yol stong phrag bcus bla rar bris pa gdugs stong shin tu bzung ba/ dar gyi lde lnga stong phrag bcu rab du spyas pa/ mu tig gi se mo do stong phrag
bcus dwaga' dga' ltar byas pa/ gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkagab pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa/ chos pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'od zer stong phrag
bcus kun tu snang bar gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bshams so// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang ba rnam ba rgyal bar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du ! 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi re jab kyi rtse mo dag tu yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra
ba dang rgyan de 'dra bar bshams par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bcas nas/ rjes dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang
par gshags so// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag tu'ang gshegs par snang ngo// de nas lha'i
dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa thams cad du glu dang/ rol mo dang/ sil snyan brgya phrag mang po dag btang ste/ zhi bar byas nas yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma rnamA la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bkra shis dam ba gang zhig gis// thugs rje chen po
mnga' ba 'od srungs rigs skyes pa// rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bshis dam pa gang zhig gis// gser
thubabasgrubs pa med par rab du gzigs pa de// rin chen sna tshogs gshags gyur pa// des na 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gsod skyabs
gsar gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de// rtse mo mchog tu gshags gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gas// thams cad mnga' ba dgra
kyi bcom dri ma gsum sel ba// mdzod pa'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa// des na 'dir yang bkra shAs legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgong
pa zil gyis ma non pa// rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des na 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// rnam par gzigs pa skyes
bu'i zla ba ma yi mgon// rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas
shing bstan pa de// ma la ya yi rtser gshags pa// des na 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa ma mapa'i
ba// dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pad+mo'i zla// dri ma med par
gshegs gyur pa// des na 'dir yung bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de// 'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur
pa/ des na 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa glu
blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sas bcu'i rgyal ba gshags ba dag glur len tsang tshigs su bcad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs
nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la bzhugs
par snang ngo// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang ba de yang sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang ba dang/ lha'i ros tsamadu
che bar snang bar gyur te/ 'dun ji lta ba ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas 'bo che zhes bya ba las/
zla/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu b.ru 'ongs
bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi ba la nas 'ongs pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de re zhing yang

byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdulashan tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste ! 'di ltar chos kyi
blo gros dang/ thams cad blo gros dang/ dpal gyi blo gros dang/ yon tan blo gros dang/ brtson 'grus blo gros dang/ dge ba'i blo gres dang/ ye shes blo gros dang ! bden pa'i blo
gros dang/ mchog gi blo gros dang/ dam pa'i blo gros dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mang 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste//
'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang/ pad+mo' mo tog dang/ rin po che'i ma tog dang/ ut+pala'i me tog dang/ rdo dza'i me tog dang/ gros kyi me tog dang/ yid du 'ong pa'i ma tog dang//
0 'od zer gyi me tog dang/ ldam ba'i me tog dang/ nam mkha'i me tog dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag tham cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring/
na tshangs bar spyod pa dgaste/ 'di ltar zla ba gzhanam yin pa dang/ zla ba ma nyams pa dang/ zla ba ma g.yo ba dang ! zla ba ma bsal ba dang/ zla ba tshu'i lha dang/ sgrub thogs ba med pa dang/
zla ba 'od zer dang/ zla ba rdul med pa dang/ zla ba rnam par grub pa dag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas kyi
a b+hus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su bstan te/ song go'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas rgyal mo krung bcas te 'khod do// ji ltar
'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub sems dang 'a rnams lhags pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang/ lha'i dbang po 'i khang
pa kun n yang de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' mang de skad ces bya ba sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa
yang mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bong gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag stong bkya sta/
phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten khams thams cad kyang bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang/ 'jig
rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang ra rab kyi rtse mo thams cad na/ de bzhin gshags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong zung gyur to/
ts+tshA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bstas te/ de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di skad smra so// snang ba
dri ma med la ltos// rirab rtse mo thams cad la// mgon po dag ni rab tu snang// rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs// lha yi rgyal po thams cad kyis// spyan drangs shing ni/
gshegs par gyur// kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gis// rab tu gshegs pas mngon par bstod// kun gyi 'khor kyang gag pa ste// byang chub sem sa dpa' mang po
N+NaM lhags// phyogs bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing// yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod/ kun gyi mang yang 'di nyid de// ji ltar byed la brtags pa bzhin// 'jig rten khams
kyi mang dag kyang// de skad dag nas kun kyang 'ongs// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// drang srong chen po'i mtshan kyang de// de na tshangs spyod sla pad la/ the tshom
0'i/ mad par de dag spyod// kye ma rgyal sras khyed ltos shig/ drang srong chen po'i byin gyi rlabs// 'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams cad na// rgyal ba 'di ni bzhugs snyam byed// bdag
cag rnams ni 'di snyam du// ri rab rtsa la bad gshegs snyam// 'jig rten khams rnams kun na yang// sangs rgyas ngo mtshar rmad ra che// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad
na// byang chub mchog tu sems btang zhing// de dag smon lam 'di btab ste// byang chub spyad pa rab tu spyod// kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas// gang brag mchog ni spyod
byed kyang// chos kyi dbyings la ma chags te// de dag sus kyang ma shes so// gang gis 'jig rten mun bsal cing// thams cad dus su rnam snang ba// de la 'dra ba gang yang
mad/ de ni shes par ji ltar rung// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
saso// 'dren pa rnams ni mthong nas kyang// bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mgon skyob de dag gi/ chos nyid de ni shes pa min// mtshan ma dag la spyod pa'i
rnams // gti mug dra ba 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba// 'khor ba'i btson rar mdos pa yin// chos rnams 'di dag brtag byas na// rang/
bzhin gshegs par ma rung ste// skye dang shi 'phor gyur pa'i rnams // ming tsam du ni bstan pa yin// chos rnams gang yang 'pho ba med// gang yang de spu
shu bzhin skye ba mang// chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na// sangs rgyas kun n rab tu snang// gzung du med cing bltar yod de// chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med// dngos med pa yi
mtha' shes na// sangs rgyas rnams la tshad kyang mad// tshad med pa yi chos rnams kyi// rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa// des ni ci zhig yod ces par// mthong bar
gyur pa gang yang med// gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba// de dag byis pa'i chos nyid de// de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang med mthong ngo//
dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnams // mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste// ma gnas tshul du bzhugs pa yani// chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba mad// la la dag gi ches nyid shes//
la la dag la chos kyang brjod// gang la the tshom ma mnga' ba'i yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid 'di// chos kyi blo gros 'dis brjod de//
] ]de thos nas kyang bdag gis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas shes// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a dpal gyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye masangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba'i// ye shes shes rab shin tu che// de la 'jig
rten shin tu rmos// sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis// byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas// de phyir 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i//
sangs rgyas rnams ni ma mthong ngo// shes rab chung ba thams cad ni// phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas// phung po rnam par ma bsgoms pas// de bzhin gshegs pa mi
mthong ngo// dngos med dngos su bshad pa ni// bdag gi dngos shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad shes bgyis shing// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ltos// sngon
chad phung po'i tshul bzhin du// ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba// ma 'ongs pa'i tshul shes pas// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// ji ltar snang ba med pa yi//
mun pa'anang nagazugs mi snang// de bzhin chos rnams ma bshad pa// mkhas kyang shes par ma rung ngo// ji ltar du ma ldan mag gis// gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi
mthong ba// de bzhin sems ni ma sbyangs pas// sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo// ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs mod pa// rab rib can gyis ma mthong ba// de bzhin phug naganas/
sems kyis// sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo// de bas mig ni rnam par sbyos// gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// chos rnams mthong ba
mad pa yin// 'od mdzad rab tu mthong ba yin// ji ltar kun blos sngon bshad cing// bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub mi bsnyed pa// rnam par
snang mdzad rab tu mthong// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// gnas med pa yi chos rnams la// gnas ni yongs su brtags pas na// de phyir srid pa'i btson ra na// byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor// brjod
pas brjod du ma rung chos// blo zhan rnams kyis rnam par brtags// des ni yongs su bsgribs byas pas// bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byed// shes rab chung ba'i lam nor
cing/ bdag gi sems la ma mkhas pa// phyin ci log gi blo dag gis// ma bzad lus ni 'phel bar byed// gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba// de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang ng//
chos mig bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i// mig kyang de la yod pa min// de bas mig ni sbyang bar gyis// bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par soms// gang phyir bdag cag sngan chad du//
bde gshes ma mthong chud kyang zos// yang dag sangs rgyas mthong na'ang// gang gsems la chags med pa// des na sangs rgyas nyis byung ba'i// chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong/ gang
gis shes rab mamanga' ba// chos su bde gshegs mthong ba'i rnams // de dag 'jig rten mig can te// gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya// lhag mthong med par mthong ba na// chos
rnams ngan par mthong ba ste// lhagamathong gis ni mthong gyur na// thams cad mthong ba med pa yin// kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni// yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// de ni
rang bzhin thams cad du// shi ba med cing 'tsho ba med// sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba// dpal gyi blos na sngon bstan to// de las bdag gis thos nas kyang// sangs rgyas chos
nyid shes ma gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe chags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam
par rtog la sbyod pa yi// mig ni shin tu 'khrul pa yin// 'khrul par mthong ba ldog pa ste// sangs rgyas lan log ma mnga'// gang gis log par shes gyur to// yang dag
ji bzhin ma nor la// yang dag ma yin bden shes na// sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin// mthong ba dag gis dri mar gyur// rnam par mthongan de mad de// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong
dang bral// de bas rnam par gzigs shis bya// de na 'jig rten spyod pa ste// 'jig rten de yang rnam par brtags// 'jig rten 'jig pa shes gyuran//
zla snang ba dag na skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten rnams kyi snang ba ni// 'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste// yang dag ji bzhin mnyam byas shing// de ltar mthong nas mthong ba'o// de ltar
mthong na nyon mongs med// dbang du gyur cing zag pa med// gang gis tha dad med mthong ba// dngos por brtags pa ma yin no// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni// sangs rgyasachos
rnams brjod pa ste// de dag yod pa ma yin pas// rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin// de dag rang bzhinarnam par dag/ nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med// de dag la ni ston
pa med// mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos// chos rnams la ni mos med de// chos kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing// shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa// des ni thub chen
tshe mthong ba yin// ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa// de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong// de mthong bas na 'du byed kun// rang bzhin gyis kyang rnam par zhi// do nas/
byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma
00/ sangs rgyas dpa' chen rnams // de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med do// rnam grol thugasan sdog mi mnga'// 'jig rten mthar phyin rgol ba'o// yang dag ji bzhin ma nor bar// bskal pa
rnams ni tshad med pas// dzAltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin// 'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs// 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma// so so'i skyo bo de dag 'gangs// nam
mkha'i khams na bzung byas shing// de dag de phyir khom pa med// khom pa med ces bya ba ni// ci yang brjod du med pa ste// khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// khom pa bsam gyis
mi khyab thob// gang la dngos bo med pa yi// ma zad khom ba med par bshad// yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyuran// des ni grags chen mthong ba yin// mthong ba med pa mthong zhes
bya3 3yod pa med pa'ang yod ces bya// mthong ba dag gam yod pa ni// ma bsgoms ba ni rnam par bsgoms// ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba// de dag gis na lta ba bshig/ gang las
sangs rgyas smos pa yi// de dag chos rnams zhig pa med// ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin// sangs rgyas yongs su sus mthong ba// de na 'jig rten snang bar byed// rgyal
ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhin// chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan// des na brtson blo brtan pa de// chos mang bye ba rab tu ston// yod dang med
pashes byas te// gang gi 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa// des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste// yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas// las/ yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub
sems dpa' ye shes blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i bstan ba 'di thos pas// snang
ba bdag cag shes par gyur// phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yi// yang dragasangs rgyas des kyang mthong// sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa// de ni sems can g.yangs ste// 'di la
ci yang yod pa min// tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa'o// byis pa 'dzan dang bcas pa'i rnams // bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la// sangs rgyas snang bar mi 'gyur te// de
bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba med// yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing// gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa// de skad bskal pa grangs med du// srid pa'i gang chen mtshon 'khor/
nyon mongs can na 'khor bar bshad// nyon mongs mad pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang// rang bzhin rnyed par ma rung ngo// 'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te// mya ngan
'das pa brjod pa yin// 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa// bla ma dgan mi shes so// 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'di// 'di yin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can// de dag sangs/
zhi/ rgyas ma mthong ste// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta ba// gang gis zhi ba shes gyur pa// des na chog gi lam 'das pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu
mthong// chos rnams kun gyi spyod pani// rab tu brjod kyang bstan pa med// 'od kyang mnyam pa nyid du blta// rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam// yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med//
thog ma dag dang tha mar yang// 'gal med rtsa ba med pas// de nasangs rgyas de phyir brjod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas
kyi byan gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnams ni ma 9na pa'i phyir// bskal ba bsam gyis mi khyab
bar// sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang sla// de ni bde ba bsam mi khyab// ci phyir zhe na bskal pa'i rnams // grangs med sdug bsngal sngon chad byung// 'on kyang bde gshegs
ma thos pas// bdag cag 'khor las ma grol lo// de bzhin ma nor chos kyi rnams // yang dag nyid du rtogs gyur te// gang la 'grogs pa med pa'i rnams // de dag byang chub bla na
mad: 3sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon sum pa// sngon chad ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos// de dag mtshan nyid med pa'o// chos rnams blta dka'
ka/ jibazhin du// gang zhig de ltar rtog pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs pa// yang dag lta bas shin tumathong// yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs// yang dag
minapar yang dag min// 'di ya mtha' ni ston pas na// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas pashes kyang bya// khong du ma chud chos bstan te// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod// 'di ni sa sa
wA rgyas bsgoms pa ste// gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no// de ltar mang dang gcig gnas pa// mang po dag tu rnam par shes// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ bsags pa dag
kyang rab tu byas// byas pa mad tsang byed pa med// las kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing// las 'di ji bzhin shes byas n// rnam pa dag kyang ma dmags so// gang la sasargyas
bzhugs pa yi// nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
mchog gi blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can chen po bla na med// sams
can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// 'jug par bya ba gang yang med// de bas bla na med ces bya// gangal phra ba yod man pa// de la sbom pa'ong yod pa man// de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis
bstas// rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas// gang zhisangs rgyas spyod yul pa// de la phra ba yod pa min// yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral// de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// mun pa
rnams ni rnam bsal cing// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang// de la snang ba gang yang med// ma snang ba yang tsayang med// thams cad chos la kun nas dga'// skyes pa mad cing
gnas pa med// 'dod chags med cing brten pa med// chos nyid de yang srid pa med// gang la gnyis su bgrang med cing// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas// ji bzhin rab tu gnas
pa yi// shes rab chen po legs par mthong// ma gnyis pa la gnyis pa med// gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste// stong pa de yang khams gsum kun// de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba 'o//
byas pas byang chub ma shes kyang// de dag de la rab tu gnas// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// rang gi lus ni rjes su blta// lus med pa ni lus su bshad// 'byung ba med
cing bstan du med// 'jig tshogs mang po bltar med pa// sangs rgyas skun bla na med// sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin nyid// de skad bden pa'i blo skyas te// de thos pas ni mig kyang
